} while (0); // FIXME: Should it be 1 ?
4064 CHECK(!debug_event_listener_callback.IsEmpty())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(!debug_event_listener_callback
.IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc",
4064, "Check failed: %s.", "!debug_event_listener_callback.IsEmpty()"
); } } while (0);
4065
4066 debug_event_listener_callback.Clear();
4067}
4068
4069
4070// Test break on exception from compiler errors. When compiling using
4071// v8::Script::Compile there is no JavaScript stack whereas when compiling using
4072// eval there are JavaScript frames.
4073TEST(BreakOnCompileException)static void TestBreakOnCompileException(); CcTest register_test_BreakOnCompileException
(TestBreakOnCompileException, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc",
"BreakOnCompileException", __null, true, true); static void TestBreakOnCompileException
() {
4074 DebugLocalContext env;
4075 v8::HandleScope scope(env->GetIsolate());
4076
4077 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = env.context();
4078 // For this test, we want to break on uncaught exceptions:
4079 ChangeBreakOnException(false, true);
4080
4081 // Create a function for checking the function when hitting a break point.
4082 frame_count = CompileFunction(&env, frame_count_source, "frame_count");
4083
4084 env->GetIsolate()->AddMessageListener(MessageCallbackCount);
4085 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(env->GetIsolate(), DebugEventCounter);
4086
4087 DebugEventCounterClear();
4088 MessageCallbackCountClear();
4089
4090 // Check initial state.
4091 CHECK_EQ(0, exception_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (0), (exception_hit_count
), "0" " " "==" " " "exception_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4091, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
4092 CHECK_EQ(0, uncaught_exception_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (0), (uncaught_exception_hit_count
), "0" " " "==" " " "uncaught_exception_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4092, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
4093 CHECK_EQ(0, message_callback_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (0), (message_callback_count
), "0" " " "==" " " "message_callback_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4093, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
4094 CHECK_EQ(-1, last_js_stack_height)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (-1), (
last_js_stack_height), "-1" " " "==" " " "last_js_stack_height"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4094, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
4095
4096 // Throws SyntaxError: Unexpected end of input
4097 CHECK(do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str
(env->GetIsolate(), "+++")).IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4098, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), \"+++\")).IsEmpty()"
); } } while (0)
4098 v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), "+++")).IsEmpty())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str
(env->GetIsolate(), "+++")).IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4098, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), \"+++\")).IsEmpty()"
); } } while (0);
4099 CHECK_EQ(1, exception_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (exception_hit_count
), "1" " " "==" " " "exception_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4099, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
4100 CHECK_EQ(1, uncaught_exception_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (uncaught_exception_hit_count
), "1" " " "==" " " "uncaught_exception_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4100, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
4101 CHECK_EQ(1, message_callback_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (message_callback_count
), "1" " " "==" " " "message_callback_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4101, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
4102 CHECK_EQ(0, last_js_stack_height)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (0), (last_js_stack_height
), "0" " " "==" " " "last_js_stack_height")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4102, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0); // No JavaScript stack.
4103
4104 // Throws SyntaxError: Unexpected identifier
4105 CHECK(do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str
(env->GetIsolate(), "x x")).IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4106, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), \"x x\")).IsEmpty()"
); } } while (0)
4106 v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), "x x")).IsEmpty())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str
(env->GetIsolate(), "x x")).IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4106, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), \"x x\")).IsEmpty()"
); } } while (0);
4107 CHECK_EQ(2, exception_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (2), (exception_hit_count
), "2" " " "==" " " "exception_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4107, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
4108 CHECK_EQ(2, uncaught_exception_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (2), (uncaught_exception_hit_count
), "2" " " "==" " " "uncaught_exception_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4108, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
4109 CHECK_EQ(2, message_callback_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (2), (message_callback_count
), "2" " " "==" " " "message_callback_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4109, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
4110 CHECK_EQ(0, last_js_stack_height)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (0), (last_js_stack_height
), "0" " " "==" " " "last_js_stack_height")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4110, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0); // No JavaScript stack.
4111
4112 // Throws SyntaxError: Unexpected end of input
4113 CHECK(v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), "eval('+++')"))do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str
(env->GetIsolate(), "eval('+++')")) .ToLocalChecked() ->
Run(context) .IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4116, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), \"eval('+++')\")) .ToLocalChecked() ->Run(context) .IsEmpty()"
); } } while (0)
4114 .ToLocalChecked()do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str
(env->GetIsolate(), "eval('+++')")) .ToLocalChecked() ->
Run(context) .IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4116, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), \"eval('+++')\")) .ToLocalChecked() ->Run(context) .IsEmpty()"
); } } while (0)
4115 ->Run(context)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str
(env->GetIsolate(), "eval('+++')")) .ToLocalChecked() ->
Run(context) .IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4116, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), \"eval('+++')\")) .ToLocalChecked() ->Run(context) .IsEmpty()"
); } } while (0)
4116 .IsEmpty())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str
(env->GetIsolate(), "eval('+++')")) .ToLocalChecked() ->
Run(context) .IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4116, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), \"eval('+++')\")) .ToLocalChecked() ->Run(context) .IsEmpty()"
); } } while (0);
4117 CHECK_EQ(3, exception_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (3), (exception_hit_count
), "3" " " "==" " " "exception_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4117, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
4118 CHECK_EQ(3, uncaught_exception_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (3), (uncaught_exception_hit_count
), "3" " " "==" " " "uncaught_exception_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4118, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
4119 CHECK_EQ(3, message_callback_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (3), (message_callback_count
), "3" " " "==" " " "message_callback_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4119, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
4120 CHECK_EQ(1, last_js_stack_height)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (last_js_stack_height
), "1" " " "==" " " "last_js_stack_height")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4120, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
4121
4122 // Throws SyntaxError: Unexpected identifier
4123 CHECK(v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), "eval('x x')"))do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str
(env->GetIsolate(), "eval('x x')")) .ToLocalChecked() ->
Run(context) .IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4126, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), \"eval('x x')\")) .ToLocalChecked() ->Run(context) .IsEmpty()"
); } } while (0)
4124 .ToLocalChecked()do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str
(env->GetIsolate(), "eval('x x')")) .ToLocalChecked() ->
Run(context) .IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4126, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), \"eval('x x')\")) .ToLocalChecked() ->Run(context) .IsEmpty()"
); } } while (0)
4125 ->Run(context)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str
(env->GetIsolate(), "eval('x x')")) .ToLocalChecked() ->
Run(context) .IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4126, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), \"eval('x x')\")) .ToLocalChecked() ->Run(context) .IsEmpty()"
); } } while (0)
4126 .IsEmpty())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str
(env->GetIsolate(), "eval('x x')")) .ToLocalChecked() ->
Run(context) .IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4126, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), \"eval('x x')\")) .ToLocalChecked() ->Run(context) .IsEmpty()"
); } } while (0);
4127 CHECK_EQ(4, exception_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (4), (exception_hit_count
), "4" " " "==" " " "exception_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4127, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
4128 CHECK_EQ(4, uncaught_exception_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (4), (uncaught_exception_hit_count
), "4" " " "==" " " "uncaught_exception_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4128, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
4129 CHECK_EQ(4, message_callback_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (4), (message_callback_count
), "4" " " "==" " " "message_callback_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4129, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
4130 CHECK_EQ(1, last_js_stack_height)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (last_js_stack_height
), "1" " " "==" " " "last_js_stack_height")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4130, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
4131}
4132
4133
4134TEST(StepWithException)static void TestStepWithException(); CcTest register_test_StepWithException
(TestStepWithException, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "StepWithException"
, __null, true, true); static void TestStepWithException() {
4135 DebugLocalContext env;
4136 v8::HandleScope scope(env->GetIsolate());
4137
4138 // For this test, we want to break on uncaught exceptions:
4139 ChangeBreakOnException(false, true);
4140
4141 // Create a function for checking the function when hitting a break point.
4142 frame_function_name = CompileFunction(&env,
4143 frame_function_name_source,
4144 "frame_function_name");
4145
4146 // Register a debug event listener which steps and counts.
4147 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(env->GetIsolate(), DebugEventStepSequence);
4148
4149 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = env.context();
4150 // Create functions for testing stepping.
4151 const char* src = "function a() { n(); }; "
4152 "function b() { c(); }; "
4153 "function c() { n(); }; "
4154 "function d() { x = 1; try { e(); } catch(x) { x = 2; } }; "
4155 "function e() { n(); }; "
4156 "function f() { x = 1; try { g(); } catch(x) { x = 2; } }; "
4157 "function g() { h(); }; "
4158 "function h() { x = 1; throw 1; }; ";
4159
4160 // Step through invocation of a.
4161 ClearStepping();
4162 v8::Local<v8::Function> a = CompileFunction(&env, src, "a");
4163 SetBreakPoint(a, 0);
4164 step_action = StepIn;
4165 break_point_hit_count = 0;
4166 expected_step_sequence = "aa";
4167 CHECK(a->Call(context, env->Global(), 0, NULL).IsEmpty())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(a->Call(context, env->Global
(), 0, __null).IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4167, "Check failed: %s.", "a->Call(context, env->Global(), 0, NULL).IsEmpty()"
); } } while (0);
4168 CHECK_EQ(StrLength(expected_step_sequence),do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (StrLength
(expected_step_sequence)), (break_point_hit_count), "StrLength(expected_step_sequence)"
" " "==" " " "break_point_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4169, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0)
4169 break_point_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (StrLength
(expected_step_sequence)), (break_point_hit_count), "StrLength(expected_step_sequence)"
" " "==" " " "break_point_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4169, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
4170
4171 // Step through invocation of b + c.
4172 ClearStepping();
4173 v8::Local<v8::Function> b = CompileFunction(&env, src, "b");
4174 SetBreakPoint(b, 0);
4175 step_action = StepIn;
4176 break_point_hit_count = 0;
4177 expected_step_sequence = "bcc";
4178 CHECK(b->Call(context, env->Global(), 0, NULL).IsEmpty())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(b->Call(context, env->Global
(), 0, __null).IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4178, "Check failed: %s.", "b->Call(context, env->Global(), 0, NULL).IsEmpty()"
); } } while (0);
4179 CHECK_EQ(StrLength(expected_step_sequence),do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (StrLength
(expected_step_sequence)), (break_point_hit_count), "StrLength(expected_step_sequence)"
" " "==" " " "break_point_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4180, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0)
4180 break_point_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (StrLength
(expected_step_sequence)), (break_point_hit_count), "StrLength(expected_step_sequence)"
" " "==" " " "break_point_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4180, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
4181
4182 // Step through invocation of d + e.
4183 ClearStepping();
4184 v8::Local<v8::Function> d = CompileFunction(&env, src, "d");
4185 SetBreakPoint(d, 0);
4186 ChangeBreakOnException(false, true);
4187 step_action = StepIn;
4188 break_point_hit_count = 0;
4189 expected_step_sequence = "ddedd";
4190 d->Call(context, env->Global(), 0, NULL__null).ToLocalChecked();
4191 CHECK_EQ(StrLength(expected_step_sequence),do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (StrLength
(expected_step_sequence)), (break_point_hit_count), "StrLength(expected_step_sequence)"
" " "==" " " "break_point_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4192, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0)
4192 break_point_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (StrLength
(expected_step_sequence)), (break_point_hit_count), "StrLength(expected_step_sequence)"
" " "==" " " "break_point_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4192, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
4193
4194 // Step through invocation of d + e now with break on caught exceptions.
4195 ChangeBreakOnException(true, true);
4196 step_action = StepIn;
4197 break_point_hit_count = 0;
4198 expected_step_sequence = "ddeedd";
4199 d->Call(context, env->Global(), 0, NULL__null).ToLocalChecked();
4200 CHECK_EQ(StrLength(expected_step_sequence),do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (StrLength
(expected_step_sequence)), (break_point_hit_count), "StrLength(expected_step_sequence)"
" " "==" " " "break_point_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4201, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0)
4201 break_point_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (StrLength
(expected_step_sequence)), (break_point_hit_count), "StrLength(expected_step_sequence)"
" " "==" " " "break_point_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4201, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
4202
4203 // Step through invocation of f + g + h.
4204 ClearStepping();
4205 v8::Local<v8::Function> f = CompileFunction(&env, src, "f");
4206 SetBreakPoint(f, 0);
4207 ChangeBreakOnException(false, true);
4208 step_action = StepIn;
4209 break_point_hit_count = 0;
4210 expected_step_sequence = "ffghhff";
4211 f->Call(context, env->Global(), 0, NULL__null).ToLocalChecked();
4212 CHECK_EQ(StrLength(expected_step_sequence),do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (StrLength
(expected_step_sequence)), (break_point_hit_count), "StrLength(expected_step_sequence)"
" " "==" " " "break_point_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4213, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0)
4213 break_point_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (StrLength
(expected_step_sequence)), (break_point_hit_count), "StrLength(expected_step_sequence)"
" " "==" " " "break_point_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4213, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
4214
4215 // Step through invocation of f + g + h now with break on caught exceptions.
4216 ChangeBreakOnException(true, true);
4217 step_action = StepIn;
4218 break_point_hit_count = 0;
4219 expected_step_sequence = "ffghhhff";
4220 f->Call(context, env->Global(), 0, NULL__null).ToLocalChecked();
4221 CHECK_EQ(StrLength(expected_step_sequence),do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (StrLength
(expected_step_sequence)), (break_point_hit_count), "StrLength(expected_step_sequence)"
" " "==" " " "break_point_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4222, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0)
4222 break_point_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (StrLength
(expected_step_sequence)), (break_point_hit_count), "StrLength(expected_step_sequence)"
" " "==" " " "break_point_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4222, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
4223
4224 // Get rid of the debug event listener.
4225 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(env->GetIsolate(), nullptr);
4226 CheckDebuggerUnloaded(env->GetIsolate());
4227}
4228
4229
4230TEST(DebugBreak)static void TestDebugBreak(); CcTest register_test_DebugBreak
(TestDebugBreak, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "DebugBreak"
, __null, true, true); static void TestDebugBreak() {
4231 i::FLAG_stress_compaction = false;
4232#ifdef VERIFY_HEAP1
4233 i::FLAG_verify_heap = true;
4234#endif
4235 DebugLocalContext env;
4236 v8::Isolate* isolate = env->GetIsolate();
4237 v8::HandleScope scope(isolate);
4238
4239 // Register a debug event listener which sets the break flag and counts.
4240 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(isolate, DebugEventBreak);
4241
4242 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = env.context();
4243 // Create a function for testing stepping.
4244 const char* src = "function f0() {}"
4245 "function f1(x1) {}"
4246 "function f2(x1,x2) {}"
4247 "function f3(x1,x2,x3) {}";
4248 v8::Local<v8::Function> f0 = CompileFunction(&env, src, "f0");
4249 v8::Local<v8::Function> f1 = CompileFunction(&env, src, "f1");
4250 v8::Local<v8::Function> f2 = CompileFunction(&env, src, "f2");
4251 v8::Local<v8::Function> f3 = CompileFunction(&env, src, "f3");
4252
4253 // Call the function to make sure it is compiled.
4254 v8::Local<v8::Value> argv[] = {
4255 v8::Number::New(isolate, 1), v8::Number::New(isolate, 1),
4256 v8::Number::New(isolate, 1), v8::Number::New(isolate, 1)};
4257
4258 // Call all functions to make sure that they are compiled.
4259 f0->Call(context, env->Global(), 0, NULL__null).ToLocalChecked();
4260 f1->Call(context, env->Global(), 0, NULL__null).ToLocalChecked();
4261 f2->Call(context, env->Global(), 0, NULL__null).ToLocalChecked();
4262 f3->Call(context, env->Global(), 0, NULL__null).ToLocalChecked();
4263
4264 // Set the debug break flag.
4265 v8::Debug::DebugBreak(env->GetIsolate());
4266 CHECK(v8::Debug::CheckDebugBreak(env->GetIsolate()))do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Debug::CheckDebugBreak(env
->GetIsolate()))), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4266, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Debug::CheckDebugBreak(env->GetIsolate())"
); } } while (0);
4267
4268 // Call all functions with different argument count.
4269 break_point_hit_count = 0;
4270 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < arraysize(argv)(sizeof(ArraySizeHelper(argv))); i++) {
4271 f0->Call(context, env->Global(), i, argv).ToLocalChecked();
4272 f1->Call(context, env->Global(), i, argv).ToLocalChecked();
4273 f2->Call(context, env->Global(), i, argv).ToLocalChecked();
4274 f3->Call(context, env->Global(), i, argv).ToLocalChecked();
4275 }
4276
4277 // One break for each function called.
4278 CHECK(4 * arraysize(argv) == break_point_hit_count)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(4 * (sizeof(ArraySizeHelper(argv
))) == break_point_hit_count)), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4278, "Check failed: %s.", "4 * arraysize(argv) == break_point_hit_count"
); } } while (0);
4279
4280 // Get rid of the debug event listener.
4281 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(isolate, nullptr);
4282 CheckDebuggerUnloaded(isolate);
4283}
4284
4285
4286// Test to ensure that JavaScript code keeps running while the debug break
4287// through the stack limit flag is set but breaks are disabled.
4288TEST(DisableBreak)static void TestDisableBreak(); CcTest register_test_DisableBreak
(TestDisableBreak, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "DisableBreak"
, __null, true, true); static void TestDisableBreak() {
4289 DebugLocalContext env;
4290 v8::HandleScope scope(env->GetIsolate());
4291
4292 // Register a debug event listener which sets the break flag and counts.
4293 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(env->GetIsolate(), DebugEventCounter);
4294
4295 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = env.context();
4296 // Create a function for testing stepping.
4297 const char* src = "function f() {g()};function g(){i=0; while(i<10){i++}}";
4298 v8::Local<v8::Function> f = CompileFunction(&env, src, "f");
4299
4300 // Set, test and cancel debug break.
4301 v8::Debug::DebugBreak(env->GetIsolate());
4302 CHECK(v8::Debug::CheckDebugBreak(env->GetIsolate()))do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Debug::CheckDebugBreak(env
->GetIsolate()))), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4302, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Debug::CheckDebugBreak(env->GetIsolate())"
); } } while (0);
4303 v8::Debug::CancelDebugBreak(env->GetIsolate());
4304 CHECK(!v8::Debug::CheckDebugBreak(env->GetIsolate()))do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(!v8::Debug::CheckDebugBreak(env
->GetIsolate()))), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4304, "Check failed: %s.", "!v8::Debug::CheckDebugBreak(env->GetIsolate())"
); } } while (0);
4305
4306 // Set the debug break flag.
4307 v8::Debug::DebugBreak(env->GetIsolate());
4308
4309 // Call all functions with different argument count.
4310 break_point_hit_count = 0;
4311 f->Call(context, env->Global(), 0, NULL__null).ToLocalChecked();
4312 CHECK_EQ(1, break_point_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (break_point_hit_count
), "1" " " "==" " " "break_point_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4312, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
4313
4314 {
4315 v8::Debug::DebugBreak(env->GetIsolate());
4316 i::Isolate* isolate = reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(env->GetIsolate());
4317 v8::internal::DisableBreak disable_break(isolate->debug(), true);
4318 f->Call(context, env->Global(), 0, NULL__null).ToLocalChecked();
4319 CHECK_EQ(1, break_point_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (break_point_hit_count
), "1" " " "==" " " "break_point_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4319, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
4320 }
4321
4322 f->Call(context, env->Global(), 0, NULL__null).ToLocalChecked();
4323 CHECK_EQ(2, break_point_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (2), (break_point_hit_count
), "2" " " "==" " " "break_point_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4323, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
4324
4325 // Get rid of the debug event listener.
4326 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(env->GetIsolate(), nullptr);
4327 CheckDebuggerUnloaded(env->GetIsolate());
4328}
4329
4330TEST(DisableDebuggerStatement)static void TestDisableDebuggerStatement(); CcTest register_test_DisableDebuggerStatement
(TestDisableDebuggerStatement, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, "DisableDebuggerStatement", __null, true, true); static void
TestDisableDebuggerStatement() {
4331 DebugLocalContext env;
4332 v8::HandleScope scope(env->GetIsolate());
4333
4334 // Register a debug event listener which sets the break flag and counts.
4335 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(env->GetIsolate(), DebugEventCounter);
4336 CompileRun("debugger;");
4337 CHECK_EQ(1, break_point_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (break_point_hit_count
), "1" " " "==" " " "break_point_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4337, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
4338
4339 // Check that we ignore debugger statement when breakpoints aren't active.
4340 i::Isolate* isolate = reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(env->GetIsolate());
4341 isolate->debug()->set_break_points_active(false);
4342 CompileRun("debugger;");
4343 CHECK_EQ(1, break_point_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (break_point_hit_count
), "1" " " "==" " " "break_point_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4343, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
4344}
4345
4346static const char* kSimpleExtensionSource =
4347 "(function Foo() {"
4348 " return 4;"
4349 "})() ";
4350
4351// http://crbug.com/28933
4352// Test that debug break is disabled when bootstrapper is active.
4353TEST(NoBreakWhenBootstrapping)static void TestNoBreakWhenBootstrapping(); CcTest register_test_NoBreakWhenBootstrapping
(TestNoBreakWhenBootstrapping, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, "NoBreakWhenBootstrapping", __null, true, true); static void
TestNoBreakWhenBootstrapping() {
4354 v8::Isolate* isolate = CcTest::isolate();
4355 v8::HandleScope scope(isolate);
4356
4357 // Register a debug event listener which sets the break flag and counts.
4358 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(isolate, DebugEventCounter);
4359
4360 // Set the debug break flag.
4361 v8::Debug::DebugBreak(isolate);
4362 break_point_hit_count = 0;
4363 {
4364 // Create a context with an extension to make sure that some JavaScript
4365 // code is executed during bootstrapping.
4366 v8::RegisterExtension(new v8::Extension("simpletest",
4367 kSimpleExtensionSource));
4368 const char* extension_names[] = { "simpletest" };
4369 v8::ExtensionConfiguration extensions(1, extension_names);
4370 v8::HandleScope handle_scope(isolate);
4371 v8::Context::New(isolate, &extensions);
4372 }
4373 // Check that no DebugBreak events occured during the context creation.
4374 CHECK_EQ(0, break_point_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (0), (break_point_hit_count
), "0" " " "==" " " "break_point_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4374, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
4375
4376 // Get rid of the debug event listener.
4377 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(isolate, nullptr);
4378 CheckDebuggerUnloaded(isolate);
4379}
4380
4381
4382static void NamedEnum(const v8::PropertyCallbackInfo<v8::Array>& info) {
4383 v8::Local<v8::Array> result = v8::Array::New(info.GetIsolate(), 3);
4384 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = info.GetIsolate()->GetCurrentContext();
4385 CHECK(result->Set(context, v8::Integer::New(info.GetIsolate(), 0),do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(result->Set(context, v8::Integer
::New(info.GetIsolate(), 0), v8_str(info.GetIsolate(), "a")) .
FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc",
4387, "Check failed: %s.", "result->Set(context, v8::Integer::New(info.GetIsolate(), 0), v8_str(info.GetIsolate(), \"a\")) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4386 v8_str(info.GetIsolate(), "a"))do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(result->Set(context, v8::Integer
::New(info.GetIsolate(), 0), v8_str(info.GetIsolate(), "a")) .
FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc",
4387, "Check failed: %s.", "result->Set(context, v8::Integer::New(info.GetIsolate(), 0), v8_str(info.GetIsolate(), \"a\")) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4387 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(result->Set(context, v8::Integer
::New(info.GetIsolate(), 0), v8_str(info.GetIsolate(), "a")) .
FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc",
4387, "Check failed: %s.", "result->Set(context, v8::Integer::New(info.GetIsolate(), 0), v8_str(info.GetIsolate(), \"a\")) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4388 CHECK(result->Set(context, v8::Integer::New(info.GetIsolate(), 1),do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(result->Set(context, v8::Integer
::New(info.GetIsolate(), 1), v8_str(info.GetIsolate(), "b")) .
FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc",
4390, "Check failed: %s.", "result->Set(context, v8::Integer::New(info.GetIsolate(), 1), v8_str(info.GetIsolate(), \"b\")) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4389 v8_str(info.GetIsolate(), "b"))do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(result->Set(context, v8::Integer
::New(info.GetIsolate(), 1), v8_str(info.GetIsolate(), "b")) .
FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc",
4390, "Check failed: %s.", "result->Set(context, v8::Integer::New(info.GetIsolate(), 1), v8_str(info.GetIsolate(), \"b\")) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4390 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(result->Set(context, v8::Integer
::New(info.GetIsolate(), 1), v8_str(info.GetIsolate(), "b")) .
FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc",
4390, "Check failed: %s.", "result->Set(context, v8::Integer::New(info.GetIsolate(), 1), v8_str(info.GetIsolate(), \"b\")) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4391 CHECK(result->Set(context, v8::Integer::New(info.GetIsolate(), 2),do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(result->Set(context, v8::Integer
::New(info.GetIsolate(), 2), v8_str(info.GetIsolate(), "c")) .
FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc",
4393, "Check failed: %s.", "result->Set(context, v8::Integer::New(info.GetIsolate(), 2), v8_str(info.GetIsolate(), \"c\")) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4392 v8_str(info.GetIsolate(), "c"))do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(result->Set(context, v8::Integer
::New(info.GetIsolate(), 2), v8_str(info.GetIsolate(), "c")) .
FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc",
4393, "Check failed: %s.", "result->Set(context, v8::Integer::New(info.GetIsolate(), 2), v8_str(info.GetIsolate(), \"c\")) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4393 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(result->Set(context, v8::Integer
::New(info.GetIsolate(), 2), v8_str(info.GetIsolate(), "c")) .
FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc",
4393, "Check failed: %s.", "result->Set(context, v8::Integer::New(info.GetIsolate(), 2), v8_str(info.GetIsolate(), \"c\")) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4394 info.GetReturnValue().Set(result);
4395}
4396
4397
4398static void IndexedEnum(const v8::PropertyCallbackInfo<v8::Array>& info) {
4399 v8::Isolate* isolate = info.GetIsolate();
4400 v8::Local<v8::Array> result = v8::Array::New(isolate, 2);
4401 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = info.GetIsolate()->GetCurrentContext();
4402 CHECK(result->Set(context, v8::Integer::New(isolate, 0),do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(result->Set(context, v8::Integer
::New(isolate, 0), v8::Number::New(isolate, 1)) .FromJust()))
, 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4404, "Check failed: %s."
, "result->Set(context, v8::Integer::New(isolate, 0), v8::Number::New(isolate, 1)) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4403 v8::Number::New(isolate, 1))do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(result->Set(context, v8::Integer
::New(isolate, 0), v8::Number::New(isolate, 1)) .FromJust()))
, 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4404, "Check failed: %s."
, "result->Set(context, v8::Integer::New(isolate, 0), v8::Number::New(isolate, 1)) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4404 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(result->Set(context, v8::Integer
::New(isolate, 0), v8::Number::New(isolate, 1)) .FromJust()))
, 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4404, "Check failed: %s."
, "result->Set(context, v8::Integer::New(isolate, 0), v8::Number::New(isolate, 1)) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4405 CHECK(result->Set(context, v8::Integer::New(isolate, 1),do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(result->Set(context, v8::Integer
::New(isolate, 1), v8::Number::New(isolate, 10)) .FromJust())
), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4407, "Check failed: %s."
, "result->Set(context, v8::Integer::New(isolate, 1), v8::Number::New(isolate, 10)) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4406 v8::Number::New(isolate, 10))do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(result->Set(context, v8::Integer
::New(isolate, 1), v8::Number::New(isolate, 10)) .FromJust())
), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4407, "Check failed: %s."
, "result->Set(context, v8::Integer::New(isolate, 1), v8::Number::New(isolate, 10)) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4407 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(result->Set(context, v8::Integer
::New(isolate, 1), v8::Number::New(isolate, 10)) .FromJust())
), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4407, "Check failed: %s."
, "result->Set(context, v8::Integer::New(isolate, 1), v8::Number::New(isolate, 10)) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4408 info.GetReturnValue().Set(result);
4409}
4410
4411
4412static void NamedGetter(v8::Local<v8::Name> name,
4413 const v8::PropertyCallbackInfo<v8::Value>& info) {
4414 if (name->IsSymbol()) return;
4415 v8::String::Utf8Value n(v8::Local<v8::String>::Cast(name));
4416 if (strcmp(*n, "a") == 0) {
4417 info.GetReturnValue().Set(v8_str(info.GetIsolate(), "AA"));
4418 return;
4419 } else if (strcmp(*n, "b") == 0) {
4420 info.GetReturnValue().Set(v8_str(info.GetIsolate(), "BB"));
4421 return;
4422 } else if (strcmp(*n, "c") == 0) {
4423 info.GetReturnValue().Set(v8_str(info.GetIsolate(), "CC"));
4424 return;
4425 } else {
4426 info.GetReturnValue().SetUndefined();
4427 return;
4428 }
4429 info.GetReturnValue().Set(name);
4430}
4431
4432
4433static void IndexedGetter(uint32_t index,
4434 const v8::PropertyCallbackInfo<v8::Value>& info) {
4435 info.GetReturnValue().Set(static_cast<double>(index + 1));
4436}
4437
4438
4439TEST(InterceptorPropertyMirror)static void TestInterceptorPropertyMirror(); CcTest register_test_InterceptorPropertyMirror
(TestInterceptorPropertyMirror, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, "InterceptorPropertyMirror", __null, true, true); static void
TestInterceptorPropertyMirror() {
4440 // Create a V8 environment with debug access.
4441 DebugLocalContext env;
4442 v8::Isolate* isolate = env->GetIsolate();
4443 v8::HandleScope scope(isolate);
4444 env.ExposeDebug();
4445
4446 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = env.context();
4447 // Create object with named interceptor.
4448 v8::Local<v8::ObjectTemplate> named = v8::ObjectTemplate::New(isolate);
4449 named->SetHandler(v8::NamedPropertyHandlerConfiguration(
4450 NamedGetter, NULL__null, NULL__null, NULL__null, NamedEnum));
4451 CHECK(env->Global()do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str(isolate, "intercepted_named"), named->NewInstance
(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4454, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"intercepted_named\"), named->NewInstance(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4452 ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, "intercepted_named"),do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str(isolate, "intercepted_named"), named->NewInstance
(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4454, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"intercepted_named\"), named->NewInstance(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4453 named->NewInstance(context).ToLocalChecked())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str(isolate, "intercepted_named"), named->NewInstance
(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4454, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"intercepted_named\"), named->NewInstance(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4454 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str(isolate, "intercepted_named"), named->NewInstance
(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4454, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"intercepted_named\"), named->NewInstance(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4455
4456 // Create object with indexed interceptor.
4457 v8::Local<v8::ObjectTemplate> indexed = v8::ObjectTemplate::New(isolate);
4458 indexed->SetHandler(v8::IndexedPropertyHandlerConfiguration(
4459 IndexedGetter, NULL__null, NULL__null, NULL__null, IndexedEnum));
4460 CHECK(env->Global()do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str(isolate, "intercepted_indexed"), indexed->NewInstance
(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4463, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"intercepted_indexed\"), indexed->NewInstance(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4461 ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, "intercepted_indexed"),do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str(isolate, "intercepted_indexed"), indexed->NewInstance
(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4463, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"intercepted_indexed\"), indexed->NewInstance(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4462 indexed->NewInstance(context).ToLocalChecked())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str(isolate, "intercepted_indexed"), indexed->NewInstance
(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4463, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"intercepted_indexed\"), indexed->NewInstance(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4463 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str(isolate, "intercepted_indexed"), indexed->NewInstance
(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4463, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"intercepted_indexed\"), indexed->NewInstance(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4464
4465 // Create object with both named and indexed interceptor.
4466 v8::Local<v8::ObjectTemplate> both = v8::ObjectTemplate::New(isolate);
4467 both->SetHandler(v8::NamedPropertyHandlerConfiguration(
4468 NamedGetter, NULL__null, NULL__null, NULL__null, NamedEnum));
4469 both->SetHandler(v8::IndexedPropertyHandlerConfiguration(
4470 IndexedGetter, NULL__null, NULL__null, NULL__null, IndexedEnum));
4471 CHECK(env->Global()do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str(isolate, "intercepted_both"), both->NewInstance(context
).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4474, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"intercepted_both\"), both->NewInstance(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4472 ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, "intercepted_both"),do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str(isolate, "intercepted_both"), both->NewInstance(context
).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4474, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"intercepted_both\"), both->NewInstance(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4473 both->NewInstance(context).ToLocalChecked())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str(isolate, "intercepted_both"), both->NewInstance(context
).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4474, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"intercepted_both\"), both->NewInstance(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4474 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str(isolate, "intercepted_both"), both->NewInstance(context
).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4474, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"intercepted_both\"), both->NewInstance(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4475
4476 // Get mirrors for the three objects with interceptor.
4477 CompileRun(
4478 "var named_mirror = debug.MakeMirror(intercepted_named);"
4479 "var indexed_mirror = debug.MakeMirror(intercepted_indexed);"
4480 "var both_mirror = debug.MakeMirror(intercepted_both)");
4481 CHECK(CompileRun("named_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror")do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("named_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4483, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"named_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4482 ->BooleanValue(context)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("named_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4483, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"named_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4483 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("named_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4483, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"named_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4484 CHECK(CompileRun("indexed_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror")do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("indexed_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4486, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"indexed_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4485 ->BooleanValue(context)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("indexed_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4486, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"indexed_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4486 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("indexed_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4486, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"indexed_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4487 CHECK(CompileRun("both_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror")do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("both_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4489, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"both_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4488 ->BooleanValue(context)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("both_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4489, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"both_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4489 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("both_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4489, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"both_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4490
4491 // Get the property names from the interceptors
4492 CompileRun(
4493 "named_names = named_mirror.propertyNames();"
4494 "indexed_names = indexed_mirror.propertyNames();"
4495 "both_names = both_mirror.propertyNames()");
4496 CHECK_EQ(3, CompileRun("named_names.length")->Int32Value(context).FromJust())do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (3), (CompileRun
("named_names.length")->Int32Value(context).FromJust()), "3"
" " "==" " " "CompileRun(\"named_names.length\")->Int32Value(context).FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4496, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
4497 CHECK_EQ(2,do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (2), (CompileRun
("indexed_names.length")->Int32Value(context).FromJust()),
"2" " " "==" " " "CompileRun(\"indexed_names.length\")->Int32Value(context).FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4498, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0)
4498 CompileRun("indexed_names.length")->Int32Value(context).FromJust())do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (2), (CompileRun
("indexed_names.length")->Int32Value(context).FromJust()),
"2" " " "==" " " "CompileRun(\"indexed_names.length\")->Int32Value(context).FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4498, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
4499 CHECK_EQ(5, CompileRun("both_names.length")->Int32Value(context).FromJust())do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (5), (CompileRun
("both_names.length")->Int32Value(context).FromJust()), "5"
" " "==" " " "CompileRun(\"both_names.length\")->Int32Value(context).FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4499, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
4500
4501 // Check the expected number of properties.
4502 const char* source;
4503 source = "named_mirror.properties().length";
4504 CHECK_EQ(3, CompileRun(source)->Int32Value(context).FromJust())do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (3), (CompileRun
(source)->Int32Value(context).FromJust()), "3" " " "==" " "
"CompileRun(source)->Int32Value(context).FromJust()")) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4504, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
4505
4506 source = "indexed_mirror.properties().length";
4507 CHECK_EQ(2, CompileRun(source)->Int32Value(context).FromJust())do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (2), (CompileRun
(source)->Int32Value(context).FromJust()), "2" " " "==" " "
"CompileRun(source)->Int32Value(context).FromJust()")) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4507, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
4508
4509 source = "both_mirror.properties().length";
4510 CHECK_EQ(5, CompileRun(source)->Int32Value(context).FromJust())do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (5), (CompileRun
(source)->Int32Value(context).FromJust()), "5" " " "==" " "
"CompileRun(source)->Int32Value(context).FromJust()")) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4510, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
4511
4512 // Get the interceptor properties for the object with only named interceptor.
4513 CompileRun("var named_values = named_mirror.properties()");
4514
4515 // Check that the properties are interceptor properties.
4516 for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
4517 EmbeddedVector<char, SMALL_STRING_BUFFER_SIZE80> buffer;
4518 SNPrintF(buffer,
4519 "named_values[%d] instanceof debug.PropertyMirror", i);
4520 CHECK(CompileRun(buffer.start())->BooleanValue(context).FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun(buffer.start())->
BooleanValue(context).FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4520, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(buffer.start())->BooleanValue(context).FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4521
4522 SNPrintF(buffer, "named_values[%d].isNative()", i);
4523 CHECK(CompileRun(buffer.start())->BooleanValue(context).FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun(buffer.start())->
BooleanValue(context).FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4523, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(buffer.start())->BooleanValue(context).FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4524 }
4525
4526 // Get the interceptor properties for the object with only indexed
4527 // interceptor.
4528 CompileRun("var indexed_values = indexed_mirror.properties()");
4529
4530 // Check that the properties are interceptor properties.
4531 for (int i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
4532 EmbeddedVector<char, SMALL_STRING_BUFFER_SIZE80> buffer;
4533 SNPrintF(buffer,
4534 "indexed_values[%d] instanceof debug.PropertyMirror", i);
4535 CHECK(CompileRun(buffer.start())->BooleanValue(context).FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun(buffer.start())->
BooleanValue(context).FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4535, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(buffer.start())->BooleanValue(context).FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4536 }
4537
4538 // Get the interceptor properties for the object with both types of
4539 // interceptors.
4540 CompileRun("var both_values = both_mirror.properties()");
4541
4542 // Check that the properties are interceptor properties.
4543 for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
4544 EmbeddedVector<char, SMALL_STRING_BUFFER_SIZE80> buffer;
4545 SNPrintF(buffer, "both_values[%d] instanceof debug.PropertyMirror", i);
4546 CHECK(CompileRun(buffer.start())->BooleanValue(context).FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun(buffer.start())->
BooleanValue(context).FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4546, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(buffer.start())->BooleanValue(context).FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4547 }
4548
4549 // Check the property names.
4550 source = "both_values[0].name() == '1'";
4551 CHECK(CompileRun(source)->BooleanValue(context).FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun(source)->BooleanValue
(context).FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4551, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(source)->BooleanValue(context).FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4552
4553 source = "both_values[1].name() == '10'";
4554 CHECK(CompileRun(source)->BooleanValue(context).FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun(source)->BooleanValue
(context).FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4554, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(source)->BooleanValue(context).FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4555
4556 source = "both_values[2].name() == 'a'";
4557 CHECK(CompileRun(source)->BooleanValue(context).FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun(source)->BooleanValue
(context).FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4557, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(source)->BooleanValue(context).FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4558
4559 source = "both_values[3].name() == 'b'";
4560 CHECK(CompileRun(source)->BooleanValue(context).FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun(source)->BooleanValue
(context).FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4560, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(source)->BooleanValue(context).FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4561
4562 source = "both_values[4].name() == 'c'";
4563 CHECK(CompileRun(source)->BooleanValue(context).FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun(source)->BooleanValue
(context).FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4563, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(source)->BooleanValue(context).FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4564}
4565
4566
4567TEST(HiddenPrototypePropertyMirror)static void TestHiddenPrototypePropertyMirror(); CcTest register_test_HiddenPrototypePropertyMirror
(TestHiddenPrototypePropertyMirror, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, "HiddenPrototypePropertyMirror", __null, true, true); static
void TestHiddenPrototypePropertyMirror() {
4568 // Create a V8 environment with debug access.
4569 DebugLocalContext env;
4570 v8::Isolate* isolate = env->GetIsolate();
4571 v8::HandleScope scope(isolate);
4572 env.ExposeDebug();
4573
4574 v8::Local<v8::FunctionTemplate> t0 = v8::FunctionTemplate::New(isolate);
4575 t0->InstanceTemplate()->Set(v8_str(isolate, "x"),
4576 v8::Number::New(isolate, 0));
4577 v8::Local<v8::FunctionTemplate> t1 = v8::FunctionTemplate::New(isolate);
4578 t1->SetHiddenPrototype(true);
4579 t1->InstanceTemplate()->Set(v8_str(isolate, "y"),
4580 v8::Number::New(isolate, 1));
4581 v8::Local<v8::FunctionTemplate> t2 = v8::FunctionTemplate::New(isolate);
4582 t2->SetHiddenPrototype(true);
4583 t2->InstanceTemplate()->Set(v8_str(isolate, "z"),
4584 v8::Number::New(isolate, 2));
4585 v8::Local<v8::FunctionTemplate> t3 = v8::FunctionTemplate::New(isolate);
4586 t3->InstanceTemplate()->Set(v8_str(isolate, "u"),
4587 v8::Number::New(isolate, 3));
4588
4589 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = env.context();
4590 // Create object and set them on the global object.
4591 v8::Local<v8::Object> o0 = t0->GetFunction(context)
4592 .ToLocalChecked()
4593 ->NewInstance(context)
4594 .ToLocalChecked();
4595 CHECK(env->Global()->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, "o0"), o0).FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global()->Set(context
, v8_str(isolate, "o0"), o0).FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4595, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global()->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"o0\"), o0).FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4596 v8::Local<v8::Object> o1 = t1->GetFunction(context)
4597 .ToLocalChecked()
4598 ->NewInstance(context)
4599 .ToLocalChecked();
4600 CHECK(env->Global()->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, "o1"), o1).FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global()->Set(context
, v8_str(isolate, "o1"), o1).FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4600, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global()->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"o1\"), o1).FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4601 v8::Local<v8::Object> o2 = t2->GetFunction(context)
4602 .ToLocalChecked()
4603 ->NewInstance(context)
4604 .ToLocalChecked();
4605 CHECK(env->Global()->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, "o2"), o2).FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global()->Set(context
, v8_str(isolate, "o2"), o2).FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4605, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global()->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"o2\"), o2).FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4606 v8::Local<v8::Object> o3 = t3->GetFunction(context)
4607 .ToLocalChecked()
4608 ->NewInstance(context)
4609 .ToLocalChecked();
4610 CHECK(env->Global()->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, "o3"), o3).FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global()->Set(context
, v8_str(isolate, "o3"), o3).FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4610, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global()->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"o3\"), o3).FromJust()"
); } } while (0);

4612 // Get mirrors for the four objects.
4613 CompileRun(
4614 "var o0_mirror = debug.MakeMirror(o0);"
4615 "var o1_mirror = debug.MakeMirror(o1);"
4616 "var o2_mirror = debug.MakeMirror(o2);"
4617 "var o3_mirror = debug.MakeMirror(o3)");

) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"

); } } while (0)
