)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4673, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
4674
4675 // Set o3 as prototype for o0 (it will end up after o1 and o2 as both o1 and
4676 // o2 has the hidden prototype flag. o3 does not have the hidden prototype
4677 // flag so properties on o3 should not be seen on o0 whereas the properties
4678 // from o1 and o2 should still be seen on o0.
4679 // Final prototype chain: o0 -> o1 -> o2 -> o3
4680 // Hidden prototypes: ^^ ^^
4681 CHECK(o0->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, "__proto__"), o3).FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(o0->Set(context, v8_str(isolate
, "__proto__"), o3).FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4681, "Check failed: %s.", "o0->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"__proto__\"), o3).FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4682 CHECK_EQ(3, CompileRun("o0_mirror.propertyNames().length")do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (3), (CompileRun
("o0_mirror.propertyNames().length") ->Int32Value(context)
.FromJust()), "3" " " "==" " " "CompileRun(\"o0_mirror.propertyNames().length\") ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4684, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0)
4683 ->Int32Value(context)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (3), (CompileRun
("o0_mirror.propertyNames().length") ->Int32Value(context)
.FromJust()), "3" " " "==" " " "CompileRun(\"o0_mirror.propertyNames().length\") ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4684, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0)
4684 .FromJust())do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (3), (CompileRun
("o0_mirror.propertyNames().length") ->Int32Value(context)
.FromJust()), "3" " " "==" " " "CompileRun(\"o0_mirror.propertyNames().length\") ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4684, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
4685 CHECK_EQ(1, CompileRun("o3_mirror.propertyNames().length")do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (CompileRun
("o3_mirror.propertyNames().length") ->Int32Value(context)
.FromJust()), "1" " " "==" " " "CompileRun(\"o3_mirror.propertyNames().length\") ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4687, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0)
4686 ->Int32Value(context)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (CompileRun
("o3_mirror.propertyNames().length") ->Int32Value(context)
.FromJust()), "1" " " "==" " " "CompileRun(\"o3_mirror.propertyNames().length\") ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4687, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0)
4687 .FromJust())do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (CompileRun
("o3_mirror.propertyNames().length") ->Int32Value(context)
.FromJust()), "1" " " "==" " " "CompileRun(\"o3_mirror.propertyNames().length\") ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4687, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
4688 CHECK_EQ(0, CompileRun("o0_mirror.property('x').value().value()")do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (0), (CompileRun
("o0_mirror.property('x').value().value()") ->Int32Value(context
) .FromJust()), "0" " " "==" " " "CompileRun(\"o0_mirror.property('x').value().value()\") ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4690, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0)
4689 ->Int32Value(context)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (0), (CompileRun
("o0_mirror.property('x').value().value()") ->Int32Value(context
) .FromJust()), "0" " " "==" " " "CompileRun(\"o0_mirror.property('x').value().value()\") ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4690, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0)
4690 .FromJust())do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (0), (CompileRun
("o0_mirror.property('x').value().value()") ->Int32Value(context
) .FromJust()), "0" " " "==" " " "CompileRun(\"o0_mirror.property('x').value().value()\") ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4690, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
4691 CHECK_EQ(1, CompileRun("o0_mirror.property('y').value().value()")do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (CompileRun
("o0_mirror.property('y').value().value()") ->Int32Value(context
) .FromJust()), "1" " " "==" " " "CompileRun(\"o0_mirror.property('y').value().value()\") ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4693, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0)
4692 ->Int32Value(context)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (CompileRun
("o0_mirror.property('y').value().value()") ->Int32Value(context
) .FromJust()), "1" " " "==" " " "CompileRun(\"o0_mirror.property('y').value().value()\") ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4693, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0)
4693 .FromJust())do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (CompileRun
("o0_mirror.property('y').value().value()") ->Int32Value(context
) .FromJust()), "1" " " "==" " " "CompileRun(\"o0_mirror.property('y').value().value()\") ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4693, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
4694 CHECK_EQ(2, CompileRun("o0_mirror.property('z').value().value()")do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (2), (CompileRun
("o0_mirror.property('z').value().value()") ->Int32Value(context
) .FromJust()), "2" " " "==" " " "CompileRun(\"o0_mirror.property('z').value().value()\") ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4696, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0)
4695 ->Int32Value(context)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (2), (CompileRun
("o0_mirror.property('z').value().value()") ->Int32Value(context
) .FromJust()), "2" " " "==" " " "CompileRun(\"o0_mirror.property('z').value().value()\") ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4696, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0)
4696 .FromJust())do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (2), (CompileRun
("o0_mirror.property('z').value().value()") ->Int32Value(context
) .FromJust()), "2" " " "==" " " "CompileRun(\"o0_mirror.property('z').value().value()\") ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4696, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
4697 CHECK(CompileRun("o0_mirror.property('u').isUndefined()")do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("o0_mirror.property('u').isUndefined()"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4699, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"o0_mirror.property('u').isUndefined()\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4698 ->BooleanValue(context)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("o0_mirror.property('u').isUndefined()"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4699, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"o0_mirror.property('u').isUndefined()\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4699 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("o0_mirror.property('u').isUndefined()"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4699, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"o0_mirror.property('u').isUndefined()\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4700
4701 // The prototype (__proto__) for o0 should be o3 as o1 and o2 are hidden.
4702 CHECK(CompileRun("o0_mirror.protoObject() == o3_mirror")do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("o0_mirror.protoObject() == o3_mirror"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4704, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"o0_mirror.protoObject() == o3_mirror\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4703 ->BooleanValue(context)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("o0_mirror.protoObject() == o3_mirror"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4704, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"o0_mirror.protoObject() == o3_mirror\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4704 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("o0_mirror.protoObject() == o3_mirror"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4704, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"o0_mirror.protoObject() == o3_mirror\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4705}
4706
4707
4708static void ProtperyXNativeGetter(
4709 v8::Local<v8::String> property,
4710 const v8::PropertyCallbackInfo<v8::Value>& info) {
4711 info.GetReturnValue().Set(10);
4712}
4713
4714
4715TEST(NativeGetterPropertyMirror)static void TestNativeGetterPropertyMirror(); CcTest register_test_NativeGetterPropertyMirror
(TestNativeGetterPropertyMirror, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, "NativeGetterPropertyMirror", __null, true, true); static void
TestNativeGetterPropertyMirror() {
4716 // Create a V8 environment with debug access.
4717 DebugLocalContext env;
4718 v8::Isolate* isolate = env->GetIsolate();
4719 v8::HandleScope scope(isolate);
4720 env.ExposeDebug();
4721
4722 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = env.context();
4723 v8::Local<v8::String> name = v8_str(isolate, "x");
4724 // Create object with named accessor.
4725 v8::Local<v8::ObjectTemplate> named = v8::ObjectTemplate::New(isolate);
4726 named->SetAccessor(name, &ProtperyXNativeGetter, NULL__null, v8::Local<v8::Value>(),
4727 v8::DEFAULT, v8::None);
4728
4729 // Create object with named property getter.
4730 CHECK(env->Global()do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str(isolate, "instance"), named->NewInstance(context)
.ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4733, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"instance\"), named->NewInstance(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4731 ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, "instance"),do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str(isolate, "instance"), named->NewInstance(context)
.ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4733, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"instance\"), named->NewInstance(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4732 named->NewInstance(context).ToLocalChecked())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str(isolate, "instance"), named->NewInstance(context)
.ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4733, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"instance\"), named->NewInstance(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4733 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str(isolate, "instance"), named->NewInstance(context)
.ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4733, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"instance\"), named->NewInstance(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4734 CHECK_EQ(10, CompileRun("instance.x")->Int32Value(context).FromJust())do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (10), (
CompileRun("instance.x")->Int32Value(context).FromJust()),
"10" " " "==" " " "CompileRun(\"instance.x\")->Int32Value(context).FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4734, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
4735
4736 // Get mirror for the object with property getter.
4737 CompileRun("var instance_mirror = debug.MakeMirror(instance);");
4738 CHECK(CompileRun("instance_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror")do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("instance_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4740, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"instance_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4739 ->BooleanValue(context)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("instance_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4740, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"instance_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4740 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("instance_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4740, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"instance_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4741
4742 CompileRun("var named_names = instance_mirror.propertyNames();");
4743 CHECK_EQ(1, CompileRun("named_names.length")->Int32Value(context).FromJust())do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (CompileRun
("named_names.length")->Int32Value(context).FromJust()), "1"
" " "==" " " "CompileRun(\"named_names.length\")->Int32Value(context).FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4743, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
4744 CHECK(CompileRun("named_names[0] == 'x'")->BooleanValue(context).FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("named_names[0] == 'x'"
)->BooleanValue(context).FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4744, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"named_names[0] == 'x'\")->BooleanValue(context).FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4745 CHECK(CompileRun("instance_mirror.property('x').value().isNumber()")do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("instance_mirror.property('x').value().isNumber()"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4747, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"instance_mirror.property('x').value().isNumber()\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4746 ->BooleanValue(context)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("instance_mirror.property('x').value().isNumber()"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4747, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"instance_mirror.property('x').value().isNumber()\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4747 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("instance_mirror.property('x').value().isNumber()"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4747, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"instance_mirror.property('x').value().isNumber()\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4748 CHECK(CompileRun("instance_mirror.property('x').value().value() == 10")do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("instance_mirror.property('x').value().value() == 10"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4750, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"instance_mirror.property('x').value().value() == 10\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4749 ->BooleanValue(context)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("instance_mirror.property('x').value().value() == 10"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4750, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"instance_mirror.property('x').value().value() == 10\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4750 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("instance_mirror.property('x').value().value() == 10"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4750, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"instance_mirror.property('x').value().value() == 10\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4751}
4752
4753
4754static void ProtperyXNativeGetterThrowingError(
4755 v8::Local<v8::String> property,
4756 const v8::PropertyCallbackInfo<v8::Value>& info) {
4757 CompileRun("throw new Error('Error message');");
4758}
4759
4760
4761TEST(NativeGetterThrowingErrorPropertyMirror)static void TestNativeGetterThrowingErrorPropertyMirror(); CcTest
register_test_NativeGetterThrowingErrorPropertyMirror(TestNativeGetterThrowingErrorPropertyMirror
, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "NativeGetterThrowingErrorPropertyMirror"
, __null, true, true); static void TestNativeGetterThrowingErrorPropertyMirror
() {
4762 // Create a V8 environment with debug access.
4763 DebugLocalContext env;
4764 v8::Isolate* isolate = env->GetIsolate();
4765 v8::HandleScope scope(isolate);
4766 env.ExposeDebug();
4767
4768 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = env.context();
4769 v8::Local<v8::String> name = v8_str(isolate, "x");
4770 // Create object with named accessor.
4771 v8::Local<v8::ObjectTemplate> named = v8::ObjectTemplate::New(isolate);
4772 named->SetAccessor(name, &ProtperyXNativeGetterThrowingError, NULL__null,
4773 v8::Local<v8::Value>(), v8::DEFAULT, v8::None);
4774
4775 // Create object with named property getter.
4776 CHECK(env->Global()do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str(isolate, "instance"), named->NewInstance(context)
.ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4779, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"instance\"), named->NewInstance(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4777 ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, "instance"),do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str(isolate, "instance"), named->NewInstance(context)
.ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4779, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"instance\"), named->NewInstance(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4778 named->NewInstance(context).ToLocalChecked())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str(isolate, "instance"), named->NewInstance(context)
.ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4779, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"instance\"), named->NewInstance(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4779 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str(isolate, "instance"), named->NewInstance(context)
.ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4779, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"instance\"), named->NewInstance(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4780
4781 // Get mirror for the object with property getter.
4782 CompileRun("var instance_mirror = debug.MakeMirror(instance);");
4783 CHECK(CompileRun("instance_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror")do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("instance_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4785, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"instance_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4784 ->BooleanValue(context)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("instance_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4785, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"instance_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4785 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("instance_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4785, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"instance_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4786 CompileRun("named_names = instance_mirror.propertyNames();");
4787 CHECK_EQ(1, CompileRun("named_names.length")->Int32Value(context).FromJust())do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (CompileRun
("named_names.length")->Int32Value(context).FromJust()), "1"
" " "==" " " "CompileRun(\"named_names.length\")->Int32Value(context).FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4787, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
4788 CHECK(CompileRun("named_names[0] == 'x'")->BooleanValue(context).FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("named_names[0] == 'x'"
)->BooleanValue(context).FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4788, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"named_names[0] == 'x'\")->BooleanValue(context).FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4789 CHECK(CompileRun("instance_mirror.property('x').value().isError()")do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("instance_mirror.property('x').value().isError()"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4791, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"instance_mirror.property('x').value().isError()\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4790 ->BooleanValue(context)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("instance_mirror.property('x').value().isError()"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4791, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"instance_mirror.property('x').value().isError()\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4791 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("instance_mirror.property('x').value().isError()"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4791, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"instance_mirror.property('x').value().isError()\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4792
4793 // Check that the message is that passed to the Error constructor.
4794 CHECK(do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun( "instance_mirror.property('x').value().message() == 'Error message'"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4798, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun( \"instance_mirror.property('x').value().message() == 'Error message'\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4795 CompileRun(do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun( "instance_mirror.property('x').value().message() == 'Error message'"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4798, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun( \"instance_mirror.property('x').value().message() == 'Error message'\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4796 "instance_mirror.property('x').value().message() == 'Error message'")do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun( "instance_mirror.property('x').value().message() == 'Error message'"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4798, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun( \"instance_mirror.property('x').value().message() == 'Error message'\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4797 ->BooleanValue(context)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun( "instance_mirror.property('x').value().message() == 'Error message'"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4798, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun( \"instance_mirror.property('x').value().message() == 'Error message'\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4798 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun( "instance_mirror.property('x').value().message() == 'Error message'"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4798, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun( \"instance_mirror.property('x').value().message() == 'Error message'\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4799}
4800
4801
4802// Test that hidden properties object is not returned as an unnamed property
4803// among regular properties.
4804// See http://crbug.com/26491
4805TEST(NoHiddenProperties)static void TestNoHiddenProperties(); CcTest register_test_NoHiddenProperties
(TestNoHiddenProperties, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "NoHiddenProperties"
, __null, true, true); static void TestNoHiddenProperties() {
4806 // Create a V8 environment with debug access.
4807 DebugLocalContext env;
4808 v8::Isolate* isolate = env->GetIsolate();
4809 v8::HandleScope scope(isolate);
4810 env.ExposeDebug();
4811
4812 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = env.context();
4813 // Create an object in the global scope.
4814 const char* source = "var obj = {a: 1};";
4815 v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(isolate, source))
4816 .ToLocalChecked()
4817 ->Run(context)
4818 .ToLocalChecked();
4819 v8::Local<v8::Object> obj = v8::Local<v8::Object>::Cast(
4820 env->Global()->Get(context, v8_str(isolate, "obj")).ToLocalChecked());
4821 // Set a hidden property on the object.
4822 obj->SetPrivate(
4823 env.context(),
4824 v8::Private::New(isolate, v8_str(isolate, "v8::test-debug::a")),
4825 v8::Int32::New(isolate, 11))
4826 .FromJust();
4827
4828 // Get mirror for the object with property getter.
4829 CompileRun("var obj_mirror = debug.MakeMirror(obj);");
4830 CHECK(CompileRun("obj_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror")do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("obj_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4832, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"obj_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4831 ->BooleanValue(context)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("obj_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4832, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"obj_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4832 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("obj_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4832, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"obj_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4833 CompileRun("var named_names = obj_mirror.propertyNames();");
4834 // There should be exactly one property. But there is also an unnamed
4835 // property whose value is hidden properties dictionary. The latter
4836 // property should not be in the list of reguar properties.
4837 CHECK_EQ(1, CompileRun("named_names.length")->Int32Value(context).FromJust())do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (CompileRun
("named_names.length")->Int32Value(context).FromJust()), "1"
" " "==" " " "CompileRun(\"named_names.length\")->Int32Value(context).FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4837, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
4838 CHECK(CompileRun("named_names[0] == 'a'")->BooleanValue(context).FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("named_names[0] == 'a'"
)->BooleanValue(context).FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4838, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"named_names[0] == 'a'\")->BooleanValue(context).FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4839 CHECK(CompileRun("obj_mirror.property('a').value().value() == 1")do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("obj_mirror.property('a').value().value() == 1"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4841, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"obj_mirror.property('a').value().value() == 1\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4840 ->BooleanValue(context)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("obj_mirror.property('a').value().value() == 1"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4841, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"obj_mirror.property('a').value().value() == 1\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4841 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("obj_mirror.property('a').value().value() == 1"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4841, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"obj_mirror.property('a').value().value() == 1\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4842
4843 // Object created by t0 will become hidden prototype of object 'obj'.
4844 v8::Local<v8::FunctionTemplate> t0 = v8::FunctionTemplate::New(isolate);
4845 t0->InstanceTemplate()->Set(v8_str(isolate, "b"),
4846 v8::Number::New(isolate, 2));
4847 t0->SetHiddenPrototype(true);
4848 v8::Local<v8::FunctionTemplate> t1 = v8::FunctionTemplate::New(isolate);
4849 t1->InstanceTemplate()->Set(v8_str(isolate, "c"),
4850 v8::Number::New(isolate, 3));
4851
4852 // Create proto objects, add hidden properties to them and set them on
4853 // the global object.
4854 v8::Local<v8::Object> protoObj = t0->GetFunction(context)
4855 .ToLocalChecked()
4856 ->NewInstance(context)
4857 .ToLocalChecked();
4858 protoObj->SetPrivate(
4859 env.context(),
4860 v8::Private::New(isolate, v8_str(isolate, "v8::test-debug::b")),
4861 v8::Int32::New(isolate, 12))
4862 .FromJust();
4863 CHECK(env->Global()do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str(isolate, "protoObj"), protoObj) .FromJust())), 0))) {
V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4865, "Check failed: %s."
, "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"protoObj\"), protoObj) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4864 ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, "protoObj"), protoObj)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str(isolate, "protoObj"), protoObj) .FromJust())), 0))) {
V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4865, "Check failed: %s."
, "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"protoObj\"), protoObj) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4865 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str(isolate, "protoObj"), protoObj) .FromJust())), 0))) {
V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4865, "Check failed: %s."
, "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"protoObj\"), protoObj) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4866 v8::Local<v8::Object> grandProtoObj = t1->GetFunction(context)
4867 .ToLocalChecked()
4868 ->NewInstance(context)
4869 .ToLocalChecked();
4870 grandProtoObj->SetPrivate(env.context(),
4871 v8::Private::New(
4872 isolate, v8_str(isolate, "v8::test-debug::c")),
4873 v8::Int32::New(isolate, 13))
4874 .FromJust();
4875 CHECK(env->Global()do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str(isolate, "grandProtoObj"), grandProtoObj) .FromJust(
))), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4877, "Check failed: %s."
, "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"grandProtoObj\"), grandProtoObj) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4876 ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, "grandProtoObj"), grandProtoObj)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str(isolate, "grandProtoObj"), grandProtoObj) .FromJust(
))), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4877, "Check failed: %s."
, "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"grandProtoObj\"), grandProtoObj) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4877 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str(isolate, "grandProtoObj"), grandProtoObj) .FromJust(
))), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4877, "Check failed: %s."
, "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"grandProtoObj\"), grandProtoObj) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4878
4879 // Setting prototypes: obj->protoObj->grandProtoObj
4880 CHECK(protoObj->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, "__proto__"), grandProtoObj)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(protoObj->Set(context, v8_str
(isolate, "__proto__"), grandProtoObj) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4881, "Check failed: %s.", "protoObj->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"__proto__\"), grandProtoObj) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4881 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(protoObj->Set(context, v8_str
(isolate, "__proto__"), grandProtoObj) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4881, "Check failed: %s.", "protoObj->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"__proto__\"), grandProtoObj) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4882 CHECK(obj->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, "__proto__"), protoObj).FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(obj->Set(context, v8_str(isolate
, "__proto__"), protoObj).FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4882, "Check failed: %s.", "obj->Set(context, v8_str(isolate, \"__proto__\"), protoObj).FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4883
4884 // Get mirror for the object with property getter.
4885 CompileRun("var obj_mirror = debug.MakeMirror(obj);");
4886 CHECK(CompileRun("obj_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror")do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("obj_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4888, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"obj_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4887 ->BooleanValue(context)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("obj_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4888, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"obj_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4888 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("obj_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4888, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"obj_mirror instanceof debug.ObjectMirror\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4889 CompileRun("var named_names = obj_mirror.propertyNames();");
4890 // There should be exactly two properties - one from the object itself and
4891 // another from its hidden prototype.
4892 CHECK_EQ(2, CompileRun("named_names.length")->Int32Value(context).FromJust())do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (2), (CompileRun
("named_names.length")->Int32Value(context).FromJust()), "2"
" " "==" " " "CompileRun(\"named_names.length\")->Int32Value(context).FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4892, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
4893 CHECK(CompileRun("named_names.sort(); named_names[0] == 'a' &&"do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("named_names.sort(); named_names[0] == 'a' &&"
"named_names[1] == 'b'") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust
())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4896, "Check failed: %s."
, "CompileRun(\"named_names.sort(); named_names[0] == 'a' &&\" \"named_names[1] == 'b'\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4894 "named_names[1] == 'b'")do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("named_names.sort(); named_names[0] == 'a' &&"
"named_names[1] == 'b'") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust
())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4896, "Check failed: %s."
, "CompileRun(\"named_names.sort(); named_names[0] == 'a' &&\" \"named_names[1] == 'b'\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4895 ->BooleanValue(context)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("named_names.sort(); named_names[0] == 'a' &&"
"named_names[1] == 'b'") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust
())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4896, "Check failed: %s."
, "CompileRun(\"named_names.sort(); named_names[0] == 'a' &&\" \"named_names[1] == 'b'\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4896 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("named_names.sort(); named_names[0] == 'a' &&"
"named_names[1] == 'b'") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust
())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 4896, "Check failed: %s."
, "CompileRun(\"named_names.sort(); named_names[0] == 'a' &&\" \"named_names[1] == 'b'\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4897 CHECK(CompileRun("obj_mirror.property('a').value().value() == 1")do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("obj_mirror.property('a').value().value() == 1"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4899, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"obj_mirror.property('a').value().value() == 1\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4898 ->BooleanValue(context)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("obj_mirror.property('a').value().value() == 1"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4899, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"obj_mirror.property('a').value().value() == 1\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4899 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("obj_mirror.property('a').value().value() == 1"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4899, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"obj_mirror.property('a').value().value() == 1\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4900 CHECK(CompileRun("obj_mirror.property('b').value().value() == 2")do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("obj_mirror.property('b').value().value() == 2"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4902, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"obj_mirror.property('b').value().value() == 2\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4901 ->BooleanValue(context)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("obj_mirror.property('b').value().value() == 2"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4902, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"obj_mirror.property('b').value().value() == 2\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
4902 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("obj_mirror.property('b').value().value() == 2"
) ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4902, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"obj_mirror.property('b').value().value() == 2\") ->BooleanValue(context) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
4903}
4904
4905
4906// Multithreaded tests of JSON debugger protocol
4907
4908// Support classes
4909
4910// Provides synchronization between N threads, where N is a template parameter.
4911// The Wait() call blocks a thread until it is called for the Nth time, then all
4912// calls return. Each ThreadBarrier object can only be used once.
4913template <int N>
4914class ThreadBarrier final {
4915 public:
4916 ThreadBarrier() : num_blocked_(0) {}
4917
4918 ~ThreadBarrier() {
4919 LockGuard<Mutex> lock_guard(&mutex_);
4920 if (num_blocked_ != 0) {
4921 CHECK_EQ(N, num_blocked_)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (N), (num_blocked_
), "N" " " "==" " " "num_blocked_")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4921, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
4922 }
4923 }
4924
4925 void Wait() {
4926 LockGuard<Mutex> lock_guard(&mutex_);
4927 CHECK_LT(num_blocked_, N)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckLTImpl( (num_blocked_
), (N), "num_blocked_" " " "<" " " "N")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4927, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
4928 num_blocked_++;
4929 if (N == num_blocked_) {
4930 // Signal and unblock all waiting threads.
4931 cv_.NotifyAll();
4932 printf("BARRIER\n\n");
4933 fflush(stdoutstdout);
4934 } else { // Wait for the semaphore.
4935 while (num_blocked_ < N) {
4936 cv_.Wait(&mutex_);
4937 }
4938 }
4939 CHECK_EQ(N, num_blocked_)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (N), (num_blocked_
), "N" " " "==" " " "num_blocked_")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 4939, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
4940 }
4941
4942 private:
4943 ConditionVariable cv_;
4944 Mutex mutex_;
4945 int num_blocked_;
4946
4947 STATIC_ASSERT(N > 0)static_assert(N > 0, "N > 0");
4948
4949 DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN(ThreadBarrier)ThreadBarrier(const ThreadBarrier&) = delete; void operator
=(const ThreadBarrier&) = delete;
4950};
4951
4952
4953// A set containing enough barriers and semaphores for any of the tests.
4954class Barriers {
4955 public:
4956 Barriers() : semaphore_1(0), semaphore_2(0) {}
4957 ThreadBarrier<2> barrier_1;
4958 ThreadBarrier<2> barrier_2;
4959 ThreadBarrier<2> barrier_3;
4960 ThreadBarrier<2> barrier_4;
4961 ThreadBarrier<2> barrier_5;
4962 v8::base::Semaphore semaphore_1;
4963 v8::base::Semaphore semaphore_2;
4964};
4965
4966
4967// We match parts of the message to decide if it is a break message.
4968bool IsBreakEventMessage(char *message) {
4969 const char* type_event = "\"type\":\"event\"";
4970 const char* event_break = "\"event\":\"break\"";
4971 // Does the message contain both type:event and event:break?
4972 return strstr(message, type_event) != NULL__null &&
4973 strstr(message, event_break) != NULL__null;
4974}
4975
4976
4977// We match parts of the message to decide if it is a exception message.
4978bool IsExceptionEventMessage(char *message) {
4979 const char* type_event = "\"type\":\"event\"";
4980 const char* event_exception = "\"event\":\"exception\"";
4981 // Does the message contain both type:event and event:exception?
4982 return strstr(message, type_event) != NULL__null &&
4983 strstr(message, event_exception) != NULL__null;
4984}
4985
4986
4987// We match the message wether it is an evaluate response message.
4988bool IsEvaluateResponseMessage(char* message) {
4989 const char* type_response = "\"type\":\"response\"";
4990 const char* command_evaluate = "\"command\":\"evaluate\"";
4991 // Does the message contain both type:response and command:evaluate?
4992 return strstr(message, type_response) != NULL__null &&
4993 strstr(message, command_evaluate) != NULL__null;
4994}
4995
4996
4997static int StringToInt(const char* s) {
4998 return atoi(s); // NOLINT
4999}
5000
5001
5002// We match parts of the message to get evaluate result int value.
5003int GetEvaluateIntResult(char *message) {
5004 const char* value = "\"value\":";
5005 char* pos = strstr(message, value);
5006 if (pos == NULL__null) {
5007 return -1;
5008 }
5009 int res = -1;
5010 res = StringToInt(pos + strlen(value));
5011 return res;
5012}
5013
5014
5015// We match parts of the message to get hit breakpoint id.
5016int GetBreakpointIdFromBreakEventMessage(char *message) {
5017 const char* breakpoints = "\"breakpoints\":[";
5018 char* pos = strstr(message, breakpoints);
5019 if (pos == NULL__null) {
5020 return -1;
5021 }
5022 int res = -1;
5023 res = StringToInt(pos + strlen(breakpoints));
5024 return res;
5025}
5026
5027
5028// We match parts of the message to get total frames number.
5029int GetTotalFramesInt(char *message) {
5030 const char* prefix = "\"totalFrames\":";
5031 char* pos = strstr(message, prefix);
5032 if (pos == NULL__null) {
5033 return -1;
5034 }
5035 pos += strlen(prefix);
5036 int res = StringToInt(pos);
5037 return res;
5038}
5039
5040
5041// We match parts of the message to get source line.
5042int GetSourceLineFromBreakEventMessage(char *message) {
5043 const char* source_line = "\"sourceLine\":";
5044 char* pos = strstr(message, source_line);
5045 if (pos == NULL__null) {
5046 return -1;
5047 }
5048 int res = -1;
5049 res = StringToInt(pos + strlen(source_line));
5050 return res;
5051}
5052
5053
5054/* Test MessageQueues */
5055/* Tests the message queues that hold debugger commands and
5056 * response messages to the debugger. Fills queues and makes
5057 * them grow.
5058 */
5059Barriers message_queue_barriers;
5060
5061// This is the debugger thread, that executes no v8 calls except
5062// placing JSON debugger commands in the queue.
5063class MessageQueueDebuggerThread : public v8::base::Thread {
5064 public:
5065 MessageQueueDebuggerThread()
5066 : Thread(Options("MessageQueueDebuggerThread")) {}
5067 void Run();
5068};
5069
5070
5071static void MessageHandler(const v8::Debug::Message& message) {
5072 v8::Local<v8::String> json = message.GetJSON();
5073 v8::String::Utf8Value utf8(json);
5074 if (IsBreakEventMessage(*utf8)) {
5075 // Lets test script wait until break occurs to send commands.
5076 // Signals when a break is reported.
5077 message_queue_barriers.semaphore_2.Signal();
5078 }
5079
5080 // Allow message handler to block on a semaphore, to test queueing of
5081 // messages while blocked.
5082 message_queue_barriers.semaphore_1.Wait();
5083}
5084
5085
5086void MessageQueueDebuggerThread::Run() {
5087 const int kBufferSize = 1000;
5088 uint16_t buffer_1[kBufferSize];
5089 uint16_t buffer_2[kBufferSize];
5090 const char* command_1 =
5091 "{\"seq\":117,"
5092 "\"type\":\"request\","
5093 "\"command\":\"evaluate\","
5094 "\"arguments\":{\"expression\":\"1+2\"}}";
5095 const char* command_2 =
5096 "{\"seq\":118,"
5097 "\"type\":\"request\","
5098 "\"command\":\"evaluate\","
5099 "\"arguments\":{\"expression\":\"1+a\"}}";
5100 const char* command_3 =
5101 "{\"seq\":119,"
5102 "\"type\":\"request\","
5103 "\"command\":\"evaluate\","
5104 "\"arguments\":{\"expression\":\"c.d * b\"}}";
5105 const char* command_continue =
5106 "{\"seq\":106,"
5107 "\"type\":\"request\","
5108 "\"command\":\"continue\"}";
5109 const char* command_single_step =
5110 "{\"seq\":107,"
5111 "\"type\":\"request\","
5112 "\"command\":\"continue\","
5113 "\"arguments\":{\"stepaction\":\"next\"}}";
5114
5115 /* Interleaved sequence of actions by the two threads:*/
5116 // Main thread compiles and runs source_1
5117 message_queue_barriers.semaphore_1.Signal();
5118 message_queue_barriers.barrier_1.Wait();
5119 // Post 6 commands, filling the command queue and making it expand.
5120 // These calls return immediately, but the commands stay on the queue
5121 // until the execution of source_2.
5122 // Note: AsciiToUtf16 executes before SendCommand, so command is copied
5123 // to buffer before buffer is sent to SendCommand.
5124 v8::Isolate* isolate = CcTest::isolate();
5125 v8::Debug::SendCommand(isolate, buffer_1, AsciiToUtf16(command_1, buffer_1));
5126 v8::Debug::SendCommand(isolate, buffer_2, AsciiToUtf16(command_2, buffer_2));
5127 v8::Debug::SendCommand(isolate, buffer_2, AsciiToUtf16(command_3, buffer_2));
5128 v8::Debug::SendCommand(isolate, buffer_2, AsciiToUtf16(command_3, buffer_2));
5129 v8::Debug::SendCommand(isolate, buffer_2, AsciiToUtf16(command_3, buffer_2));
5130 message_queue_barriers.barrier_2.Wait();
5131 // Main thread compiles and runs source_2.
5132 // Queued commands are executed at the start of compilation of source_2(
5133 // beforeCompile event).
5134 // Free the message handler to process all the messages from the queue. 7
5135 // messages are expected: 2 afterCompile events and 5 responses.
5136 // All the commands added so far will fail to execute as long as call stack
5137 // is empty on beforeCompile event.
5138 for (int i = 0; i < 6 ; ++i) {
5139 message_queue_barriers.semaphore_1.Signal();
5140 }
5141 message_queue_barriers.barrier_3.Wait();
5142 // Main thread compiles and runs source_3.
5143 // Don't stop in the afterCompile handler.
5144 message_queue_barriers.semaphore_1.Signal();
5145 // source_3 includes a debugger statement, which causes a break event.
5146 // Wait on break event from hitting "debugger" statement
5147 message_queue_barriers.semaphore_2.Wait();
5148 // These should execute after the "debugger" statement in source_2
5149 v8::Debug::SendCommand(isolate, buffer_1, AsciiToUtf16(command_1, buffer_1));
5150 v8::Debug::SendCommand(isolate, buffer_2, AsciiToUtf16(command_2, buffer_2));
5151 v8::Debug::SendCommand(isolate, buffer_2, AsciiToUtf16(command_3, buffer_2));
5152 v8::Debug::SendCommand(
5153 isolate, buffer_2, AsciiToUtf16(command_single_step, buffer_2));
5154 // Run after 2 break events, 4 responses.
5155 for (int i = 0; i < 6 ; ++i) {
5156 message_queue_barriers.semaphore_1.Signal();
5157 }
5158 // Wait on break event after a single step executes.
5159 message_queue_barriers.semaphore_2.Wait();
5160 v8::Debug::SendCommand(isolate, buffer_1, AsciiToUtf16(command_2, buffer_1));
5161 v8::Debug::SendCommand(
5162 isolate, buffer_2, AsciiToUtf16(command_continue, buffer_2));
5163 // Run after 2 responses.
5164 for (int i = 0; i < 2 ; ++i) {
5165 message_queue_barriers.semaphore_1.Signal();
5166 }
5167 // Main thread continues running source_3 to end, waits for this thread.
5168}
5169
5170
5171// This thread runs the v8 engine.
5172TEST(MessageQueues)static void TestMessageQueues(); CcTest register_test_MessageQueues
(TestMessageQueues, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "MessageQueues"
, __null, true, true); static void TestMessageQueues() {
5173 MessageQueueDebuggerThread message_queue_debugger_thread;
5174
5175 // Create a V8 environment
5176 DebugLocalContext env;
5177 v8::HandleScope scope(env->GetIsolate());
5178 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(env->GetIsolate(), MessageHandler);
5179 message_queue_debugger_thread.Start();
5180
5181 const char* source_1 = "a = 3; b = 4; c = new Object(); c.d = 5;";
5182 const char* source_2 = "e = 17;";
5183 const char* source_3 = "a = 4; debugger; a = 5; a = 6; a = 7;";
5184
5185 // See MessageQueueDebuggerThread::Run for interleaved sequence of
5186 // API calls and events in the two threads.
5187 CompileRun(source_1);
5188 message_queue_barriers.barrier_1.Wait();
5189 message_queue_barriers.barrier_2.Wait();
5190 CompileRun(source_2);
5191 message_queue_barriers.barrier_3.Wait();
5192 CompileRun(source_3);
5193 message_queue_debugger_thread.Join();
5194 fflush(stdoutstdout);
5195}
5196
5197
5198class TestClientData : public v8::Debug::ClientData {
5199 public:
5200 TestClientData() {
5201 constructor_call_counter++;
5202 }
5203 virtual ~TestClientData() {
5204 destructor_call_counter++;
5205 }
5206
5207 static void ResetCounters() {
5208 constructor_call_counter = 0;
5209 destructor_call_counter = 0;
5210 }
5211
5212 static int constructor_call_counter;
5213 static int destructor_call_counter;
5214};
5215
5216int TestClientData::constructor_call_counter = 0;
5217int TestClientData::destructor_call_counter = 0;
5218
5219
5220// Tests that MessageQueue doesn't destroy client data when expands and
5221// does destroy when it dies.
5222TEST(MessageQueueExpandAndDestroy)static void TestMessageQueueExpandAndDestroy(); CcTest register_test_MessageQueueExpandAndDestroy
(TestMessageQueueExpandAndDestroy, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, "MessageQueueExpandAndDestroy", __null, true, true); static
void TestMessageQueueExpandAndDestroy() {
5223 TestClientData::ResetCounters();
5224 { // Create a scope for the queue.
5225 CommandMessageQueue queue(1);
5226 queue.Put(CommandMessage::New(Vector<uint16_t>::empty(),
5227 new TestClientData()));
5228 queue.Put(CommandMessage::New(Vector<uint16_t>::empty(),
5229 new TestClientData()));
5230 queue.Put(CommandMessage::New(Vector<uint16_t>::empty(),
5231 new TestClientData()));
5232 CHECK_EQ(0, TestClientData::destructor_call_counter)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (0), (TestClientData
::destructor_call_counter), "0" " " "==" " " "TestClientData::destructor_call_counter"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5232, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
5233 queue.Get().Dispose();
5234 CHECK_EQ(1, TestClientData::destructor_call_counter)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (TestClientData
::destructor_call_counter), "1" " " "==" " " "TestClientData::destructor_call_counter"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5234, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
5235 queue.Put(CommandMessage::New(Vector<uint16_t>::empty(),
5236 new TestClientData()));
5237 queue.Put(CommandMessage::New(Vector<uint16_t>::empty(),
5238 new TestClientData()));
5239 queue.Put(CommandMessage::New(Vector<uint16_t>::empty(),
5240 new TestClientData()));
5241 queue.Put(CommandMessage::New(Vector<uint16_t>::empty(),
5242 new TestClientData()));
5243 queue.Put(CommandMessage::New(Vector<uint16_t>::empty(),
5244 new TestClientData()));
5245 CHECK_EQ(1, TestClientData::destructor_call_counter)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (TestClientData
::destructor_call_counter), "1" " " "==" " " "TestClientData::destructor_call_counter"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5245, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
5246 queue.Get().Dispose();
5247 CHECK_EQ(2, TestClientData::destructor_call_counter)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (2), (TestClientData
::destructor_call_counter), "2" " " "==" " " "TestClientData::destructor_call_counter"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5247, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
5248 }
5249 // All the client data should be destroyed when the queue is destroyed.
5250 CHECK_EQ(TestClientData::destructor_call_counter,do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (TestClientData
::destructor_call_counter), (TestClientData::destructor_call_counter
), "TestClientData::destructor_call_counter" " " "==" " " "TestClientData::destructor_call_counter"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5251, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0)
5251 TestClientData::destructor_call_counter)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (TestClientData
::destructor_call_counter), (TestClientData::destructor_call_counter
), "TestClientData::destructor_call_counter" " " "==" " " "TestClientData::destructor_call_counter"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5251, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
5252}
5253
5254
5255static int handled_client_data_instances_count = 0;
5256static void MessageHandlerCountingClientData(
5257 const v8::Debug::Message& message) {
5258 if (message.GetClientData() != NULL__null) {
5259 handled_client_data_instances_count++;
5260 }
5261}
5262
5263
5264// Tests that all client data passed to the debugger are sent to the handler.
5265TEST(SendClientDataToHandler)static void TestSendClientDataToHandler(); CcTest register_test_SendClientDataToHandler
(TestSendClientDataToHandler, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc",
"SendClientDataToHandler", __null, true, true); static void TestSendClientDataToHandler
() {
5266 // Create a V8 environment
5267 DebugLocalContext env;
5268 v8::Isolate* isolate = env->GetIsolate();
5269 v8::HandleScope scope(isolate);
5270 TestClientData::ResetCounters();
5271 handled_client_data_instances_count = 0;
5272 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(isolate, MessageHandlerCountingClientData);
5273 const char* source_1 = "a = 3; b = 4; c = new Object(); c.d = 5;";
5274 const int kBufferSize = 1000;
5275 uint16_t buffer[kBufferSize];
5276 const char* command_1 =
5277 "{\"seq\":117,"
5278 "\"type\":\"request\","
5279 "\"command\":\"evaluate\","
5280 "\"arguments\":{\"expression\":\"1+2\"}}";
5281 const char* command_2 =
5282 "{\"seq\":118,"
5283 "\"type\":\"request\","
5284 "\"command\":\"evaluate\","
5285 "\"arguments\":{\"expression\":\"1+a\"}}";
5286 const char* command_continue =
5287 "{\"seq\":106,"
5288 "\"type\":\"request\","
5289 "\"command\":\"continue\"}";
5290
5291 v8::Debug::SendCommand(isolate, buffer, AsciiToUtf16(command_1, buffer),
5292 new TestClientData());
5293 v8::Debug::SendCommand(
5294 isolate, buffer, AsciiToUtf16(command_2, buffer), NULL__null);
5295 v8::Debug::SendCommand(isolate, buffer, AsciiToUtf16(command_2, buffer),
5296 new TestClientData());
5297 v8::Debug::SendCommand(isolate, buffer, AsciiToUtf16(command_2, buffer),
5298 new TestClientData());
5299 // All the messages will be processed on beforeCompile event.
5300 CompileRun(source_1);
5301 v8::Debug::SendCommand(
5302 isolate, buffer, AsciiToUtf16(command_continue, buffer));
5303 CHECK_EQ(3, TestClientData::constructor_call_counter)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (3), (TestClientData
::constructor_call_counter), "3" " " "==" " " "TestClientData::constructor_call_counter"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5303, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
5304 CHECK_EQ(TestClientData::constructor_call_counter,do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (TestClientData
::constructor_call_counter), (handled_client_data_instances_count
), "TestClientData::constructor_call_counter" " " "==" " " "handled_client_data_instances_count"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5305, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0)
5305 handled_client_data_instances_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (TestClientData
::constructor_call_counter), (handled_client_data_instances_count
), "TestClientData::constructor_call_counter" " " "==" " " "handled_client_data_instances_count"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5305, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
5306 CHECK_EQ(TestClientData::constructor_call_counter,do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (TestClientData
::constructor_call_counter), (TestClientData::destructor_call_counter
), "TestClientData::constructor_call_counter" " " "==" " " "TestClientData::destructor_call_counter"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5307, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0)
5307 TestClientData::destructor_call_counter)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (TestClientData
::constructor_call_counter), (TestClientData::destructor_call_counter
), "TestClientData::constructor_call_counter" " " "==" " " "TestClientData::destructor_call_counter"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5307, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
5308}
5309
5310
5311/* Test ThreadedDebugging */
5312/* This test interrupts a running infinite loop that is
5313 * occupying the v8 thread by a break command from the
5314 * debugger thread. It then changes the value of a
5315 * global object, to make the loop terminate.
5316 */
5317
5318Barriers threaded_debugging_barriers;
5319
5320class V8Thread : public v8::base::Thread {
5321 public:
5322 V8Thread() : Thread(Options("V8Thread")) {}
5323 void Run();
5324 v8::Isolate* isolate() { return isolate_; }
5325
5326 private:
5327 v8::Isolate* isolate_;
5328};
5329
5330class DebuggerThread : public v8::base::Thread {
5331 public:
5332 explicit DebuggerThread(v8::Isolate* isolate)
5333 : Thread(Options("DebuggerThread")), isolate_(isolate) {}
5334 void Run();
5335
5336 private:
5337 v8::Isolate* isolate_;
5338};
5339
5340
5341static void ThreadedAtBarrier1(
5342 const v8::FunctionCallbackInfo<v8::Value>& args) {
5343 threaded_debugging_barriers.barrier_1.Wait();
5344}
5345
5346
5347static void ThreadedMessageHandler(const v8::Debug::Message& message) {
5348 static char print_buffer[1000];
5349 v8::String::Value json(message.GetJSON());
5350 Utf16ToAscii(*json, json.length(), print_buffer);
5351 if (IsBreakEventMessage(print_buffer)) {
5352 // Check that we are inside the while loop.
5353 int source_line = GetSourceLineFromBreakEventMessage(print_buffer);
5354 CHECK(4 <= source_line && source_line <= 10)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(4 <= source_line &&
source_line <= 10)), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 5354, "Check failed: %s.", "4 <= source_line && source_line <= 10"
); } } while (0);
5355 threaded_debugging_barriers.barrier_2.Wait();
5356 }
5357}
5358
5359
5360void V8Thread::Run() {
5361 const char* source =
5362 "flag = true;\n"
5363 "\n"
5364 "function foo() {\n"
5365 " var x = 1;\n"
5366 " while ( flag == true ) {\n"
5367 " if ( x == 1 ) {\n"
5368 " ThreadedAtBarrier1();\n"
5369 " }\n"
5370 " x = x + 1;\n"
5371 " }\n"
5372 "}\n"
5373 "\n"
5374 "foo();\n";
5375
5376 v8::Isolate::CreateParams create_params;
5377 create_params.array_buffer_allocator = CcTest::array_buffer_allocator();
5378 isolate_ = v8::Isolate::New(create_params);
5379 threaded_debugging_barriers.barrier_3.Wait();
5380 {
5381 v8::Isolate::Scope isolate_scope(isolate_);
5382 DebugLocalContext env(isolate_);
5383 v8::HandleScope scope(isolate_);
5384 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(isolate_, &ThreadedMessageHandler);
5385 v8::Local<v8::ObjectTemplate> global_template =
5386 v8::ObjectTemplate::New(env->GetIsolate());
5387 global_template->Set(
5388 v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), "ThreadedAtBarrier1"),
5389 v8::FunctionTemplate::New(isolate_, ThreadedAtBarrier1));
5390 v8::Local<v8::Context> context =
5391 v8::Context::New(isolate_, NULL__null, global_template);
5392 v8::Context::Scope context_scope(context);
5393
5394 CompileRun(source);
5395 }
5396 threaded_debugging_barriers.barrier_4.Wait();
5397 isolate_->Dispose();
5398}
5399
5400
5401void DebuggerThread::Run() {
5402 const int kBufSize = 1000;
5403 uint16_t buffer[kBufSize];
5404
5405 const char* command_1 =
5406 "{\"seq\":102,"
5407 "\"type\":\"request\","
5408 "\"command\":\"evaluate\","
5409 "\"arguments\":{\"expression\":\"flag = false\"}}";
5410 const char* command_2 = "{\"seq\":103,"
5411 "\"type\":\"request\","
5412 "\"command\":\"continue\"}";
5413
5414 threaded_debugging_barriers.barrier_1.Wait();
5415 v8::Debug::DebugBreak(isolate_);
5416 threaded_debugging_barriers.barrier_2.Wait();
5417 v8::Debug::SendCommand(isolate_, buffer, AsciiToUtf16(command_1, buffer));
5418 v8::Debug::SendCommand(isolate_, buffer, AsciiToUtf16(command_2, buffer));
5419 threaded_debugging_barriers.barrier_4.Wait();
5420}
5421
5422
5423TEST(ThreadedDebugging)static void TestThreadedDebugging(); CcTest register_test_ThreadedDebugging
(TestThreadedDebugging, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "ThreadedDebugging"
, __null, true, true); static void TestThreadedDebugging() {
5424 V8Thread v8_thread;
5425
5426 // Create a V8 environment
5427 v8_thread.Start();
5428 threaded_debugging_barriers.barrier_3.Wait();
5429 DebuggerThread debugger_thread(v8_thread.isolate());
5430 debugger_thread.Start();
5431
5432 v8_thread.Join();
5433 debugger_thread.Join();
5434}
5435
5436
5437/* Test RecursiveBreakpoints */
5438/* In this test, the debugger evaluates a function with a breakpoint, after
5439 * hitting a breakpoint in another function. We do this with both values
5440 * of the flag enabling recursive breakpoints, and verify that the second
5441 * breakpoint is hit when enabled, and missed when disabled.
5442 */
5443
5444class BreakpointsV8Thread : public v8::base::Thread {
5445 public:
5446 BreakpointsV8Thread() : Thread(Options("BreakpointsV8Thread")) {}
5447 void Run();
5448
5449 v8::Isolate* isolate() { return isolate_; }
5450
5451 private:
5452 v8::Isolate* isolate_;
5453};
5454
5455class BreakpointsDebuggerThread : public v8::base::Thread {
5456 public:
5457 BreakpointsDebuggerThread(bool global_evaluate, v8::Isolate* isolate)
5458 : Thread(Options("BreakpointsDebuggerThread")),
5459 global_evaluate_(global_evaluate),
5460 isolate_(isolate) {}
5461 void Run();
5462
5463 private:
5464 bool global_evaluate_;
5465 v8::Isolate* isolate_;
5466};
5467
5468
5469Barriers* breakpoints_barriers;
5470int break_event_breakpoint_id;
5471int evaluate_int_result;
5472
5473static void BreakpointsMessageHandler(const v8::Debug::Message& message) {
5474 static char print_buffer[1000];
5475 v8::String::Value json(message.GetJSON());
5476 Utf16ToAscii(*json, json.length(), print_buffer);
5477
5478 if (IsBreakEventMessage(print_buffer)) {
5479 break_event_breakpoint_id =
5480 GetBreakpointIdFromBreakEventMessage(print_buffer);
5481 breakpoints_barriers->semaphore_1.Signal();
5482 } else if (IsEvaluateResponseMessage(print_buffer)) {
5483 evaluate_int_result = GetEvaluateIntResult(print_buffer);
5484 breakpoints_barriers->semaphore_1.Signal();
5485 }
5486}
5487
5488
5489void BreakpointsV8Thread::Run() {
5490 const char* source_1 = "var y_global = 3;\n"
5491 "function cat( new_value ) {\n"
5492 " var x = new_value;\n"
5493 " y_global = y_global + 4;\n"
5494 " x = 3 * x + 1;\n"
5495 " y_global = y_global + 5;\n"
5496 " return x;\n"
5497 "}\n"
5498 "\n"
5499 "function dog() {\n"
5500 " var x = 1;\n"
5501 " x = y_global;"
5502 " var z = 3;"
5503 " x += 100;\n"
5504 " return x;\n"
5505 "}\n"
5506 "\n";
5507 const char* source_2 = "cat(17);\n"
5508 "cat(19);\n";
5509
5510 v8::Isolate::CreateParams create_params;
5511 create_params.array_buffer_allocator = CcTest::array_buffer_allocator();
5512 isolate_ = v8::Isolate::New(create_params);
5513 breakpoints_barriers->barrier_3.Wait();
5514 {
5515 v8::Isolate::Scope isolate_scope(isolate_);
5516 DebugLocalContext env(isolate_);
5517 v8::HandleScope scope(isolate_);
5518 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(isolate_, &BreakpointsMessageHandler);
5519
5520 CompileRun(source_1);
5521 breakpoints_barriers->barrier_1.Wait();
5522 breakpoints_barriers->barrier_2.Wait();
5523 CompileRun(source_2);
5524 }
5525 breakpoints_barriers->barrier_4.Wait();
5526 isolate_->Dispose();
5527}
5528
5529
5530void BreakpointsDebuggerThread::Run() {
5531 const int kBufSize = 1000;
5532 uint16_t buffer[kBufSize];
5533
5534 const char* command_1 = "{\"seq\":101,"
5535 "\"type\":\"request\","
5536 "\"command\":\"setbreakpoint\","
5537 "\"arguments\":{\"type\":\"function\",\"target\":\"cat\",\"line\":3}}";
5538 const char* command_2 = "{\"seq\":102,"
5539 "\"type\":\"request\","
5540 "\"command\":\"setbreakpoint\","
5541 "\"arguments\":{\"type\":\"function\",\"target\":\"dog\",\"line\":3}}";
5542 const char* command_3;
5543 if (this->global_evaluate_) {
5544 command_3 = "{\"seq\":103,"
5545 "\"type\":\"request\","
5546 "\"command\":\"evaluate\","
5547 "\"arguments\":{\"expression\":\"dog()\",\"disable_break\":false,"
5548 "\"global\":true}}";
5549 } else {
5550 command_3 = "{\"seq\":103,"
5551 "\"type\":\"request\","
5552 "\"command\":\"evaluate\","
5553 "\"arguments\":{\"expression\":\"dog()\",\"disable_break\":false}}";
5554 }
5555 const char* command_4;
5556 if (this->global_evaluate_) {
5557 command_4 = "{\"seq\":104,"
5558 "\"type\":\"request\","
5559 "\"command\":\"evaluate\","
5560 "\"arguments\":{\"expression\":\"100 + 8\",\"disable_break\":true,"
5561 "\"global\":true}}";
5562 } else {
5563 command_4 = "{\"seq\":104,"
5564 "\"type\":\"request\","
5565 "\"command\":\"evaluate\","
5566 "\"arguments\":{\"expression\":\"x + 1\",\"disable_break\":true}}";
5567 }
5568 const char* command_5 = "{\"seq\":105,"
5569 "\"type\":\"request\","
5570 "\"command\":\"continue\"}";
5571 const char* command_6 = "{\"seq\":106,"
5572 "\"type\":\"request\","
5573 "\"command\":\"continue\"}";
5574 const char* command_7;
5575 if (this->global_evaluate_) {
5576 command_7 = "{\"seq\":107,"
5577 "\"type\":\"request\","
5578 "\"command\":\"evaluate\","
5579 "\"arguments\":{\"expression\":\"dog()\",\"disable_break\":true,"
5580 "\"global\":true}}";
5581 } else {
5582 command_7 = "{\"seq\":107,"
5583 "\"type\":\"request\","
5584 "\"command\":\"evaluate\","
5585 "\"arguments\":{\"expression\":\"dog()\",\"disable_break\":true}}";
5586 }
5587 const char* command_8 = "{\"seq\":108,"
5588 "\"type\":\"request\","
5589 "\"command\":\"continue\"}";
5590
5591
5592 // v8 thread initializes, runs source_1
5593 breakpoints_barriers->barrier_1.Wait();
5594 // 1:Set breakpoint in cat() (will get id 1).
5595 v8::Debug::SendCommand(isolate_, buffer, AsciiToUtf16(command_1, buffer));
5596 // 2:Set breakpoint in dog() (will get id 2).
5597 v8::Debug::SendCommand(isolate_, buffer, AsciiToUtf16(command_2, buffer));
5598 breakpoints_barriers->barrier_2.Wait();
5599 // V8 thread starts compiling source_2.
5600 // Automatic break happens, to run queued commands
5601 // breakpoints_barriers->semaphore_1.Wait();
5602 // Commands 1 through 3 run, thread continues.
5603 // v8 thread runs source_2 to breakpoint in cat().
5604 // message callback receives break event.
5605 breakpoints_barriers->semaphore_1.Wait();
5606 // Must have hit breakpoint #1.
5607 CHECK_EQ(1, break_event_breakpoint_id)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (break_event_breakpoint_id
), "1" " " "==" " " "break_event_breakpoint_id")) { V8_Fatal(
"../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5607, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
5608 // 4:Evaluate dog() (which has a breakpoint).
5609 v8::Debug::SendCommand(isolate_, buffer, AsciiToUtf16(command_3, buffer));
5610 // V8 thread hits breakpoint in dog().
5611 breakpoints_barriers->semaphore_1.Wait(); // wait for break event
5612 // Must have hit breakpoint #2.
5613 CHECK_EQ(2, break_event_breakpoint_id)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (2), (break_event_breakpoint_id
), "2" " " "==" " " "break_event_breakpoint_id")) { V8_Fatal(
"../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5613, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
5614 // 5:Evaluate (x + 1).
5615 v8::Debug::SendCommand(isolate_, buffer, AsciiToUtf16(command_4, buffer));
5616 // Evaluate (x + 1) finishes.
5617 breakpoints_barriers->semaphore_1.Wait();
5618 // Must have result 108.
5619 CHECK_EQ(108, evaluate_int_result)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (108), (
evaluate_int_result), "108" " " "==" " " "evaluate_int_result"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5619, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
5620 // 6:Continue evaluation of dog().
5621 v8::Debug::SendCommand(isolate_, buffer, AsciiToUtf16(command_5, buffer));
5622 // Evaluate dog() finishes.
5623 breakpoints_barriers->semaphore_1.Wait();
5624 // Must have result 107.
5625 CHECK_EQ(107, evaluate_int_result)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (107), (
evaluate_int_result), "107" " " "==" " " "evaluate_int_result"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5625, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
5626 // 7:Continue evaluation of source_2, finish cat(17), hit breakpoint
5627 // in cat(19).
5628 v8::Debug::SendCommand(isolate_, buffer, AsciiToUtf16(command_6, buffer));
5629 // Message callback gets break event.
5630 breakpoints_barriers->semaphore_1.Wait(); // wait for break event
5631 // Must have hit breakpoint #1.
5632 CHECK_EQ(1, break_event_breakpoint_id)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (break_event_breakpoint_id
), "1" " " "==" " " "break_event_breakpoint_id")) { V8_Fatal(
"../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5632, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
5633 // 8: Evaluate dog() with breaks disabled.
5634 v8::Debug::SendCommand(isolate_, buffer, AsciiToUtf16(command_7, buffer));
5635 // Evaluate dog() finishes.
5636 breakpoints_barriers->semaphore_1.Wait();
5637 // Must have result 116.
5638 CHECK_EQ(116, evaluate_int_result)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (116), (
evaluate_int_result), "116" " " "==" " " "evaluate_int_result"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5638, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
5639 // 9: Continue evaluation of source2, reach end.
5640 v8::Debug::SendCommand(isolate_, buffer, AsciiToUtf16(command_8, buffer));
5641 breakpoints_barriers->barrier_4.Wait();
5642}
5643
5644
5645void TestRecursiveBreakpointsGeneric(bool global_evaluate) {
5646 BreakpointsV8Thread breakpoints_v8_thread;
5647
5648 // Create a V8 environment
5649 Barriers stack_allocated_breakpoints_barriers;
5650 breakpoints_barriers = &stack_allocated_breakpoints_barriers;
5651
5652 breakpoints_v8_thread.Start();
5653 breakpoints_barriers->barrier_3.Wait();
5654 BreakpointsDebuggerThread breakpoints_debugger_thread(
5655 global_evaluate, breakpoints_v8_thread.isolate());
5656 breakpoints_debugger_thread.Start();
5657
5658 breakpoints_v8_thread.Join();
5659 breakpoints_debugger_thread.Join();
5660}
5661
5662
5663TEST(RecursiveBreakpoints)static void TestRecursiveBreakpoints(); CcTest register_test_RecursiveBreakpoints
(TestRecursiveBreakpoints, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "RecursiveBreakpoints"
, __null, true, true); static void TestRecursiveBreakpoints() {
5664 TestRecursiveBreakpointsGeneric(false);
5665}
5666
5667
5668TEST(RecursiveBreakpointsGlobal)static void TestRecursiveBreakpointsGlobal(); CcTest register_test_RecursiveBreakpointsGlobal
(TestRecursiveBreakpointsGlobal, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, "RecursiveBreakpointsGlobal", __null, true, true); static void
TestRecursiveBreakpointsGlobal() {
5669 TestRecursiveBreakpointsGeneric(true);
5670}

register_test_SetDebugEventListenerOnUninitializedVM(TestSetDebugEventListenerOnUninitializedVM
, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "SetDebugEventListenerOnUninitializedVM"
, __null, true, true); static void TestSetDebugEventListenerOnUninitializedVM
() {
5674 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(CcTest::isolate(), DummyDebugEventListener);
5675}

5677
5678static void DummyMessageHandler(const v8::Debug::Message& message) {
5679}

(TestSetMessageHandlerOnUninitializedVM, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, "SetMessageHandlerOnUninitializedVM", __null, true, true); static
void TestSetMessageHandlerOnUninitializedVM() {

5684}
5685
5686
5687// Source for a JavaScript function which returns the data parameter of a
5688// function called in the context of the debugger. If no data parameter is
5689// passed it throws an exception.
5690static const char* debugger_call_with_data_source =
5691 "function debugger_call_with_data(exec_state, data) {"
5692 " if (data) return data;"
5693 " throw 'No data!'"
5694 "}";
5695v8::Local<v8::Function> debugger_call_with_data;
5696
5697
5698// Source for a JavaScript function which returns the data parameter of a
5699// function called in the context of the debugger. If no data parameter is
5700// passed it throws an exception.
5701static const char* debugger_call_with_closure_source =
5702 "var x = 3;"
5703 "(function (exec_state) {"
5704 " if (exec_state.y) return x - 1;"
5705 " exec_state.y = x;"
5706 " return exec_state.y"
5707 "})";
5708v8::Local<v8::Function> debugger_call_with_closure;
5709
5710// Function to retrieve the number of JavaScript frames by calling a JavaScript
5711// in the debugger.
5712static void CheckFrameCount(const v8::FunctionCallbackInfo<v8::Value>& args) {
5713 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = args.GetIsolate()->GetCurrentContext();
5714 CHECK(v8::Debug::Call(context, frame_count).ToLocalChecked()->IsNumber())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Debug::Call(context, frame_count
).ToLocalChecked()->IsNumber())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 5714, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Debug::Call(context, frame_count).ToLocalChecked()->IsNumber()"
); } } while (0);
5715 CHECK_EQ(args[0]->Int32Value(context).FromJust(),do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (args[0
]->Int32Value(context).FromJust()), (v8::Debug::Call(context
, frame_count) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust
()), "args[0]->Int32Value(context).FromJust()" " " "==" " "
"v8::Debug::Call(context, frame_count) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5719, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0)
5716 v8::Debug::Call(context, frame_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (args[0
]->Int32Value(context).FromJust()), (v8::Debug::Call(context
, frame_count) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust
()), "args[0]->Int32Value(context).FromJust()" " " "==" " "
"v8::Debug::Call(context, frame_count) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5719, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0)
5717 .ToLocalChecked()do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (args[0
]->Int32Value(context).FromJust()), (v8::Debug::Call(context
, frame_count) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust
()), "args[0]->Int32Value(context).FromJust()" " " "==" " "
"v8::Debug::Call(context, frame_count) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5719, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0)
5718 ->Int32Value(context)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (args[0
]->Int32Value(context).FromJust()), (v8::Debug::Call(context
, frame_count) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust
()), "args[0]->Int32Value(context).FromJust()" " " "==" " "
"v8::Debug::Call(context, frame_count) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5719, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0)
5719 .FromJust())do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (args[0
]->Int32Value(context).FromJust()), (v8::Debug::Call(context
, frame_count) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust
()), "args[0]->Int32Value(context).FromJust()" " " "==" " "
"v8::Debug::Call(context, frame_count) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5719, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
5720}
5721
5722
5723// Function to retrieve the source line of the top JavaScript frame by calling a
5724// JavaScript function in the debugger.
5725static void CheckSourceLine(const v8::FunctionCallbackInfo<v8::Value>& args) {
5726 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = args.GetIsolate()->GetCurrentContext();
5727 CHECK(do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Debug::Call(context, frame_source_line
).ToLocalChecked()->IsNumber())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 5728, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Debug::Call(context, frame_source_line).ToLocalChecked()->IsNumber()"
); } } while (0)
5728 v8::Debug::Call(context, frame_source_line).ToLocalChecked()->IsNumber())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Debug::Call(context, frame_source_line
).ToLocalChecked()->IsNumber())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 5728, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Debug::Call(context, frame_source_line).ToLocalChecked()->IsNumber()"
); } } while (0);
5729 CHECK_EQ(args[0]->Int32Value(context).FromJust(),do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (args[0
]->Int32Value(context).FromJust()), (v8::Debug::Call(context
, frame_source_line) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context
) .FromJust()), "args[0]->Int32Value(context).FromJust()" " "
"==" " " "v8::Debug::Call(context, frame_source_line) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5733, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0)
5730 v8::Debug::Call(context, frame_source_line)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (args[0
]->Int32Value(context).FromJust()), (v8::Debug::Call(context
, frame_source_line) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context
) .FromJust()), "args[0]->Int32Value(context).FromJust()" " "
"==" " " "v8::Debug::Call(context, frame_source_line) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5733, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0)
5731 .ToLocalChecked()do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (args[0
]->Int32Value(context).FromJust()), (v8::Debug::Call(context
, frame_source_line) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context
