) .FromJust()), "args[0]->Int32Value(context).FromJust()" " "
"==" " " "v8::Debug::Call(context, frame_source_line) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5733, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0)
5732 ->Int32Value(context)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (args[0
]->Int32Value(context).FromJust()), (v8::Debug::Call(context
, frame_source_line) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context
) .FromJust()), "args[0]->Int32Value(context).FromJust()" " "
"==" " " "v8::Debug::Call(context, frame_source_line) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5733, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0)
5733 .FromJust())do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (args[0
]->Int32Value(context).FromJust()), (v8::Debug::Call(context
, frame_source_line) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context
) .FromJust()), "args[0]->Int32Value(context).FromJust()" " "
"==" " " "v8::Debug::Call(context, frame_source_line) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5733, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
5734}
5735
5736
5737// Function to test passing an additional parameter to a JavaScript function
5738// called in the debugger. It also tests that functions called in the debugger
5739// can throw exceptions.
5740static void CheckDataParameter(
5741 const v8::FunctionCallbackInfo<v8::Value>& args) {
5742 v8::Local<v8::String> data = v8_str(args.GetIsolate(), "Test");
5743 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = args.GetIsolate()->GetCurrentContext();
5744 CHECK(v8::Debug::Call(context, debugger_call_with_data, data)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Debug::Call(context, debugger_call_with_data
, data) .ToLocalChecked() ->IsString())), 0))) { V8_Fatal(
"../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5746, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Debug::Call(context, debugger_call_with_data, data) .ToLocalChecked() ->IsString()"
); } } while (0)
5745 .ToLocalChecked()do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Debug::Call(context, debugger_call_with_data
, data) .ToLocalChecked() ->IsString())), 0))) { V8_Fatal(
"../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5746, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Debug::Call(context, debugger_call_with_data, data) .ToLocalChecked() ->IsString()"
); } } while (0)
5746 ->IsString())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Debug::Call(context, debugger_call_with_data
, data) .ToLocalChecked() ->IsString())), 0))) { V8_Fatal(
"../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5746, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Debug::Call(context, debugger_call_with_data, data) .ToLocalChecked() ->IsString()"
); } } while (0);
5747
5748 for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
5749 v8::TryCatch catcher(args.GetIsolate());
5750 CHECK(v8::Debug::Call(context, debugger_call_with_data).IsEmpty())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Debug::Call(context, debugger_call_with_data
).IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 5750, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Debug::Call(context, debugger_call_with_data).IsEmpty()"
); } } while (0);
5751 CHECK(catcher.HasCaught())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(catcher.HasCaught())), 0))) {
V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5751, "Check failed: %s."
, "catcher.HasCaught()"); } } while (0);
5752 CHECK(catcher.Exception()->IsString())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(catcher.Exception()->IsString
())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5752, "Check failed: %s."
, "catcher.Exception()->IsString()"); } } while (0);
5753 }
5754}
5755
5756
5757// Function to test using a JavaScript with closure in the debugger.
5758static void CheckClosure(const v8::FunctionCallbackInfo<v8::Value>& args) {
5759 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = args.GetIsolate()->GetCurrentContext();
5760 CHECK(v8::Debug::Call(context, debugger_call_with_closure)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Debug::Call(context, debugger_call_with_closure
) .ToLocalChecked() ->IsNumber())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 5762, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Debug::Call(context, debugger_call_with_closure) .ToLocalChecked() ->IsNumber()"
); } } while (0)
5761 .ToLocalChecked()do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Debug::Call(context, debugger_call_with_closure
) .ToLocalChecked() ->IsNumber())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 5762, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Debug::Call(context, debugger_call_with_closure) .ToLocalChecked() ->IsNumber()"
); } } while (0)
5762 ->IsNumber())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Debug::Call(context, debugger_call_with_closure
) .ToLocalChecked() ->IsNumber())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 5762, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Debug::Call(context, debugger_call_with_closure) .ToLocalChecked() ->IsNumber()"
); } } while (0);
5763 CHECK_EQ(3, v8::Debug::Call(context, debugger_call_with_closure)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (3), (v8
::Debug::Call(context, debugger_call_with_closure) .ToLocalChecked
() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()), "3" " " "==" " " "v8::Debug::Call(context, debugger_call_with_closure) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5766, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0)
5764 .ToLocalChecked()do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (3), (v8
::Debug::Call(context, debugger_call_with_closure) .ToLocalChecked
() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()), "3" " " "==" " " "v8::Debug::Call(context, debugger_call_with_closure) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5766, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0)
5765 ->Int32Value(context)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (3), (v8
::Debug::Call(context, debugger_call_with_closure) .ToLocalChecked
() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()), "3" " " "==" " " "v8::Debug::Call(context, debugger_call_with_closure) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5766, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0)
5766 .FromJust())do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (3), (v8
::Debug::Call(context, debugger_call_with_closure) .ToLocalChecked
() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()), "3" " " "==" " " "v8::Debug::Call(context, debugger_call_with_closure) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 5766, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
5767}
5768
5769
5770// Test functions called through the debugger.
5771TEST(CallFunctionInDebugger)static void TestCallFunctionInDebugger(); CcTest register_test_CallFunctionInDebugger
(TestCallFunctionInDebugger, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "CallFunctionInDebugger"
, __null, true, true); static void TestCallFunctionInDebugger
() {
5772 // Create and enter a context with the functions CheckFrameCount,
5773 // CheckSourceLine and CheckDataParameter installed.
5774 v8::Isolate* isolate = CcTest::isolate();
5775 v8::HandleScope scope(isolate);
5776 v8::Local<v8::ObjectTemplate> global_template =
5777 v8::ObjectTemplate::New(isolate);
5778 global_template->Set(v8_str(isolate, "CheckFrameCount"),
5779 v8::FunctionTemplate::New(isolate, CheckFrameCount));
5780 global_template->Set(v8_str(isolate, "CheckSourceLine"),
5781 v8::FunctionTemplate::New(isolate, CheckSourceLine));
5782 global_template->Set(v8_str(isolate, "CheckDataParameter"),
5783 v8::FunctionTemplate::New(isolate, CheckDataParameter));
5784 global_template->Set(v8_str(isolate, "CheckClosure"),
5785 v8::FunctionTemplate::New(isolate, CheckClosure));
5786 v8::Local<v8::Context> context =
5787 v8::Context::New(isolate, NULL__null, global_template);
5788 v8::Context::Scope context_scope(context);
5789
5790 // Compile a function for checking the number of JavaScript frames.
5791 v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(isolate, frame_count_source))
5792 .ToLocalChecked()
5793 ->Run(context)
5794 .ToLocalChecked();
5795 frame_count = v8::Local<v8::Function>::Cast(
5796 context->Global()
5797 ->Get(context, v8_str(isolate, "frame_count"))
5798 .ToLocalChecked());
5799
5800 // Compile a function for returning the source line for the top frame.
5801 v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(isolate, frame_source_line_source))
5802 .ToLocalChecked()
5803 ->Run(context)
5804 .ToLocalChecked();
5805 frame_source_line = v8::Local<v8::Function>::Cast(
5806 context->Global()
5807 ->Get(context, v8_str(isolate, "frame_source_line"))
5808 .ToLocalChecked());
5809
5810 // Compile a function returning the data parameter.
5811 v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(isolate, debugger_call_with_data_source))
5812 .ToLocalChecked()
5813 ->Run(context)
5814 .ToLocalChecked();
5815 debugger_call_with_data = v8::Local<v8::Function>::Cast(
5816 context->Global()
5817 ->Get(context, v8_str(isolate, "debugger_call_with_data"))
5818 .ToLocalChecked());
5819
5820 // Compile a function capturing closure.
5821 debugger_call_with_closure = v8::Local<v8::Function>::Cast(
5822 v8::Script::Compile(context,
5823 v8_str(isolate, debugger_call_with_closure_source))
5824 .ToLocalChecked()
5825 ->Run(context)
5826 .ToLocalChecked());
5827
5828 // Calling a function through the debugger returns 0 frames if there are
5829 // no JavaScript frames.
5830 CHECK(v8::Integer::New(isolate, 0)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Integer::New(isolate, 0) ->
Equals(context, v8::Debug::Call(context, frame_count).ToLocalChecked
()) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 5833, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Integer::New(isolate, 0) ->Equals(context, v8::Debug::Call(context, frame_count).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
5831 ->Equals(context,do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Integer::New(isolate, 0) ->
Equals(context, v8::Debug::Call(context, frame_count).ToLocalChecked
()) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 5833, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Integer::New(isolate, 0) ->Equals(context, v8::Debug::Call(context, frame_count).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
5832 v8::Debug::Call(context, frame_count).ToLocalChecked())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Integer::New(isolate, 0) ->
Equals(context, v8::Debug::Call(context, frame_count).ToLocalChecked
()) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 5833, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Integer::New(isolate, 0) ->Equals(context, v8::Debug::Call(context, frame_count).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
5833 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Integer::New(isolate, 0) ->
Equals(context, v8::Debug::Call(context, frame_count).ToLocalChecked
()) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 5833, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Integer::New(isolate, 0) ->Equals(context, v8::Debug::Call(context, frame_count).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
5834
5835 // Test that the number of frames can be retrieved.
5836 v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(isolate, "CheckFrameCount(1)"))
5837 .ToLocalChecked()
5838 ->Run(context)
5839 .ToLocalChecked();
5840 v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(isolate,
5841 "function f() {"
5842 " CheckFrameCount(2);"
5843 "}; f()"))
5844 .ToLocalChecked()
5845 ->Run(context)
5846 .ToLocalChecked();
5847
5848 // Test that the source line can be retrieved.
5849 v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(isolate, "CheckSourceLine(0)"))
5850 .ToLocalChecked()
5851 ->Run(context)
5852 .ToLocalChecked();
5853 v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(isolate,
5854 "function f() {\n"
5855 " CheckSourceLine(1)\n"
5856 " CheckSourceLine(2)\n"
5857 " CheckSourceLine(3)\n"
5858 "}; f()"))
5859 .ToLocalChecked()
5860 ->Run(context)
5861 .ToLocalChecked();
5862
5863 // Test that a parameter can be passed to a function called in the debugger.
5864 v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(isolate, "CheckDataParameter()"))
5865 .ToLocalChecked()
5866 ->Run(context)
5867 .ToLocalChecked();
5868
5869 // Test that a function with closure can be run in the debugger.
5870 v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(isolate, "CheckClosure()"))
5871 .ToLocalChecked()
5872 ->Run(context)
5873 .ToLocalChecked();
5874
5875 // Test that the source line is correct when there is a line offset.
5876 v8::ScriptOrigin origin(v8_str(isolate, "test"),
5877 v8::Integer::New(isolate, 7));
5878 v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(isolate, "CheckSourceLine(7)"), &origin)
5879 .ToLocalChecked()
5880 ->Run(context)
5881 .ToLocalChecked();
5882 v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(isolate,
5883 "function f() {\n"
5884 " CheckSourceLine(8)\n"
5885 " CheckSourceLine(9)\n"
5886 " CheckSourceLine(10)\n"
5887 "}; f()"),
5888 &origin)
5889 .ToLocalChecked()
5890 ->Run(context)
5891 .ToLocalChecked();
5892}
5893
5894
5895// Debugger message handler which counts the number of breaks.
5896static void SendContinueCommand();
5897static void MessageHandlerBreakPointHitCount(
5898 const v8::Debug::Message& message) {
5899 if (message.IsEvent() && message.GetEvent() == v8::Break) {
5900 // Count the number of breaks.
5901 break_point_hit_count++;
5902
5903 SendContinueCommand();
5904 }
5905}
5906
5907
5908// Test that clearing the debug event listener actually clears all break points
5909// and related information.
5910TEST(DebuggerUnload)static void TestDebuggerUnload(); CcTest register_test_DebuggerUnload
(TestDebuggerUnload, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "DebuggerUnload"
, __null, true, true); static void TestDebuggerUnload() {
5911 DebugLocalContext env;
5912
5913 // Check debugger is unloaded before it is used.
5914 CheckDebuggerUnloaded(env->GetIsolate());
5915
5916 // Set a debug event listener.
5917 break_point_hit_count = 0;
5918 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(env->GetIsolate(),
5919 DebugEventBreakPointHitCount);
5920 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = env.context();
5921 {
5922 v8::HandleScope scope(env->GetIsolate());
5923 // Create a couple of functions for the test.
5924 v8::Local<v8::Function> foo =
5925 CompileFunction(&env, "function foo(){x=1}", "foo");
5926 v8::Local<v8::Function> bar =
5927 CompileFunction(&env, "function bar(){y=2}", "bar");
5928
5929 // Set some break points.
5930 SetBreakPoint(foo, 0);
5931 SetBreakPoint(foo, 4);
5932 SetBreakPoint(bar, 0);
5933 SetBreakPoint(bar, 4);
5934
5935 // Make sure that the break points are there.
5936 break_point_hit_count = 0;
5937 foo->Call(context, env->Global(), 0, NULL__null).ToLocalChecked();
5938 CHECK_EQ(2, break_point_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (2), (break_point_hit_count
), "2" " " "==" " " "break_point_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 5938, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
5939 bar->Call(context, env->Global(), 0, NULL__null).ToLocalChecked();
5940 CHECK_EQ(4, break_point_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (4), (break_point_hit_count
), "4" " " "==" " " "break_point_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 5940, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
5941 }
5942
5943 // Remove the debug event listener without clearing breakpoints. Do this
5944 // outside a handle scope.
5945 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(env->GetIsolate(), nullptr);
5946 CheckDebuggerUnloaded(env->GetIsolate(), true);
5947
5948 // Now set a debug message handler.
5949 break_point_hit_count = 0;
5950 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(env->GetIsolate(),
5951 MessageHandlerBreakPointHitCount);
5952 {
5953 v8::HandleScope scope(env->GetIsolate());
5954
5955 // Get the test functions again.
5956 v8::Local<v8::Function> foo(v8::Local<v8::Function>::Cast(
5957 env->Global()
5958 ->Get(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), "foo"))
5959 .ToLocalChecked()));
5960
5961 foo->Call(context, env->Global(), 0, NULL__null).ToLocalChecked();
5962 CHECK_EQ(0, break_point_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (0), (break_point_hit_count
), "0" " " "==" " " "break_point_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 5962, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
5963
5964 // Set break points and run again.
5965 SetBreakPoint(foo, 0);
5966 SetBreakPoint(foo, 4);
5967 foo->Call(context, env->Global(), 0, NULL__null).ToLocalChecked();
5968 CHECK_EQ(2, break_point_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (2), (break_point_hit_count
), "2" " " "==" " " "break_point_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 5968, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
5969 }
5970
5971 // Remove the debug message handler without clearing breakpoints. Do this
5972 // outside a handle scope.
5973 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(env->GetIsolate(), nullptr);
5974 CheckDebuggerUnloaded(env->GetIsolate(), true);
5975}
5976
5977
5978// Sends continue command to the debugger.
5979static void SendContinueCommand() {
5980 const int kBufferSize = 1000;
5981 uint16_t buffer[kBufferSize];
5982 const char* command_continue =
5983 "{\"seq\":0,"
5984 "\"type\":\"request\","
5985 "\"command\":\"continue\"}";
5986
5987 v8::Debug::SendCommand(
5988 CcTest::isolate(), buffer, AsciiToUtf16(command_continue, buffer));
5989}
5990
5991
5992// Debugger message handler which counts the number of times it is called.
5993static int message_handler_hit_count = 0;
5994static void MessageHandlerHitCount(const v8::Debug::Message& message) {
5995 message_handler_hit_count++;
5996
5997 static char print_buffer[1000];
5998 v8::String::Value json(message.GetJSON());
5999 Utf16ToAscii(*json, json.length(), print_buffer);
6000 if (IsExceptionEventMessage(print_buffer)) {
6001 // Send a continue command for exception events.
6002 SendContinueCommand();
6003 }
6004}
6005
6006
6007// Test clearing the debug message handler.
6008TEST(DebuggerClearMessageHandler)static void TestDebuggerClearMessageHandler(); CcTest register_test_DebuggerClearMessageHandler
(TestDebuggerClearMessageHandler, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, "DebuggerClearMessageHandler", __null, true, true); static void
TestDebuggerClearMessageHandler() {
6009 DebugLocalContext env;
6010 v8::HandleScope scope(env->GetIsolate());
6011
6012 // Check debugger is unloaded before it is used.
6013 CheckDebuggerUnloaded(env->GetIsolate());
6014
6015 // Set a debug message handler.
6016 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(env->GetIsolate(), MessageHandlerHitCount);
6017
6018 // Run code to throw a unhandled exception. This should end up in the message
6019 // handler.
6020 CompileRun("throw 1");
6021
6022 // The message handler should be called.
6023 CHECK_GT(message_handler_hit_count, 0)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckGTImpl( (message_handler_hit_count
), (0), "message_handler_hit_count" " " ">" " " "0")) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6023, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
6024
6025 // Clear debug message handler.
6026 message_handler_hit_count = 0;
6027 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(env->GetIsolate(), nullptr);
6028
6029 // Run code to throw a unhandled exception. This should end up in the message
6030 // handler.
6031 CompileRun("throw 1");
6032
6033 // The message handler should not be called more.
6034 CHECK_EQ(0, message_handler_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (0), (message_handler_hit_count
), "0" " " "==" " " "message_handler_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal(
"../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6034, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
6035
6036 CheckDebuggerUnloaded(env->GetIsolate(), true);
6037}
6038
6039
6040// Debugger message handler which clears the message handler while active.
6041static void MessageHandlerClearingMessageHandler(
6042 const v8::Debug::Message& message) {
6043 message_handler_hit_count++;
6044
6045 // Clear debug message handler.
6046 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(message.GetIsolate(), nullptr);
6047}
6048
6049
6050// Test clearing the debug message handler while processing a debug event.
6051TEST(DebuggerClearMessageHandlerWhileActive)static void TestDebuggerClearMessageHandlerWhileActive(); CcTest
register_test_DebuggerClearMessageHandlerWhileActive(TestDebuggerClearMessageHandlerWhileActive
, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "DebuggerClearMessageHandlerWhileActive"
, __null, true, true); static void TestDebuggerClearMessageHandlerWhileActive
() {
6052 DebugLocalContext env;
6053 v8::HandleScope scope(env->GetIsolate());
6054
6055 // Check debugger is unloaded before it is used.
6056 CheckDebuggerUnloaded(env->GetIsolate());
6057
6058 // Set a debug message handler.
6059 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(env->GetIsolate(),
6060 MessageHandlerClearingMessageHandler);
6061
6062 // Run code to throw a unhandled exception. This should end up in the message
6063 // handler.
6064 CompileRun("throw 1");
6065
6066 // The message handler should be called.
6067 CHECK_EQ(1, message_handler_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (message_handler_hit_count
), "1" " " "==" " " "message_handler_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal(
"../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6067, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
6068
6069 CheckDebuggerUnloaded(env->GetIsolate(), true);
6070}
6071
6072
6073// Test for issue http://code.google.com/p/v8/issues/detail?id=289.
6074// Make sure that DebugGetLoadedScripts doesn't return scripts
6075// with disposed external source.
6076class EmptyExternalStringResource : public v8::String::ExternalStringResource {
6077 public:
6078 EmptyExternalStringResource() { empty_[0] = 0; }
6079 virtual ~EmptyExternalStringResource() {}
6080 virtual size_t length() const { return empty_.length(); }
6081 virtual const uint16_t* data() const { return empty_.start(); }
6082 private:
6083 ::v8::internal::EmbeddedVector<uint16_t, 1> empty_;
6084};
6085
6086
6087TEST(DebugGetLoadedScripts)static void TestDebugGetLoadedScripts(); CcTest register_test_DebugGetLoadedScripts
(TestDebugGetLoadedScripts, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "DebugGetLoadedScripts"
, __null, true, true); static void TestDebugGetLoadedScripts(
) {
6088 DebugLocalContext env;
6089 v8::HandleScope scope(env->GetIsolate());
6090 env.ExposeDebug();
6091
6092 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = env.context();
6093 EmptyExternalStringResource source_ext_str;
6094 v8::Local<v8::String> source =
6095 v8::String::NewExternalTwoByte(env->GetIsolate(), &source_ext_str)
6096 .ToLocalChecked();
6097 CHECK(v8::Script::Compile(context, source).IsEmpty())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Script::Compile(context, source
).IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 6097, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Script::Compile(context, source).IsEmpty()"
); } } while (0);
6098 Handle<i::ExternalTwoByteString> i_source(
6099 i::ExternalTwoByteString::cast(*v8::Utils::OpenHandle(*source)));
6100 // This situation can happen if source was an external string disposed
6101 // by its owner.
6102 i_source->set_resource(0);
6103
6104 bool allow_natives_syntax = i::FLAG_allow_natives_syntax;
6105 i::FLAG_allow_natives_syntax = true;
6106 EnableDebugger(env->GetIsolate());
6107 v8::MaybeLocal<v8::Value> result =
6108 CompileRun(env.context(),
6109 "var scripts = %DebugGetLoadedScripts();"
6110 "var count = scripts.length;"
6111 "for (var i = 0; i < count; ++i) {"
6112 " var lines = scripts[i].lineCount();"
6113 " if (lines < 1) throw 'lineCount';"
6114 " var last = -1;"
6115 " for (var j = 0; j < lines; ++j) {"
6116 " var end = scripts[i].lineEnd(j);"
6117 " if (last >= end) throw 'lineEnd';"
6118 " last = end;"
6119 " }"
6120 "}");
6121 CHECK(!result.IsEmpty())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(!result.IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6121, "Check failed: %s.", "!result.IsEmpty()"
); } } while (0);
6122 DisableDebugger(env->GetIsolate());
6123 // Must not crash while accessing line_ends.
6124 i::FLAG_allow_natives_syntax = allow_natives_syntax;
6125
6126 // Some scripts are retrieved - at least the number of native scripts.
6127 CHECK_GT(env->Global()do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckGTImpl( (env->
Global() ->Get(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), "count"
)) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()), (
8), "env->Global() ->Get(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), \"count\")) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
" " ">" " " "8")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 6132, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0)
6128 ->Get(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), "count"))do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckGTImpl( (env->
Global() ->Get(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), "count"
)) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()), (
8), "env->Global() ->Get(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), \"count\")) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
" " ">" " " "8")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 6132, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0)
6129 .ToLocalChecked()do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckGTImpl( (env->
Global() ->Get(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), "count"
)) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()), (
8), "env->Global() ->Get(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), \"count\")) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
" " ">" " " "8")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 6132, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0)
6130 ->Int32Value(context)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckGTImpl( (env->
Global() ->Get(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), "count"
)) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()), (
8), "env->Global() ->Get(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), \"count\")) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
" " ">" " " "8")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 6132, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0)
6131 .FromJust(),do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckGTImpl( (env->
Global() ->Get(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), "count"
)) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()), (
8), "env->Global() ->Get(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), \"count\")) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
" " ">" " " "8")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 6132, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0)
6132 8)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckGTImpl( (env->
Global() ->Get(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), "count"
)) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()), (
8), "env->Global() ->Get(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), \"count\")) .ToLocalChecked() ->Int32Value(context) .FromJust()"
" " ">" " " "8")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 6132, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
6133}
6134
6135
6136// Test script break points set on lines.
6137TEST(ScriptNameAndData)static void TestScriptNameAndData(); CcTest register_test_ScriptNameAndData
(TestScriptNameAndData, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "ScriptNameAndData"
, __null, true, true); static void TestScriptNameAndData() {
6138 DebugLocalContext env;
6139 v8::HandleScope scope(env->GetIsolate());
6140 env.ExposeDebug();
6141
6142 // Create functions for retrieving script name and data for the function on
6143 // the top frame when hitting a break point.
6144 frame_script_name = CompileFunction(&env,
6145 frame_script_name_source,
6146 "frame_script_name");
6147
6148 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(env->GetIsolate(),
6149 DebugEventBreakPointHitCount);
6150
6151 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = env.context();
6152 // Test function source.
6153 v8::Local<v8::String> script = v8_str(env->GetIsolate(),
6154 "function f() {\n"
6155 " debugger;\n"
6156 "}\n");
6157
6158 v8::ScriptOrigin origin1 =
6159 v8::ScriptOrigin(v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), "name"));
6160 v8::Local<v8::Script> script1 =
6161 v8::Script::Compile(context, script, &origin1).ToLocalChecked();
6162 script1->Run(context).ToLocalChecked();
6163 v8::Local<v8::Function> f;
6164 f = v8::Local<v8::Function>::Cast(
6165 env->Global()
6166 ->Get(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), "f"))
6167 .ToLocalChecked());
6168
6169 f->Call(context, env->Global(), 0, NULL__null).ToLocalChecked();
6170 CHECK_EQ(1, break_point_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (break_point_hit_count
), "1" " " "==" " " "break_point_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 6170, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
6171 CHECK_EQ(0, strcmp("name", last_script_name_hit))do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (0), (strcmp
("name", last_script_name_hit)), "0" " " "==" " " "strcmp(\"name\", last_script_name_hit)"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6171, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
6172
6173 // Compile the same script again without setting data. As the compilation
6174 // cache is disabled when debugging expect the data to be missing.
6175 v8::Script::Compile(context, script, &origin1)
6176 .ToLocalChecked()
6177 ->Run(context)
6178 .ToLocalChecked();
6179 f = v8::Local<v8::Function>::Cast(
6180 env->Global()
6181 ->Get(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), "f"))
6182 .ToLocalChecked());
6183 f->Call(context, env->Global(), 0, NULL__null).ToLocalChecked();
6184 CHECK_EQ(2, break_point_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (2), (break_point_hit_count
), "2" " " "==" " " "break_point_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 6184, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
6185 CHECK_EQ(0, strcmp("name", last_script_name_hit))do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (0), (strcmp
("name", last_script_name_hit)), "0" " " "==" " " "strcmp(\"name\", last_script_name_hit)"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6185, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
6186
6187 v8::Local<v8::String> data_obj_source =
6188 v8_str(env->GetIsolate(),
6189 "({ a: 'abc',\n"
6190 " b: 123,\n"
6191 " toString: function() { return this.a + ' ' + this.b; }\n"
6192 "})\n");
6193 v8::Script::Compile(context, data_obj_source)
6194 .ToLocalChecked()
6195 ->Run(context)
6196 .ToLocalChecked();
6197 v8::ScriptOrigin origin2 =
6198 v8::ScriptOrigin(v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), "new name"));
6199 v8::Local<v8::Script> script2 =
6200 v8::Script::Compile(context, script, &origin2).ToLocalChecked();
6201 script2->Run(context).ToLocalChecked();
6202 f = v8::Local<v8::Function>::Cast(
6203 env->Global()
6204 ->Get(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), "f"))
6205 .ToLocalChecked());
6206 f->Call(context, env->Global(), 0, NULL__null).ToLocalChecked();
6207 CHECK_EQ(3, break_point_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (3), (break_point_hit_count
), "3" " " "==" " " "break_point_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 6207, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
6208 CHECK_EQ(0, strcmp("new name", last_script_name_hit))do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (0), (strcmp
("new name", last_script_name_hit)), "0" " " "==" " " "strcmp(\"new name\", last_script_name_hit)"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6208, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
6209
6210 v8::Local<v8::Script> script3 =
6211 v8::Script::Compile(context, script, &origin2).ToLocalChecked();
6212 script3->Run(context).ToLocalChecked();
6213 f = v8::Local<v8::Function>::Cast(
6214 env->Global()
6215 ->Get(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), "f"))
6216 .ToLocalChecked());
6217 f->Call(context, env->Global(), 0, NULL__null).ToLocalChecked();
6218 CHECK_EQ(4, break_point_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (4), (break_point_hit_count
), "4" " " "==" " " "break_point_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 6218, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
6219}
6220
6221
6222static v8::Local<v8::Context> expected_context;
6223static v8::Local<v8::Value> expected_context_data;
6224
6225
6226// Check that the expected context is the one generating the debug event.
6227static void ContextCheckMessageHandler(const v8::Debug::Message& message) {
6228 CHECK(message.GetEventContext() == expected_context)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(message.GetEventContext() == expected_context
)), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6228, "Check failed: %s."
, "message.GetEventContext() == expected_context"); } } while
(0);
6229 CHECK(message.GetEventContext()->GetEmbedderData(0)->StrictEquals(do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(message.GetEventContext()->
GetEmbedderData(0)->StrictEquals( expected_context_data)))
, 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6230, "Check failed: %s."
, "message.GetEventContext()->GetEmbedderData(0)->StrictEquals( expected_context_data)"
); } } while (0)
6230 expected_context_data))do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(message.GetEventContext()->
GetEmbedderData(0)->StrictEquals( expected_context_data)))
, 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6230, "Check failed: %s."
, "message.GetEventContext()->GetEmbedderData(0)->StrictEquals( expected_context_data)"
); } } while (0);
6231 message_handler_hit_count++;
6232
6233 static char print_buffer[1000];
6234 v8::String::Value json(message.GetJSON());
6235 Utf16ToAscii(*json, json.length(), print_buffer);
6236
6237 // Send a continue command for break events.
6238 if (IsBreakEventMessage(print_buffer)) {
6239 SendContinueCommand();
6240 }
6241}
6242
6243
6244// Test which creates two contexts and sets different embedder data on each.
6245// Checks that this data is set correctly and that when the debug message
6246// handler is called the expected context is the one active.
6247TEST(ContextData)static void TestContextData(); CcTest register_test_ContextData
(TestContextData, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "ContextData"
, __null, true, true); static void TestContextData() {
6248 v8::Isolate* isolate = CcTest::isolate();
6249 v8::HandleScope scope(isolate);
6250
6251 // Create two contexts.
6252 v8::Local<v8::Context> context_1;
6253 v8::Local<v8::Context> context_2;
6254 v8::Local<v8::ObjectTemplate> global_template =
6255 v8::Local<v8::ObjectTemplate>();
6256 v8::Local<v8::Value> global_object = v8::Local<v8::Value>();
6257 context_1 = v8::Context::New(isolate, NULL__null, global_template, global_object);
6258 context_2 = v8::Context::New(isolate, NULL__null, global_template, global_object);
6259
6260 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(isolate, ContextCheckMessageHandler);
6261
6262 // Default data value is undefined.
6263 CHECK(context_1->GetEmbedderData(0)->IsUndefined())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(context_1->GetEmbedderData
(0)->IsUndefined())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 6263, "Check failed: %s.", "context_1->GetEmbedderData(0)->IsUndefined()"
); } } while (0);
6264 CHECK(context_2->GetEmbedderData(0)->IsUndefined())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(context_2->GetEmbedderData
(0)->IsUndefined())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 6264, "Check failed: %s.", "context_2->GetEmbedderData(0)->IsUndefined()"
); } } while (0);
6265
6266 // Set and check different data values.
6267 v8::Local<v8::String> data_1 = v8_str(isolate, "1");
6268 v8::Local<v8::String> data_2 = v8_str(isolate, "2");
6269 context_1->SetEmbedderData(0, data_1);
6270 context_2->SetEmbedderData(0, data_2);
6271 CHECK(context_1->GetEmbedderData(0)->StrictEquals(data_1))do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(context_1->GetEmbedderData
(0)->StrictEquals(data_1))), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 6271, "Check failed: %s.", "context_1->GetEmbedderData(0)->StrictEquals(data_1)"
); } } while (0);
6272 CHECK(context_2->GetEmbedderData(0)->StrictEquals(data_2))do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(context_2->GetEmbedderData
(0)->StrictEquals(data_2))), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 6272, "Check failed: %s.", "context_2->GetEmbedderData(0)->StrictEquals(data_2)"
); } } while (0);
6273
6274 // Simple test function which causes a break.
6275 const char* source = "function f() { debugger; }";
6276
6277 // Enter and run function in the first context.
6278 {
6279 v8::Context::Scope context_scope(context_1);
6280 expected_context = context_1;
6281 expected_context_data = data_1;
6282 v8::Local<v8::Function> f = CompileFunction(isolate, source, "f");
6283 f->Call(context_1, context_1->Global(), 0, NULL__null).ToLocalChecked();
6284 }
6285
6286
6287 // Enter and run function in the second context.
6288 {
6289 v8::Context::Scope context_scope(context_2);
6290 expected_context = context_2;
6291 expected_context_data = data_2;
6292 v8::Local<v8::Function> f = CompileFunction(isolate, source, "f");
6293 f->Call(context_2, context_2->Global(), 0, NULL__null).ToLocalChecked();
6294 }
6295
6296 // Two times compile event and two times break event.
6297 CHECK_GT(message_handler_hit_count, 4)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckGTImpl( (message_handler_hit_count
), (4), "message_handler_hit_count" " " ">" " " "4")) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6297, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
6298
6299 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(isolate, nullptr);
6300 CheckDebuggerUnloaded(isolate);
6301}
6302
6303
6304// Debug message handler which issues a debug break when it hits a break event.
6305static int message_handler_break_hit_count = 0;
6306static void DebugBreakMessageHandler(const v8::Debug::Message& message) {
6307 // Schedule a debug break for break events.
6308 if (message.IsEvent() && message.GetEvent() == v8::Break) {
6309 message_handler_break_hit_count++;
6310 if (message_handler_break_hit_count == 1) {
6311 v8::Debug::DebugBreak(message.GetIsolate());
6312 }
6313 }
6314
6315 // Issue a continue command if this event will not cause the VM to start
6316 // running.
6317 if (!message.WillStartRunning()) {
6318 SendContinueCommand();
6319 }
6320}
6321
6322
6323// Test that a debug break can be scheduled while in a message handler.
6324TEST(DebugBreakInMessageHandler)static void TestDebugBreakInMessageHandler(); CcTest register_test_DebugBreakInMessageHandler
(TestDebugBreakInMessageHandler, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, "DebugBreakInMessageHandler", __null, true, true); static void
TestDebugBreakInMessageHandler() {
6325 i::FLAG_turbo_inlining = false; // Make sure g is not inlined into f.
6326 DebugLocalContext env;
6327 v8::HandleScope scope(env->GetIsolate());
6328
6329 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(env->GetIsolate(), DebugBreakMessageHandler);
6330
6331 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = env.context();
6332 // Test functions.
6333 const char* script = "function f() { debugger; g(); } function g() { }";
6334 CompileRun(script);
6335 v8::Local<v8::Function> f = v8::Local<v8::Function>::Cast(
6336 env->Global()
6337 ->Get(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), "f"))
6338 .ToLocalChecked());
6339 v8::Local<v8::Function> g = v8::Local<v8::Function>::Cast(
6340 env->Global()
6341 ->Get(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), "g"))
6342 .ToLocalChecked());
6343
6344 // Call f then g. The debugger statement in f will cause a break which will
6345 // cause another break.
6346 f->Call(context, env->Global(), 0, NULL__null).ToLocalChecked();
6347 CHECK_EQ(2, message_handler_break_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (2), (message_handler_break_hit_count
), "2" " " "==" " " "message_handler_break_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6347, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
6348 // Calling g will not cause any additional breaks.
6349 g->Call(context, env->Global(), 0, NULL__null).ToLocalChecked();
6350 CHECK_EQ(2, message_handler_break_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (2), (message_handler_break_hit_count
), "2" " " "==" " " "message_handler_break_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6350, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
6351}
6352
6353
6354#ifndef V8_INTERPRETED_REGEXP
6355// Debug event handler which gets the function on the top frame and schedules a
6356// break a number of times.
6357static void DebugEventDebugBreak(
6358 const v8::Debug::EventDetails& event_details) {
6359 v8::DebugEvent event = event_details.GetEvent();
6360 v8::Local<v8::Object> exec_state = event_details.GetExecutionState();
6361 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = CcTest::isolate()->GetCurrentContext();
6362 if (event == v8::Break) {
6363 break_point_hit_count++;
6364
6365 // Get the name of the top frame function.
6366 if (!frame_function_name.IsEmpty()) {
6367 // Get the name of the function.
6368 const int argc = 2;
6369 v8::Local<v8::Value> argv[argc] = {
6370 exec_state, v8::Integer::New(CcTest::isolate(), 0)};
6371 v8::Local<v8::Value> result =
6372 frame_function_name->Call(context, exec_state, argc, argv)
6373 .ToLocalChecked();
6374 if (result->IsUndefined()) {
6375 last_function_hit[0] = '\0';
6376 } else {
6377 CHECK(result->IsString())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(result->IsString())), 0)))
{ V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6377, "Check failed: %s."
, "result->IsString()"); } } while (0);
6378 v8::Local<v8::String> function_name(
6379 result->ToString(context).ToLocalChecked());
6380 function_name->WriteUtf8(last_function_hit);
6381 }
6382 }
6383
6384 // Keep forcing breaks.
6385 if (break_point_hit_count < 20) {
6386 v8::Debug::DebugBreak(CcTest::isolate());
6387 }
6388 }
6389}
6390
6391
6392TEST(RegExpDebugBreak)static void TestRegExpDebugBreak(); CcTest register_test_RegExpDebugBreak
(TestRegExpDebugBreak, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "RegExpDebugBreak"
, __null, true, true); static void TestRegExpDebugBreak() {
6393 // This test only applies to native regexps.
6394 DebugLocalContext env;
6395 v8::HandleScope scope(env->GetIsolate());
6396 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = env.context();
6397 // Create a function for checking the function when hitting a break point.
6398 frame_function_name = CompileFunction(&env,
6399 frame_function_name_source,
6400 "frame_function_name");
6401
6402 // Test RegExp which matches white spaces and comments at the begining of a
6403 // source line.
6404 const char* script =
6405 "var sourceLineBeginningSkip = /^(?:[ \\v\\h]*(?:\\/\\*.*?\\*\\/)*)*/;\n"
6406 "function f(s) { return s.match(sourceLineBeginningSkip)[0].length; }";
6407
6408 v8::Local<v8::Function> f = CompileFunction(env->GetIsolate(), script, "f");
6409 const int argc = 1;
6410 v8::Local<v8::Value> argv[argc] = {
6411 v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), " /* xxx */ a=0;")};
6412 v8::Local<v8::Value> result =
6413 f->Call(context, env->Global(), argc, argv).ToLocalChecked();
6414 CHECK_EQ(12, result->Int32Value(context).FromJust())do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (12), (
result->Int32Value(context).FromJust()), "12" " " "==" " "
"result->Int32Value(context).FromJust()")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 6414, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
6415
6416 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(env->GetIsolate(), DebugEventDebugBreak);
6417 v8::Debug::DebugBreak(env->GetIsolate());
6418 result = f->Call(context, env->Global(), argc, argv).ToLocalChecked();
6419
6420 // Check that there was only one break event. Matching RegExp should not
6421 // cause Break events.
6422 CHECK_EQ(1, break_point_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (break_point_hit_count
), "1" " " "==" " " "break_point_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 6422, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
6423 CHECK_EQ(0, strcmp("f", last_function_hit))do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (0), (strcmp
("f", last_function_hit)), "0" " " "==" " " "strcmp(\"f\", last_function_hit)"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6423, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
6424}
6425#endif // V8_INTERPRETED_REGEXP
6426
6427
6428// Common part of EvalContextData and NestedBreakEventContextData tests.
6429static void ExecuteScriptForContextCheck(
6430 v8::Debug::MessageHandler message_handler) {
6431 // Create a context.
6432 v8::Local<v8::Context> context_1;
6433 v8::Local<v8::ObjectTemplate> global_template =
6434 v8::Local<v8::ObjectTemplate>();
6435 context_1 =
6436 v8::Context::New(CcTest::isolate(), NULL__null, global_template);
6437
6438 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(CcTest::isolate(), message_handler);
6439
6440 // Default data value is undefined.
6441 CHECK(context_1->GetEmbedderData(0)->IsUndefined())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(context_1->GetEmbedderData
(0)->IsUndefined())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 6441, "Check failed: %s.", "context_1->GetEmbedderData(0)->IsUndefined()"
); } } while (0);
6442
6443 // Set and check a data value.
6444 v8::Local<v8::String> data_1 = v8_str(CcTest::isolate(), "1");
6445 context_1->SetEmbedderData(0, data_1);
6446 CHECK(context_1->GetEmbedderData(0)->StrictEquals(data_1))do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(context_1->GetEmbedderData
(0)->StrictEquals(data_1))), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 6446, "Check failed: %s.", "context_1->GetEmbedderData(0)->StrictEquals(data_1)"
); } } while (0);
6447
6448 // Simple test function with eval that causes a break.
6449 const char* source = "function f() { eval('debugger;'); }";
6450
6451 // Enter and run function in the context.
6452 {
6453 v8::Context::Scope context_scope(context_1);
6454 expected_context = context_1;
6455 expected_context_data = data_1;
6456 v8::Local<v8::Function> f = CompileFunction(CcTest::isolate(), source, "f");
6457 f->Call(context_1, context_1->Global(), 0, NULL__null).ToLocalChecked();
6458 }
6459
6460 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(CcTest::isolate(), nullptr);
6461}
6462
6463
6464// Test which creates a context and sets embedder data on it. Checks that this
6465// data is set correctly and that when the debug message handler is called for
6466// break event in an eval statement the expected context is the one returned by
6467// Message.GetEventContext.
6468TEST(EvalContextData)static void TestEvalContextData(); CcTest register_test_EvalContextData
(TestEvalContextData, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "EvalContextData"
, __null, true, true); static void TestEvalContextData() {
6469 v8::HandleScope scope(CcTest::isolate());
6470
6471 ExecuteScriptForContextCheck(ContextCheckMessageHandler);
6472
6473 // One time compile event and one time break event.
6474 CHECK_GT(message_handler_hit_count, 2)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckGTImpl( (message_handler_hit_count
), (2), "message_handler_hit_count" " " ">" " " "2")) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6474, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
6475 CheckDebuggerUnloaded(CcTest::isolate());
6476}
6477
6478
6479static bool sent_eval = false;
6480static int break_count = 0;
6481static int continue_command_send_count = 0;
6482// Check that the expected context is the one generating the debug event
6483// including the case of nested break event.
6484static void DebugEvalContextCheckMessageHandler(
6485 const v8::Debug::Message& message) {
6486 CHECK(message.GetEventContext() == expected_context)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(message.GetEventContext() == expected_context
)), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6486, "Check failed: %s."
, "message.GetEventContext() == expected_context"); } } while
(0);
6487 CHECK(message.GetEventContext()->GetEmbedderData(0)->StrictEquals(do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(message.GetEventContext()->
GetEmbedderData(0)->StrictEquals( expected_context_data)))
, 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6488, "Check failed: %s."
, "message.GetEventContext()->GetEmbedderData(0)->StrictEquals( expected_context_data)"
); } } while (0)
6488 expected_context_data))do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(message.GetEventContext()->
GetEmbedderData(0)->StrictEquals( expected_context_data)))
, 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6488, "Check failed: %s."
, "message.GetEventContext()->GetEmbedderData(0)->StrictEquals( expected_context_data)"
); } } while (0);
6489 message_handler_hit_count++;
6490
6491 static char print_buffer[1000];
6492 v8::String::Value json(message.GetJSON());
6493 Utf16ToAscii(*json, json.length(), print_buffer);
6494
6495 v8::Isolate* isolate = message.GetIsolate();
6496 if (IsBreakEventMessage(print_buffer)) {
6497 break_count++;
6498 if (!sent_eval) {
6499 sent_eval = true;
6500
6501 const int kBufferSize = 1000;
6502 uint16_t buffer[kBufferSize];
6503 const char* eval_command =
6504 "{\"seq\":0,"
6505 "\"type\":\"request\","
6506 "\"command\":\"evaluate\","
6507 "\"arguments\":{\"expression\":\"debugger;\","
6508 "\"global\":true,\"disable_break\":false}}";
6509
6510 // Send evaluate command.
6511 v8::Debug::SendCommand(
6512 isolate, buffer, AsciiToUtf16(eval_command, buffer));
6513 return;
6514 } else {
6515 // It's a break event caused by the evaluation request above.
6516 SendContinueCommand();
6517 continue_command_send_count++;
6518 }
6519 } else if (IsEvaluateResponseMessage(print_buffer) &&
6520 continue_command_send_count < 2) {
6521 // Response to the evaluation request. We're still on the breakpoint so
6522 // send continue.
6523 SendContinueCommand();
6524 continue_command_send_count++;
6525 }
6526}
6527
6528
6529// Tests that context returned for break event is correct when the event occurs
6530// in 'evaluate' debugger request.
6531TEST(NestedBreakEventContextData)static void TestNestedBreakEventContextData(); CcTest register_test_NestedBreakEventContextData
(TestNestedBreakEventContextData, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, "NestedBreakEventContextData", __null, true, true); static void
TestNestedBreakEventContextData() {
6532 v8::HandleScope scope(CcTest::isolate());
6533 break_count = 0;
6534 message_handler_hit_count = 0;
6535
6536 ExecuteScriptForContextCheck(DebugEvalContextCheckMessageHandler);
6537
6538 // One time compile event and two times break event.
6539 CHECK_GT(message_handler_hit_count, 3)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckGTImpl( (message_handler_hit_count
), (3), "message_handler_hit_count" " " ">" " " "3")) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6539, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
6540
6541 // One break from the source and another from the evaluate request.
6542 CHECK_EQ(break_count, 2)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (break_count
), (2), "break_count" " " "==" " " "2")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 6542, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
6543 CheckDebuggerUnloaded(CcTest::isolate());
6544}
6545
6546
6547// Debug event listener which counts the after compile events.
6548int after_compile_message_count = 0;
6549static void AfterCompileMessageHandler(const v8::Debug::Message& message) {
6550 // Count the number of scripts collected.
6551 if (message.IsEvent()) {
6552 if (message.GetEvent() == v8::AfterCompile) {
6553 after_compile_message_count++;
6554 } else if (message.GetEvent() == v8::Break) {
6555 SendContinueCommand();
6556 }
6557 }
6558}
6559
6560
6561// Tests that after compile event is sent as many times as there are scripts
6562// compiled.
6563TEST(AfterCompileMessageWhenMessageHandlerIsReset)static void TestAfterCompileMessageWhenMessageHandlerIsReset(
); CcTest register_test_AfterCompileMessageWhenMessageHandlerIsReset
(TestAfterCompileMessageWhenMessageHandlerIsReset, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, "AfterCompileMessageWhenMessageHandlerIsReset", __null, true
, true); static void TestAfterCompileMessageWhenMessageHandlerIsReset
() {
6564 DebugLocalContext env;
6565 v8::HandleScope scope(env->GetIsolate());
6566 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = env.context();
6567 after_compile_message_count = 0;
6568 const char* script = "var a=1";
6569
6570 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(env->GetIsolate(), AfterCompileMessageHandler);
6571 v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), script))
6572 .ToLocalChecked()
6573 ->Run(context)
6574 .ToLocalChecked();
6575 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(env->GetIsolate(), nullptr);
6576
6577 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(env->GetIsolate(), AfterCompileMessageHandler);
6578 v8::Debug::DebugBreak(env->GetIsolate());
6579 v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), script))
6580 .ToLocalChecked()
6581 ->Run(context)
6582 .ToLocalChecked();
6583
6584 // Setting listener to NULL should cause debugger unload.
6585 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(env->GetIsolate(), nullptr);
6586 CheckDebuggerUnloaded(env->GetIsolate());
6587
6588 // Compilation cache should be disabled when debugger is active.
6589 CHECK_EQ(2, after_compile_message_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (2), (after_compile_message_count
), "2" " " "==" " " "after_compile_message_count")) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6589, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
6590}
6591
6592
6593// Syntax error event handler which counts a number of events.
6594int compile_error_event_count = 0;
6595
6596static void CompileErrorEventCounterClear() {
6597 compile_error_event_count = 0;
6598}
6599
6600static void CompileErrorEventCounter(
6601 const v8::Debug::EventDetails& event_details) {
6602 v8::DebugEvent event = event_details.GetEvent();
6603
6604 if (event == v8::CompileError) {
6605 compile_error_event_count++;
6606 }
6607}
6608
6609
6610// Tests that syntax error event is sent as many times as there are scripts
6611// with syntax error compiled.
6612TEST(SyntaxErrorMessageOnSyntaxException)static void TestSyntaxErrorMessageOnSyntaxException(); CcTest
register_test_SyntaxErrorMessageOnSyntaxException(TestSyntaxErrorMessageOnSyntaxException
, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "SyntaxErrorMessageOnSyntaxException"
, __null, true, true); static void TestSyntaxErrorMessageOnSyntaxException
() {
6613 DebugLocalContext env;
6614 v8::HandleScope scope(env->GetIsolate());
6615
6616 // For this test, we want to break on uncaught exceptions:
6617 ChangeBreakOnException(false, true);
6618
6619 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(env->GetIsolate(), CompileErrorEventCounter);
6620 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = env.context();
6621
6622 CompileErrorEventCounterClear();
6623
6624 // Check initial state.
6625 CHECK_EQ(0, compile_error_event_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (0), (compile_error_event_count
), "0" " " "==" " " "compile_error_event_count")) { V8_Fatal(
"../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6625, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
6626
6627 // Throws SyntaxError: Unexpected end of input
6628 CHECK(do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str
(env->GetIsolate(), "+++")).IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 6629, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), \"+++\")).IsEmpty()"
); } } while (0)
6629 v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), "+++")).IsEmpty())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str
(env->GetIsolate(), "+++")).IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 6629, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), \"+++\")).IsEmpty()"
); } } while (0);
6630 CHECK_EQ(1, compile_error_event_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (compile_error_event_count
), "1" " " "==" " " "compile_error_event_count")) { V8_Fatal(
"../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6630, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
6631
6632 CHECK(v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), "/sel\\/: \\"))do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str
(env->GetIsolate(), "/sel\\/: \\")) .IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6633, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), \"/sel\\\\/: \\\\\")) .IsEmpty()"
); } } while (0)
6633 .IsEmpty())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str
(env->GetIsolate(), "/sel\\/: \\")) .IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6633, "Check failed: %s.", "v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), \"/sel\\\\/: \\\\\")) .IsEmpty()"
); } } while (0);
6634 CHECK_EQ(2, compile_error_event_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (2), (compile_error_event_count
), "2" " " "==" " " "compile_error_event_count")) { V8_Fatal(
"../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6634, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
6635
6636 v8::Local<v8::Script> script =
6637 v8::Script::Compile(context,
6638 v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), "JSON.parse('1234:')"))
6639 .ToLocalChecked();
6640 CHECK_EQ(2, compile_error_event_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (2), (compile_error_event_count
), "2" " " "==" " " "compile_error_event_count")) { V8_Fatal(
"../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6640, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
6641 CHECK(script->Run(context).IsEmpty())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(script->Run(context).IsEmpty
())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6641, "Check failed: %s."
, "script->Run(context).IsEmpty()"); } } while (0);
6642 CHECK_EQ(3, compile_error_event_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (3), (compile_error_event_count
), "3" " " "==" " " "compile_error_event_count")) { V8_Fatal(
"../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6642, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
6643
6644 v8::Script::Compile(context,
6645 v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), "new RegExp('/\\/\\\\');"))
6646 .ToLocalChecked();
6647 CHECK_EQ(3, compile_error_event_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (3), (compile_error_event_count
), "3" " " "==" " " "compile_error_event_count")) { V8_Fatal(
"../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6647, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
6648
6649 v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), "throw 1;"))
6650 .ToLocalChecked();
6651 CHECK_EQ(3, compile_error_event_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (3), (compile_error_event_count
), "3" " " "==" " " "compile_error_event_count")) { V8_Fatal(
"../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6651, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
6652}
6653
6654
6655// Tests that break event is sent when message handler is reset.
6656TEST(BreakMessageWhenMessageHandlerIsReset)static void TestBreakMessageWhenMessageHandlerIsReset(); CcTest
register_test_BreakMessageWhenMessageHandlerIsReset(TestBreakMessageWhenMessageHandlerIsReset
, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "BreakMessageWhenMessageHandlerIsReset"
, __null, true, true); static void TestBreakMessageWhenMessageHandlerIsReset
() {
6657 DebugLocalContext env;
6658 v8::HandleScope scope(env->GetIsolate());
6659 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = env.context();
6660 after_compile_message_count = 0;
6661 const char* script = "function f() {};";
6662
6663 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(env->GetIsolate(), AfterCompileMessageHandler);
6664 v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), script))
6665 .ToLocalChecked()
6666 ->Run(context)
6667 .ToLocalChecked();
6668 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(env->GetIsolate(), nullptr);
6669
6670 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(env->GetIsolate(), AfterCompileMessageHandler);
6671 v8::Debug::DebugBreak(env->GetIsolate());
6672 v8::Local<v8::Function> f = v8::Local<v8::Function>::Cast(
6673 env->Global()
6674 ->Get(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), "f"))
6675 .ToLocalChecked());
6676 f->Call(context, env->Global(), 0, NULL__null).ToLocalChecked();
6677
6678 // Setting message handler to NULL should cause debugger unload.
6679 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(env->GetIsolate(), nullptr);
6680 CheckDebuggerUnloaded(env->GetIsolate());
6681
6682 // Compilation cache should be disabled when debugger is active.
6683 CHECK_EQ(1, after_compile_message_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (after_compile_message_count
), "1" " " "==" " " "after_compile_message_count")) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6683, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
6684}
6685
6686
6687static int exception_event_count = 0;
6688static void ExceptionMessageHandler(const v8::Debug::Message& message) {
6689 if (message.IsEvent() && message.GetEvent() == v8::Exception) {
6690 exception_event_count++;
6691 SendContinueCommand();
6692 }
6693}
6694
6695
6696// Tests that exception event is sent when message handler is reset.
6697TEST(ExceptionMessageWhenMessageHandlerIsReset)static void TestExceptionMessageWhenMessageHandlerIsReset(); CcTest
register_test_ExceptionMessageWhenMessageHandlerIsReset(TestExceptionMessageWhenMessageHandlerIsReset
, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "ExceptionMessageWhenMessageHandlerIsReset"
, __null, true, true); static void TestExceptionMessageWhenMessageHandlerIsReset
() {
6698 DebugLocalContext env;
6699 v8::HandleScope scope(env->GetIsolate());
6700
6701 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = env.context();
6702 // For this test, we want to break on uncaught exceptions:
6703 ChangeBreakOnException(false, true);
6704
6705 exception_event_count = 0;
6706 const char* script = "function f() {throw new Error()};";
6707
6708 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(env->GetIsolate(), AfterCompileMessageHandler);
6709 v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), script))
6710 .ToLocalChecked()
6711 ->Run(context)
6712 .ToLocalChecked();
6713 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(env->GetIsolate(), nullptr);
6714
6715 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(env->GetIsolate(), ExceptionMessageHandler);
6716 v8::Local<v8::Function> f = v8::Local<v8::Function>::Cast(
6717 env->Global()
6718 ->Get(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), "f"))
6719 .ToLocalChecked());
6720 CHECK(f->Call(context, env->Global(), 0, NULL).IsEmpty())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(f->Call(context, env->Global
(), 0, __null).IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 6720, "Check failed: %s.", "f->Call(context, env->Global(), 0, NULL).IsEmpty()"
); } } while (0);
6721
6722 // Setting message handler to NULL should cause debugger unload.
6723 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(env->GetIsolate(), nullptr);
6724 CheckDebuggerUnloaded(env->GetIsolate());
6725
6726 CHECK_EQ(1, exception_event_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (exception_event_count
), "1" " " "==" " " "exception_event_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 6726, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
6727}
6728
6729
6730// Tests after compile event is sent when there are some provisional
6731// breakpoints out of the scripts lines range.
6732TEST(ProvisionalBreakpointOnLineOutOfRange)static void TestProvisionalBreakpointOnLineOutOfRange(); CcTest
register_test_ProvisionalBreakpointOnLineOutOfRange(TestProvisionalBreakpointOnLineOutOfRange
, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "ProvisionalBreakpointOnLineOutOfRange"
, __null, true, true); static void TestProvisionalBreakpointOnLineOutOfRange
() {
6733 DebugLocalContext env;
6734 v8::HandleScope scope(env->GetIsolate());
6735 env.ExposeDebug();
6736 const char* script = "function f() {};";
6737 const char* resource_name = "test_resource";
6738
6739 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(env->GetIsolate(), AfterCompileMessageHandler);
6740 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = env.context();
6741
6742 // Set a couple of provisional breakpoint on lines out of the script lines
6743 // range.
6744 int sbp1 = SetScriptBreakPointByNameFromJS(env->GetIsolate(), resource_name,
6745 3, -1 /* no column */);
6746 int sbp2 =
6747 SetScriptBreakPointByNameFromJS(env->GetIsolate(), resource_name, 5, 5);
6748
6749 after_compile_message_count = 0;
6750
6751 v8::ScriptOrigin origin(v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), resource_name),
6752 v8::Integer::New(env->GetIsolate(), 10),
6753 v8::Integer::New(env->GetIsolate(), 1));
6754 // Compile a script whose first line number is greater than the breakpoints'
6755 // lines.
6756 v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), script), &origin)
6757 .ToLocalChecked()
6758 ->Run(context)
6759 .ToLocalChecked();
6760
6761 // If the script is compiled successfully there is exactly one after compile
6762 // event. In case of an exception in debugger code after compile event is not
6763 // sent.
6764 CHECK_EQ(1, after_compile_message_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (after_compile_message_count
), "1" " " "==" " " "after_compile_message_count")) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6764, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
6765
6766 ClearBreakPointFromJS(env->GetIsolate(), sbp1);
6767 ClearBreakPointFromJS(env->GetIsolate(), sbp2);
6768 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(env->GetIsolate(), nullptr);
6769}
6770
6771
6772static void BreakMessageHandler(const v8::Debug::Message& message) {
6773 i::Isolate* isolate = CcTest::i_isolate();
6774 if (message.IsEvent() && message.GetEvent() == v8::Break) {
6775 // Count the number of breaks.
6776 break_point_hit_count++;
6777
6778 i::HandleScope scope(isolate);
6779 message.GetJSON();
6780
6781 SendContinueCommand();
6782 } else if (message.IsEvent() && message.GetEvent() == v8::AfterCompile) {
6783 i::HandleScope scope(isolate);
6784
6785 int current_count = break_point_hit_count;
6786
6787 // Force serialization to trigger some internal JS execution.
6788 message.GetJSON();
6789
6790 CHECK_EQ(current_count, break_point_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (current_count
), (break_point_hit_count), "current_count" " " "==" " " "break_point_hit_count"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6790, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
6791 }
6792}
6793
6794
6795// Test that if DebugBreak is forced it is ignored when code from
6796// debug-delay.js is executed.
6797TEST(NoDebugBreakInAfterCompileMessageHandler)static void TestNoDebugBreakInAfterCompileMessageHandler(); CcTest
register_test_NoDebugBreakInAfterCompileMessageHandler(TestNoDebugBreakInAfterCompileMessageHandler
, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "NoDebugBreakInAfterCompileMessageHandler"
, __null, true, true); static void TestNoDebugBreakInAfterCompileMessageHandler
() {
6798 DebugLocalContext env;
6799 v8::HandleScope scope(env->GetIsolate());
6800 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = env.context();
6801
6802 // Register a debug event listener which sets the break flag and counts.
6803 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(env->GetIsolate(), BreakMessageHandler);
6804
6805 // Set the debug break flag.
6806 v8::Debug::DebugBreak(env->GetIsolate());
6807
6808 // Create a function for testing stepping.
6809 const char* src = "function f() { eval('var x = 10;'); } ";
6810 v8::Local<v8::Function> f = CompileFunction(&env, src, "f");
6811
6812 // There should be only one break event.
6813 CHECK_EQ(1, break_point_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (break_point_hit_count
), "1" " " "==" " " "break_point_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 6813, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
6814
6815 // Set the debug break flag again.
6816 v8::Debug::DebugBreak(env->GetIsolate());
6817 f->Call(context, env->Global(), 0, NULL__null).ToLocalChecked();
6818 // There should be one more break event when the script is evaluated in 'f'.
6819 CHECK_EQ(2, break_point_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (2), (break_point_hit_count
), "2" " " "==" " " "break_point_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 6819, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
6820
6821 // Get rid of the debug message handler.
6822 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(env->GetIsolate(), nullptr);
6823 CheckDebuggerUnloaded(env->GetIsolate());
6824}
6825
6826
6827static int counting_message_handler_counter;
6828
6829static void CountingMessageHandler(const v8::Debug::Message& message) {
6830 if (message.IsResponse()) counting_message_handler_counter++;
6831}
6832
6833
6834// Test that debug messages get processed when ProcessDebugMessages is called.
6835TEST(ProcessDebugMessages)static void TestProcessDebugMessages(); CcTest register_test_ProcessDebugMessages
(TestProcessDebugMessages, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "ProcessDebugMessages"
, __null, true, true); static void TestProcessDebugMessages() {
6836 DebugLocalContext env;
6837 v8::Isolate* isolate = env->GetIsolate();
6838 v8::HandleScope scope(isolate);
6839
6840 counting_message_handler_counter = 0;
6841
6842 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(isolate, CountingMessageHandler);
6843
6844 const int kBufferSize = 1000;
6845 uint16_t buffer[kBufferSize];
6846 const char* scripts_command =
6847 "{\"seq\":0,"
6848 "\"type\":\"request\","
6849 "\"command\":\"scripts\"}";
6850
6851 // Send scripts command.
6852 v8::Debug::SendCommand(
6853 isolate, buffer, AsciiToUtf16(scripts_command, buffer));
6854
6855 CHECK_EQ(0, counting_message_handler_counter)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (0), (counting_message_handler_counter
), "0" " " "==" " " "counting_message_handler_counter")) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6855, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
6856 v8::Debug::ProcessDebugMessages(isolate);
6857 // At least one message should come
6858 CHECK_GE(counting_message_handler_counter, 1)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckGEImpl( (counting_message_handler_counter
), (1), "counting_message_handler_counter" " " ">=" " " "1"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6858, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
6859
6860 counting_message_handler_counter = 0;
6861
6862 v8::Debug::SendCommand(
6863 isolate, buffer, AsciiToUtf16(scripts_command, buffer));
6864 v8::Debug::SendCommand(
6865 isolate, buffer, AsciiToUtf16(scripts_command, buffer));
6866 CHECK_EQ(0, counting_message_handler_counter)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (0), (counting_message_handler_counter
), "0" " " "==" " " "counting_message_handler_counter")) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6866, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
6867 v8::Debug::ProcessDebugMessages(isolate);
6868 // At least two messages should come
6869 CHECK_GE(counting_message_handler_counter, 2)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckGEImpl( (counting_message_handler_counter
), (2), "counting_message_handler_counter" " " ">=" " " "2"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6869, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
6870
6871 // Get rid of the debug message handler.
6872 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(isolate, nullptr);
6873 CheckDebuggerUnloaded(isolate);
6874}
6875
6876
6877class SendCommandThread;
6878static SendCommandThread* send_command_thread_ = NULL__null;
6879
6880
6881class SendCommandThread : public v8::base::Thread {
6882 public:
6883 explicit SendCommandThread(v8::Isolate* isolate)
6884 : Thread(Options("SendCommandThread")),
6885 semaphore_(0),
6886 isolate_(isolate) {}
6887
6888 static void CountingAndSignallingMessageHandler(
6889 const v8::Debug::Message& message) {
6890 if (message.IsResponse()) {
6891 counting_message_handler_counter++;
6892 send_command_thread_->semaphore_.Signal();
6893 }
6894 }
6895
6896 virtual void Run() {
6897 semaphore_.Wait();
6898 const int kBufferSize = 1000;
6899 uint16_t buffer[kBufferSize];
6900 const char* scripts_command =
6901 "{\"seq\":0,"
6902 "\"type\":\"request\","
6903 "\"command\":\"scripts\"}";
6904 int length = AsciiToUtf16(scripts_command, buffer);
6905 // Send scripts command.
6906
6907 for (int i = 0; i < 20; i++) {
6908 v8::base::ElapsedTimer timer;
6909 timer.Start();
6910 CHECK_EQ(i, counting_message_handler_counter)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (i), (counting_message_handler_counter
), "i" " " "==" " " "counting_message_handler_counter")) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6910, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
6911 // Queue debug message.
6912 v8::Debug::SendCommand(isolate_, buffer, length);
6913 // Wait for the message handler to pick up the response.
6914 semaphore_.Wait();
6915 i::PrintF("iteration %d took %f ms\n", i,
6916 timer.Elapsed().InMillisecondsF());
6917 }
6918
6919 isolate_->TerminateExecution();
6920 }
6921
6922 void StartSending() { semaphore_.Signal(); }
6923
6924 private:
6925 v8::base::Semaphore semaphore_;
6926 v8::Isolate* isolate_;
6927};
6928
6929
6930static void StartSendingCommands(
6931 const v8::FunctionCallbackInfo<v8::Value>& info) {
6932 send_command_thread_->StartSending();
6933}
6934
6935
6936TEST(ProcessDebugMessagesThreaded)static void TestProcessDebugMessagesThreaded(); CcTest register_test_ProcessDebugMessagesThreaded
(TestProcessDebugMessagesThreaded, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, "ProcessDebugMessagesThreaded", __null, true, true); static
void TestProcessDebugMessagesThreaded() {
6937 DebugLocalContext env;
6938 v8::Isolate* isolate = env->GetIsolate();
6939 v8::HandleScope scope(isolate);
6940 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = env.context();
6941
6942 counting_message_handler_counter = 0;
6943
6944 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(
6945 isolate, SendCommandThread::CountingAndSignallingMessageHandler);
6946 send_command_thread_ = new SendCommandThread(isolate);
6947 send_command_thread_->Start();
6948
6949 v8::Local<v8::FunctionTemplate> start =
6950 v8::FunctionTemplate::New(isolate, StartSendingCommands);
6951 CHECK(env->Global()do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str("start"), start->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked
()) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 6954, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(\"start\"), start->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
6952 ->Set(context, v8_str("start"),do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str("start"), start->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked
()) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 6954, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(\"start\"), start->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
6953 start->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str("start"), start->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked
()) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 6954, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(\"start\"), start->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
6954 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str("start"), start->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked
()) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 6954, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(\"start\"), start->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
6955
6956 CompileRun("start(); while (true) { }");
6957
6958 CHECK_EQ(20, counting_message_handler_counter)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (20), (
counting_message_handler_counter), "20" " " "==" " " "counting_message_handler_counter"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 6958, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
6959
6960 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(isolate, nullptr);
6961 CheckDebuggerUnloaded(isolate);
6962}
6963
6964
6965struct BacktraceData {
6966 static int frame_counter;
6967 static void MessageHandler(const v8::Debug::Message& message) {
6968 char print_buffer[1000];
6969 v8::String::Value json(message.GetJSON());
6970 Utf16ToAscii(*json, json.length(), print_buffer, 1000);
6971
6972 if (strstr(print_buffer, "backtrace") == NULL__null) {
6973 return;
6974 }
6975 frame_counter = GetTotalFramesInt(print_buffer);
6976 }
6977};
6978
6979int BacktraceData::frame_counter;
6980
6981
6982// Test that debug messages get processed when ProcessDebugMessages is called.
6983TEST(Backtrace)static void TestBacktrace(); CcTest register_test_Backtrace(TestBacktrace
, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "Backtrace", __null, true, true
); static void TestBacktrace() {
6984 DebugLocalContext env;
6985 v8::Isolate* isolate = env->GetIsolate();
6986 v8::HandleScope scope(isolate);
6987 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = env.context();
6988
6989 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(isolate, BacktraceData::MessageHandler);
6990
6991 const int kBufferSize = 1000;
6992 uint16_t buffer[kBufferSize];
6993 const char* scripts_command =
6994 "{\"seq\":0,"
6995 "\"type\":\"request\","
6996 "\"command\":\"backtrace\"}";
6997
6998 // Check backtrace from ProcessDebugMessages.
6999 BacktraceData::frame_counter = -10;
7000 v8::Debug::SendCommand(
7001 isolate,
7002 buffer,
7003 AsciiToUtf16(scripts_command, buffer),
7004 NULL__null);
7005 v8::Debug::ProcessDebugMessages(isolate);
7006 CHECK_EQ(BacktraceData::frame_counter, 0)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (BacktraceData
::frame_counter), (0), "BacktraceData::frame_counter" " " "=="
" " "0")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7006, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
7007
7008 v8::Local<v8::String> void0 = v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), "void(0)");
7009 v8::Local<v8::Script> script = CompileWithOrigin(void0, void0);
7010
7011 // Check backtrace from "void(0)" script.
7012 BacktraceData::frame_counter = -10;
7013 v8::Debug::SendCommand(
7014 isolate,
7015 buffer,
7016 AsciiToUtf16(scripts_command, buffer),
7017 NULL__null);
7018 script->Run(context).ToLocalChecked();
7019 CHECK_EQ(BacktraceData::frame_counter, 1)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (BacktraceData
::frame_counter), (1), "BacktraceData::frame_counter" " " "=="
" " "1")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7019, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
7020
7021 // Get rid of the debug message handler.
7022 v8::Debug::SetMessageHandler(isolate, nullptr);
7023 CheckDebuggerUnloaded(isolate);
7024}
7025
7026
7027TEST(GetMirror)static void TestGetMirror(); CcTest register_test_GetMirror(TestGetMirror
, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "GetMirror", __null, true, true
); static void TestGetMirror() {
7028 DebugLocalContext env;
7029 v8::Isolate* isolate = env->GetIsolate();
7030 v8::HandleScope scope(isolate);
7031 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = env.context();
7032 v8::Local<v8::Value> obj =
7033 v8::Debug::GetMirror(context, v8_str(isolate, "hodja")).ToLocalChecked();
7034 v8::ScriptCompiler::Source source(v8_str(
7035 "function runTest(mirror) {"
7036 " return mirror.isString() && (mirror.length() == 5);"
7037 "}"
7038 ""
7039 "runTest;"));
7040 v8::Local<v8::Function> run_test = v8::Local<v8::Function>::Cast(
7041 v8::ScriptCompiler::CompileUnboundScript(isolate, &source)
7042 .ToLocalChecked()
7043 ->BindToCurrentContext()
7044 ->Run(context)
7045 .ToLocalChecked());
7046 v8::Local<v8::Value> result =
7047 run_test->Call(context, env->Global(), 1, &obj).ToLocalChecked();
7048 CHECK(result->IsTrue())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(result->IsTrue())), 0))) {
V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7048, "Check failed: %s."
, "result->IsTrue()"); } } while (0);
7049}
7050
7051
7052// Test that the debug break flag works with function.apply.
7053TEST(DebugBreakFunctionApply)static void TestDebugBreakFunctionApply(); CcTest register_test_DebugBreakFunctionApply
(TestDebugBreakFunctionApply, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc",
"DebugBreakFunctionApply", __null, true, true); static void TestDebugBreakFunctionApply
() {
