7054 DebugLocalContext env;
7055 v8::HandleScope scope(env->GetIsolate());
7056 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = env.context();
7057
7058 // Create a function for testing breaking in apply.
7059 v8::Local<v8::Function> foo = CompileFunction(
7060 &env,
7061 "function baz(x) { }"
7062 "function bar(x) { baz(); }"
7063 "function foo(){ bar.apply(this, [1]); }",
7064 "foo");
7065
7066 // Register a debug event listener which steps and counts.
7067 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(env->GetIsolate(), DebugEventBreakMax);
7068
7069 // Set the debug break flag before calling the code using function.apply.
7070 v8::Debug::DebugBreak(env->GetIsolate());
7071
7072 // Limit the number of debug breaks. This is a regression test for issue 493
7073 // where this test would enter an infinite loop.
7074 break_point_hit_count = 0;
7075 max_break_point_hit_count = 10000; // 10000 => infinite loop.
7076 foo->Call(context, env->Global(), 0, NULL__null).ToLocalChecked();
7077
7078 // When keeping the debug break several break will happen.
7079 CHECK_GT(break_point_hit_count, 1)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckGTImpl( (break_point_hit_count
), (1), "break_point_hit_count" " " ">" " " "1")) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7079, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
7080
7081 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(env->GetIsolate(), nullptr);
7082 CheckDebuggerUnloaded(env->GetIsolate());
7083}
7084
7085
7086v8::Local<v8::Context> debugee_context;
7087v8::Local<v8::Context> debugger_context;
7088
7089
7090// Property getter that checks that current and calling contexts
7091// are both the debugee contexts.
7092static void NamedGetterWithCallingContextCheck(
7093 v8::Local<v8::String> name,
7094 const v8::PropertyCallbackInfo<v8::Value>& info) {
7095 CHECK_EQ(0, strcmp(*v8::String::Utf8Value(name), "a"))do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (0), (strcmp
(*v8::String::Utf8Value(name), "a")), "0" " " "==" " " "strcmp(*v8::String::Utf8Value(name), \"a\")"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7095, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
7096 v8::Local<v8::Context> current = info.GetIsolate()->GetCurrentContext();
7097 CHECK(current == debugee_context)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(current == debugee_context)),
0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7097, "Check failed: %s."
, "current == debugee_context"); } } while (0);
7098 CHECK(current != debugger_context)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(current != debugger_context))
, 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7098, "Check failed: %s."
, "current != debugger_context"); } } while (0);
7099 info.GetReturnValue().Set(1);
7100}
7101
7102
7103// Debug event listener that checks if the first argument of a function is
7104// an object with property 'a' == 1. If the property has custom accessor
7105// this handler will eventually invoke it.
7106static void DebugEventGetAtgumentPropertyValue(
7107 const v8::Debug::EventDetails& event_details) {
7108 v8::DebugEvent event = event_details.GetEvent();
7109 v8::Local<v8::Object> exec_state = event_details.GetExecutionState();
7110 if (event == v8::Break) {
7111 break_point_hit_count++;
7112 CHECK(debugger_context == CcTest::isolate()->GetCurrentContext())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(debugger_context == CcTest::isolate
()->GetCurrentContext())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 7112, "Check failed: %s.", "debugger_context == CcTest::isolate()->GetCurrentContext()"
); } } while (0);
7113 v8::Local<v8::Function> func = v8::Local<v8::Function>::Cast(CompileRun(
7114 "(function(exec_state) {\n"
7115 " return (exec_state.frame(0).argumentValue(0).property('a').\n"
7116 " value().value() == 1);\n"
7117 "})"));
7118 const int argc = 1;
7119 v8::Local<v8::Value> argv[argc] = {exec_state};
7120 v8::Local<v8::Value> result =
7121 func->Call(debugger_context, exec_state, argc, argv).ToLocalChecked();
7122 CHECK(result->IsTrue())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(result->IsTrue())), 0))) {
V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7122, "Check failed: %s."
, "result->IsTrue()"); } } while (0);
7123 }
7124}
7125
7126
7127TEST(CallingContextIsNotDebugContext)static void TestCallingContextIsNotDebugContext(); CcTest register_test_CallingContextIsNotDebugContext
(TestCallingContextIsNotDebugContext, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, "CallingContextIsNotDebugContext", __null, true, true); static
void TestCallingContextIsNotDebugContext() {
7128 v8::internal::Debug* debug = CcTest::i_isolate()->debug();
7129 // Create and enter a debugee context.
7130 DebugLocalContext env;
7131 v8::Isolate* isolate = env->GetIsolate();
7132 v8::HandleScope scope(isolate);
7133 env.ExposeDebug();
7134
7135 // Save handles to the debugger and debugee contexts to be used in
7136 // NamedGetterWithCallingContextCheck.
7137 debugee_context = env.context();
7138 debugger_context = v8::Utils::ToLocal(debug->debug_context());
7139
7140 // Create object with 'a' property accessor.
7141 v8::Local<v8::ObjectTemplate> named = v8::ObjectTemplate::New(isolate);
7142 named->SetAccessor(v8_str(isolate, "a"), NamedGetterWithCallingContextCheck);
7143 CHECK(env->Global()do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(debugee_context
, v8_str(isolate, "obj"), named->NewInstance(debugee_context
).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 7146, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(debugee_context, v8_str(isolate, \"obj\"), named->NewInstance(debugee_context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
7144 ->Set(debugee_context, v8_str(isolate, "obj"),do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(debugee_context
, v8_str(isolate, "obj"), named->NewInstance(debugee_context
).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 7146, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(debugee_context, v8_str(isolate, \"obj\"), named->NewInstance(debugee_context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
7145 named->NewInstance(debugee_context).ToLocalChecked())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(debugee_context
, v8_str(isolate, "obj"), named->NewInstance(debugee_context
).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 7146, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(debugee_context, v8_str(isolate, \"obj\"), named->NewInstance(debugee_context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
7146 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(debugee_context
, v8_str(isolate, "obj"), named->NewInstance(debugee_context
).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 7146, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(debugee_context, v8_str(isolate, \"obj\"), named->NewInstance(debugee_context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
7147
7148 // Register the debug event listener
7149 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(isolate, DebugEventGetAtgumentPropertyValue);
7150
7151 // Create a function that invokes debugger.
7152 v8::Local<v8::Function> foo = CompileFunction(
7153 &env,
7154 "function bar(x) { debugger; }"
7155 "function foo(){ bar(obj); }",
7156 "foo");
7157
7158 break_point_hit_count = 0;
7159 foo->Call(debugee_context, env->Global(), 0, NULL__null).ToLocalChecked();
7160 CHECK_EQ(1, break_point_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (break_point_hit_count
), "1" " " "==" " " "break_point_hit_count")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 7160, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
7161
7162 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(isolate, nullptr);
7163 debugee_context = v8::Local<v8::Context>();
7164 debugger_context = v8::Local<v8::Context>();
7165 CheckDebuggerUnloaded(isolate);
7166}
7167
7168
7169TEST(DebugContextIsPreservedBetweenAccesses)static void TestDebugContextIsPreservedBetweenAccesses(); CcTest
register_test_DebugContextIsPreservedBetweenAccesses(TestDebugContextIsPreservedBetweenAccesses
, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "DebugContextIsPreservedBetweenAccesses"
, __null, true, true); static void TestDebugContextIsPreservedBetweenAccesses
() {
7170 v8::HandleScope scope(CcTest::isolate());
7171 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(CcTest::isolate(),
7172 DebugEventBreakPointHitCount);
7173 v8::Local<v8::Context> context1 =
7174 v8::Debug::GetDebugContext(CcTest::isolate());
7175 v8::Local<v8::Context> context2 =
7176 v8::Debug::GetDebugContext(CcTest::isolate());
7177 CHECK(v8::Utils::OpenHandle(*context1).is_identical_to(do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Utils::OpenHandle(*context1
).is_identical_to( v8::Utils::OpenHandle(*context2)))), 0))) {
V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7178, "Check failed: %s."
, "v8::Utils::OpenHandle(*context1).is_identical_to( v8::Utils::OpenHandle(*context2))"
); } } while (0)
7178 v8::Utils::OpenHandle(*context2)))do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(v8::Utils::OpenHandle(*context1
).is_identical_to( v8::Utils::OpenHandle(*context2)))), 0))) {
V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7178, "Check failed: %s."
, "v8::Utils::OpenHandle(*context1).is_identical_to( v8::Utils::OpenHandle(*context2))"
); } } while (0);
7179 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(CcTest::isolate(), nullptr);
7180}

7183TEST(NoDebugContextWhenDebuggerDisabled)static void TestNoDebugContextWhenDebuggerDisabled(); CcTest register_test_NoDebugContextWhenDebuggerDisabled
(TestNoDebugContextWhenDebuggerDisabled, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, "NoDebugContextWhenDebuggerDisabled", __null, true, true); static
void TestNoDebugContextWhenDebuggerDisabled() {
7184 v8::HandleScope scope(CcTest::isolate());
7185 v8::Local<v8::Context> context =
7186 v8::Debug::GetDebugContext(CcTest::isolate());
7187 CHECK(context.IsEmpty())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(context.IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7187, "Check failed: %s.", "context.IsEmpty()"
); } } while (0);
7188}
7189
7190
7191static v8::Local<v8::Value> expected_callback_data;
7192static void DebugEventContextChecker(const v8::Debug::EventDetails& details) {
7193 CHECK(details.GetEventContext() == expected_context)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(details.GetEventContext() == expected_context
)), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7193, "Check failed: %s."
, "details.GetEventContext() == expected_context"); } } while
(0);
7194 CHECK(expected_callback_data->Equals(details.GetEventContext(),do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(expected_callback_data->Equals
(details.GetEventContext(), details.GetCallbackData()) .FromJust
())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7196, "Check failed: %s."
, "expected_callback_data->Equals(details.GetEventContext(), details.GetCallbackData()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
7195 details.GetCallbackData())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(expected_callback_data->Equals
(details.GetEventContext(), details.GetCallbackData()) .FromJust
())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7196, "Check failed: %s."
, "expected_callback_data->Equals(details.GetEventContext(), details.GetCallbackData()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
7196 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(expected_callback_data->Equals
(details.GetEventContext(), details.GetCallbackData()) .FromJust
())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7196, "Check failed: %s."
, "expected_callback_data->Equals(details.GetEventContext(), details.GetCallbackData()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
7197}
7198
7199
7200// Check that event details contain context where debug event occured.
7201TEST(DebugEventContext)static void TestDebugEventContext(); CcTest register_test_DebugEventContext
(TestDebugEventContext, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "DebugEventContext"
, __null, true, true); static void TestDebugEventContext() {
7202 v8::Isolate* isolate = CcTest::isolate();
7203 v8::HandleScope scope(isolate);
7204 expected_context = v8::Context::New(isolate);
7205 expected_callback_data = v8::Int32::New(isolate, 2010);
7206 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(isolate, DebugEventContextChecker,
7207 expected_callback_data);
7208 v8::Context::Scope context_scope(expected_context);
7209 v8::Script::Compile(expected_context,
7210 v8_str(isolate, "(function(){debugger;})();"))
7211 .ToLocalChecked()
7212 ->Run(expected_context)
7213 .ToLocalChecked();
7214 expected_context.Clear();
7215 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(isolate, nullptr);
7216 expected_context_data = v8::Local<v8::Value>();
7217 CheckDebuggerUnloaded(isolate);
7218}
7219
7220
7221static bool debug_event_break_deoptimize_done = false;
7222
7223static void DebugEventBreakDeoptimize(
7224 const v8::Debug::EventDetails& event_details) {
7225 v8::DebugEvent event = event_details.GetEvent();
7226 v8::Local<v8::Object> exec_state = event_details.GetExecutionState();
7227 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = CcTest::isolate()->GetCurrentContext();
7228 if (event == v8::Break) {
7229 if (!frame_function_name.IsEmpty()) {
7230 // Get the name of the function.
7231 const int argc = 2;
7232 v8::Local<v8::Value> argv[argc] = {
7233 exec_state, v8::Integer::New(CcTest::isolate(), 0)};
7234 v8::Local<v8::Value> result =
7235 frame_function_name->Call(context, exec_state, argc, argv)
7236 .ToLocalChecked();
7237 if (!result->IsUndefined()) {
7238 char fn[80];
7239 CHECK(result->IsString())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(result->IsString())), 0)))
{ V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7239, "Check failed: %s."
, "result->IsString()"); } } while (0);
7240 v8::Local<v8::String> function_name(
7241 result->ToString(context).ToLocalChecked());
7242 function_name->WriteUtf8(fn);
7243 if (strcmp(fn, "bar") == 0) {
7244 i::Deoptimizer::DeoptimizeAll(CcTest::i_isolate());
7245 debug_event_break_deoptimize_done = true;
7246 }
7247 }
7248 }
7249
7250 v8::Debug::DebugBreak(CcTest::isolate());
7251 }
7252}
7253
7254
7255// Test deoptimization when execution is broken using the debug break stack
7256// check interrupt.
7257TEST(DeoptimizeDuringDebugBreak)static void TestDeoptimizeDuringDebugBreak(); CcTest register_test_DeoptimizeDuringDebugBreak
(TestDeoptimizeDuringDebugBreak, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, "DeoptimizeDuringDebugBreak", __null, true, true); static void
TestDeoptimizeDuringDebugBreak() {
7258 DebugLocalContext env;
7259 v8::HandleScope scope(env->GetIsolate());
7260 env.ExposeDebug();
7261 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = env.context();
7262
7263 // Create a function for checking the function when hitting a break point.
7264 frame_function_name = CompileFunction(&env,
7265 frame_function_name_source,
7266 "frame_function_name");
7267
7268 // Set a debug event listener which will keep interrupting execution until
7269 // debug break. When inside function bar it will deoptimize all functions.
7270 // This tests lazy deoptimization bailout for the stack check, as the first
7271 // time in function bar when using debug break and no break points will be at
7272 // the initial stack check.
7273 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(env->GetIsolate(),
7274 DebugEventBreakDeoptimize);
7275
7276 // Compile and run function bar which will optimize it for some flag settings.
7277 v8::Local<v8::Function> f = CompileFunction(&env, "function bar(){}", "bar");
7278 f->Call(context, v8::Undefined(env->GetIsolate()), 0, NULL__null).ToLocalChecked();
7279
7280 // Set debug break and call bar again.
7281 v8::Debug::DebugBreak(env->GetIsolate());
7282 f->Call(context, v8::Undefined(env->GetIsolate()), 0, NULL__null).ToLocalChecked();
7283
7284 CHECK(debug_event_break_deoptimize_done)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(debug_event_break_deoptimize_done
)), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7284, "Check failed: %s."
, "debug_event_break_deoptimize_done"); } } while (0);
7285
7286 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(env->GetIsolate(), nullptr);
7287}
7288
7289
7290static void DebugEventBreakWithOptimizedStack(
7291 const v8::Debug::EventDetails& event_details) {
7292 v8::Isolate* isolate = event_details.GetEventContext()->GetIsolate();
7293 v8::DebugEvent event = event_details.GetEvent();
7294 v8::Local<v8::Object> exec_state = event_details.GetExecutionState();
7295 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = isolate->GetCurrentContext();
7296 if (event == v8::Break) {
7297 if (!frame_function_name.IsEmpty()) {
7298 for (int i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
7299 const int argc = 2;
7300 v8::Local<v8::Value> argv[argc] = {exec_state,
7301 v8::Integer::New(isolate, i)};
7302 // Get the name of the function in frame i.
7303 v8::Local<v8::Value> result =
7304 frame_function_name->Call(context, exec_state, argc, argv)
7305 .ToLocalChecked();
7306 CHECK(result->IsString())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(result->IsString())), 0)))
{ V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7306, "Check failed: %s."
, "result->IsString()"); } } while (0);
7307 v8::Local<v8::String> function_name(
7308 result->ToString(context).ToLocalChecked());
7309 CHECK(do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(function_name->Equals(context
, v8_str(isolate, "loop")).FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 7310, "Check failed: %s.", "function_name->Equals(context, v8_str(isolate, \"loop\")).FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
7310 function_name->Equals(context, v8_str(isolate, "loop")).FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(function_name->Equals(context
, v8_str(isolate, "loop")).FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 7310, "Check failed: %s.", "function_name->Equals(context, v8_str(isolate, \"loop\")).FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
7311 // Get the name of the first argument in frame i.
7312 result = frame_argument_name->Call(context, exec_state, argc, argv)
7313 .ToLocalChecked();
7314 CHECK(result->IsString())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(result->IsString())), 0)))
{ V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7314, "Check failed: %s."
, "result->IsString()"); } } while (0);
7315 v8::Local<v8::String> argument_name(
7316 result->ToString(context).ToLocalChecked());
7317 CHECK(argument_name->Equals(context, v8_str(isolate, "count"))do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(argument_name->Equals(context
, v8_str(isolate, "count")) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 7318, "Check failed: %s.", "argument_name->Equals(context, v8_str(isolate, \"count\")) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
7318 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(argument_name->Equals(context
, v8_str(isolate, "count")) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 7318, "Check failed: %s.", "argument_name->Equals(context, v8_str(isolate, \"count\")) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
7319 // Get the value of the first argument in frame i. If the
7320 // function is optimized the value will be undefined, otherwise
7321 // the value will be '1 - i'.
7322 //
7323 // TODO(3141533): We should be able to get the real value for
7324 // optimized frames.
7325 result = frame_argument_value->Call(context, exec_state, argc, argv)
7326 .ToLocalChecked();
7327 CHECK(result->IsUndefined() ||do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(result->IsUndefined() || (
result->Int32Value(context).FromJust() == 1 - i))), 0))) {
V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7328, "Check failed: %s."
, "result->IsUndefined() || (result->Int32Value(context).FromJust() == 1 - i)"
); } } while (0)
7328 (result->Int32Value(context).FromJust() == 1 - i))do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(result->IsUndefined() || (
result->Int32Value(context).FromJust() == 1 - i))), 0))) {
V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7328, "Check failed: %s."
, "result->IsUndefined() || (result->Int32Value(context).FromJust() == 1 - i)"
); } } while (0);
7329 // Get the name of the first local variable.
7330 result = frame_local_name->Call(context, exec_state, argc, argv)
7331 .ToLocalChecked();
7332 CHECK(result->IsString())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(result->IsString())), 0)))
{ V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7332, "Check failed: %s."
, "result->IsString()"); } } while (0);
7333 v8::Local<v8::String> local_name(
7334 result->ToString(context).ToLocalChecked());
7335 CHECK(local_name->Equals(context, v8_str(isolate, "local")).FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(local_name->Equals(context
, v8_str(isolate, "local")).FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 7335, "Check failed: %s.", "local_name->Equals(context, v8_str(isolate, \"local\")).FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
7336 // Get the value of the first local variable. If the function
7337 // is optimized the value will be undefined, otherwise it will
7338 // be 42.
7339 //
7340 // TODO(3141533): We should be able to get the real value for
7341 // optimized frames.
7342 result = frame_local_value->Call(context, exec_state, argc, argv)
7343 .ToLocalChecked();
7344 CHECK(result->IsUndefined() ||do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(result->IsUndefined() || (
result->Int32Value(context).FromJust() == 42))), 0))) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7345, "Check failed: %s.", "result->IsUndefined() || (result->Int32Value(context).FromJust() == 42)"
); } } while (0)
7345 (result->Int32Value(context).FromJust() == 42))do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(result->IsUndefined() || (
result->Int32Value(context).FromJust() == 42))), 0))) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7345, "Check failed: %s.", "result->IsUndefined() || (result->Int32Value(context).FromJust() == 42)"
); } } while (0);
7346 }
7347 }
7348 }
7349}
7350
7351
7352static void ScheduleBreak(const v8::FunctionCallbackInfo<v8::Value>& args) {
7353 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(args.GetIsolate(),
7354 DebugEventBreakWithOptimizedStack);
7355 v8::Debug::DebugBreak(args.GetIsolate());
7356}
7357
7358
7359TEST(DebugBreakStackInspection)static void TestDebugBreakStackInspection(); CcTest register_test_DebugBreakStackInspection
(TestDebugBreakStackInspection, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, "DebugBreakStackInspection", __null, true, true); static void
TestDebugBreakStackInspection() {
7360 DebugLocalContext env;
7361 v8::HandleScope scope(env->GetIsolate());
7362 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = env.context();
7363
7364 frame_function_name =
7365 CompileFunction(&env, frame_function_name_source, "frame_function_name");
7366 frame_argument_name =
7367 CompileFunction(&env, frame_argument_name_source, "frame_argument_name");
7368 frame_argument_value = CompileFunction(&env,
7369 frame_argument_value_source,
7370 "frame_argument_value");
7371 frame_local_name =
7372 CompileFunction(&env, frame_local_name_source, "frame_local_name");
7373 frame_local_value =
7374 CompileFunction(&env, frame_local_value_source, "frame_local_value");
7375
7376 v8::Local<v8::FunctionTemplate> schedule_break_template =
7377 v8::FunctionTemplate::New(env->GetIsolate(), ScheduleBreak);
7378 v8::Local<v8::Function> schedule_break =
7379 schedule_break_template->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked();
7380 CHECK(env->Global()do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str("scheduleBreak"), schedule_break) .FromJust())), 0))
) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7382, "Check failed: %s."
, "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(\"scheduleBreak\"), schedule_break) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
7381 ->Set(context, v8_str("scheduleBreak"), schedule_break)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str("scheduleBreak"), schedule_break) .FromJust())), 0))
) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7382, "Check failed: %s."
, "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(\"scheduleBreak\"), schedule_break) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
7382 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str("scheduleBreak"), schedule_break) .FromJust())), 0))
) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7382, "Check failed: %s."
, "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(\"scheduleBreak\"), schedule_break) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
7383
7384 const char* src =
7385 "function loop(count) {"
7386 " var local = 42;"
7387 " if (count < 1) { scheduleBreak(); loop(count + 1); }"
7388 "}"
7389 "loop(0);";
7390 v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), src))
7391 .ToLocalChecked()
7392 ->Run(context)
7393 .ToLocalChecked();
7394}
7395
7396
7397// Test that setting the terminate execution flag during debug break processing.
7398static void TestDebugBreakInLoop(const char* loop_head,
7399 const char** loop_bodies,
7400 const char* loop_tail) {
7401 // Receive 10 breaks for each test and then terminate JavaScript execution.
7402 static const int kBreaksPerTest = 10;
7403
7404 for (int i = 0; loop_bodies[i] != NULL__null; i++) {
7405 // Perform a lazy deoptimization after various numbers of breaks
7406 // have been hit.
7407
7408 EmbeddedVector<char, 1024> buffer;
7409 SNPrintF(buffer, "function f() {%s%s%s}", loop_head, loop_bodies[i],
7410 loop_tail);
7411
7412 i::PrintF("%s\n", buffer.start());
7413
7414 for (int j = 0; j < 3; j++) {
7415 break_point_hit_count_deoptimize = j;
7416 if (j == 2) {
7417 break_point_hit_count_deoptimize = kBreaksPerTest;
7418 }
7419
7420 break_point_hit_count = 0;
7421 max_break_point_hit_count = kBreaksPerTest;
7422 terminate_after_max_break_point_hit = true;
7423
7424 // Function with infinite loop.
7425 CompileRun(buffer.start());
7426
7427 // Set the debug break to enter the debugger as soon as possible.
7428 v8::Debug::DebugBreak(CcTest::isolate());
7429
7430 // Call function with infinite loop.
7431 CompileRun("f();");
7432 CHECK_EQ(kBreaksPerTest, break_point_hit_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (kBreaksPerTest
), (break_point_hit_count), "kBreaksPerTest" " " "==" " " "break_point_hit_count"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7432, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
7433
7434 CHECK(!CcTest::isolate()->IsExecutionTerminating())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(!CcTest::isolate()->IsExecutionTerminating
())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7434, "Check failed: %s."
, "!CcTest::isolate()->IsExecutionTerminating()"); } } while
(0);
7435 }
7436 }
7437}
7438
7439
7440static const char* loop_bodies_1[] = {"",
7441 "g()",
7442 "if (a == 0) { g() }",
7443 "if (a == 1) { g() }",
7444 "if (a == 0) { g() } else { h() }",
7445 "if (a == 0) { continue }",
7446 NULL__null};
7447
7448
7449static const char* loop_bodies_2[] = {
7450 "if (a == 1) { continue }",
7451 "switch (a) { case 1: g(); }",
7452 "switch (a) { case 1: continue; }",
7453 "switch (a) { case 1: g(); break; default: h() }",
7454 "switch (a) { case 1: continue; break; default: h() }",
7455 NULL__null};
7456
7457
7458void DebugBreakLoop(const char* loop_header, const char** loop_bodies,
7459 const char* loop_footer) {
7460 DebugLocalContext env;
7461 v8::HandleScope scope(env->GetIsolate());
7462
7463 // Register a debug event listener which sets the break flag and counts.
7464 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(env->GetIsolate(), DebugEventBreakMax);
7465
7466 CompileRun(
7467 "var a = 1;\n"
7468 "function g() { }\n"
7469 "function h() { }");
7470
7471 TestDebugBreakInLoop(loop_header, loop_bodies, loop_footer);
7472
7473 // Get rid of the debug event listener.
7474 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(env->GetIsolate(), nullptr);
7475 CheckDebuggerUnloaded(env->GetIsolate());
7476}
7477

(TestDebugBreakInWhileTrue1, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "DebugBreakInWhileTrue1"
, __null, true, true); static void TestDebugBreakInWhileTrue1
() {
7480 DebugBreakLoop("while (true) {", loop_bodies_1, "}");
7481}

7533
7534
7535v8::Local<v8::Script> inline_script;
7536
7537static void DebugBreakInlineListener(
7538 const v8::Debug::EventDetails& event_details) {
7539 v8::DebugEvent event = event_details.GetEvent();
7540 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = CcTest::isolate()->GetCurrentContext();
7541 if (event != v8::Break) return;
7542
7543 int expected_frame_count = 4;
7544 int expected_line_number[] = {1, 4, 7, 12};
7545
7546 i::Handle<i::Object> compiled_script = v8::Utils::OpenHandle(*inline_script);
7547 i::Handle<i::Script> source_script = i::Handle<i::Script>(i::Script::cast(
7548 i::JSFunction::cast(*compiled_script)->shared()->script()));
7549
7550 int break_id = CcTest::i_isolate()->debug()->break_id();
7551 char script[128];
7552 i::Vector<char> script_vector(script, sizeof(script));
7553 SNPrintF(script_vector, "%%GetFrameCount(%d)", break_id);
7554 v8::Local<v8::Value> result = CompileRun(script);
7555
7556 int frame_count = result->Int32Value(context).FromJust();
7557 CHECK_EQ(expected_frame_count, frame_count)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (expected_frame_count
), (frame_count), "expected_frame_count" " " "==" " " "frame_count"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7557, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
7558
7559 for (int i = 0; i < frame_count; i++) {
7560 // The 5. element in the returned array of GetFrameDetails contains the
7561 // source position of that frame.
7562 SNPrintF(script_vector, "%%GetFrameDetails(%d, %d)[5]", break_id, i);
7563 v8::Local<v8::Value> result = CompileRun(script);
7564 CHECK_EQ(expected_line_number[i],do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (expected_line_number
[i]), (i::Script::GetLineNumber(source_script, result->Int32Value
(context).FromJust())), "expected_line_number[i]" " " "==" " "
"i::Script::GetLineNumber(source_script, result->Int32Value(context).FromJust())"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7566, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0)
7565 i::Script::GetLineNumber(source_script,do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (expected_line_number
[i]), (i::Script::GetLineNumber(source_script, result->Int32Value
(context).FromJust())), "expected_line_number[i]" " " "==" " "
"i::Script::GetLineNumber(source_script, result->Int32Value(context).FromJust())"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7566, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0)
7566 result->Int32Value(context).FromJust()))do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (expected_line_number
[i]), (i::Script::GetLineNumber(source_script, result->Int32Value
(context).FromJust())), "expected_line_number[i]" " " "==" " "
"i::Script::GetLineNumber(source_script, result->Int32Value(context).FromJust())"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7566, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
7567 }
7568 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(CcTest::isolate(), nullptr);
7569 CcTest::isolate()->TerminateExecution();
7570}
7571
7572
7573TEST(DebugBreakInline)static void TestDebugBreakInline(); CcTest register_test_DebugBreakInline
(TestDebugBreakInline, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "DebugBreakInline"
, __null, true, true); static void TestDebugBreakInline() {
7574 i::FLAG_allow_natives_syntax = true;
7575 DebugLocalContext env;
7576 v8::HandleScope scope(env->GetIsolate());
7577 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = env.context();
7578 const char* source =
7579 "function debug(b) { \n"
7580 " if (b) debugger; \n"
7581 "} \n"
7582 "function f(b) { \n"
7583 " debug(b) \n"
7584 "}; \n"
7585 "function g(b) { \n"
7586 " f(b); \n"
7587 "}; \n"
7588 "g(false); \n"
7589 "g(false); \n"
7590 "%OptimizeFunctionOnNextCall(g); \n"
7591 "g(true);";
7592 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(env->GetIsolate(), DebugBreakInlineListener);
7593 inline_script =
7594 v8::Script::Compile(context, v8_str(env->GetIsolate(), source))
7595 .ToLocalChecked();
7596 inline_script->Run(context).ToLocalChecked();
7597}
7598
7599
7600static void DebugEventStepNext(
7601 const v8::Debug::EventDetails& event_details) {
7602 v8::DebugEvent event = event_details.GetEvent();
7603 if (event == v8::Break) {
7604 PrepareStep(StepNext);
7605 }
7606}
7607
7608
7609static void RunScriptInANewCFrame(const char* source) {
7610 v8::TryCatch try_catch(CcTest::isolate());
7611 CompileRun(source);
7612 CHECK(try_catch.HasCaught())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(try_catch.HasCaught())), 0)))
{ V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7612, "Check failed: %s."
, "try_catch.HasCaught()"); } } while (0);
7613}
7614
7615
7616TEST(Regress131642)static void TestRegress131642(); CcTest register_test_Regress131642
(TestRegress131642, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "Regress131642"
, __null, true, true); static void TestRegress131642() {
7617 // Bug description:
7618 // When doing StepNext through the first script, the debugger is not reset
7619 // after exiting through exception. A flawed implementation enabling the
7620 // debugger to step into Array.prototype.forEach breaks inside the callback
7621 // for forEach in the second script under the assumption that we are in a
7622 // recursive call. In an attempt to step out, we crawl the stack using the
7623 // recorded frame pointer from the first script and fail when not finding it
7624 // on the stack.
7625 DebugLocalContext env;
7626 v8::HandleScope scope(env->GetIsolate());
7627 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(env->GetIsolate(), DebugEventStepNext);
7628
7629 // We step through the first script. It exits through an exception. We run
7630 // this inside a new frame to record a different FP than the second script
7631 // would expect.
7632 const char* script_1 = "debugger; throw new Error();";
7633 RunScriptInANewCFrame(script_1);
7634
7635 // The second script uses forEach.
7636 const char* script_2 = "[0].forEach(function() { });";
7637 CompileRun(script_2);
7638
7639 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(env->GetIsolate(), nullptr);
7640}
7641
7642
7643// Import from test-heap.cc
7644namespace v8 {
7645namespace internal {
7646
7647int CountNativeContexts();
7648}
7649}
7650
7651
7652static void NopListener(const v8::Debug::EventDetails& event_details) {
7653}
7654
7655
7656TEST(DebuggerCreatesContextIffActive)static void TestDebuggerCreatesContextIffActive(); CcTest register_test_DebuggerCreatesContextIffActive
(TestDebuggerCreatesContextIffActive, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, "DebuggerCreatesContextIffActive", __null, true, true); static
void TestDebuggerCreatesContextIffActive() {
7657 DebugLocalContext env;
7658 v8::HandleScope scope(env->GetIsolate());
7659 CHECK_EQ(1, v8::internal::CountNativeContexts())do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (v8
::internal::CountNativeContexts()), "1" " " "==" " " "v8::internal::CountNativeContexts()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7659, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
7660
7661 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(env->GetIsolate(), nullptr);
7662 CompileRun("debugger;");
7663 CHECK_EQ(1, v8::internal::CountNativeContexts())do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (v8
::internal::CountNativeContexts()), "1" " " "==" " " "v8::internal::CountNativeContexts()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7663, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
7664
7665 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(env->GetIsolate(), NopListener);
7666 CompileRun("debugger;");
7667 CHECK_EQ(2, v8::internal::CountNativeContexts())do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (2), (v8
::internal::CountNativeContexts()), "2" " " "==" " " "v8::internal::CountNativeContexts()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7667, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
7668
7669 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(env->GetIsolate(), nullptr);
7670}
7671
7672
7673TEST(LiveEditEnabled)static void TestLiveEditEnabled(); CcTest register_test_LiveEditEnabled
(TestLiveEditEnabled, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "LiveEditEnabled"
, __null, true, true); static void TestLiveEditEnabled() {
7674 v8::internal::FLAG_allow_natives_syntax = true;
7675 LocalContext env;
7676 v8::HandleScope scope(env->GetIsolate());
7677 v8::Debug::SetLiveEditEnabled(env->GetIsolate(), true);
7678 CompileRun("%LiveEditCompareStrings('', '')");
7679}
7680

7682TEST(LiveEditDisabled)static void TestLiveEditDisabled(); CcTest register_test_LiveEditDisabled
(TestLiveEditDisabled, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "LiveEditDisabled"
, __null, true, true); static void TestLiveEditDisabled() {
7683 v8::internal::FLAG_allow_natives_syntax = true;
7684 LocalContext env;
7685 v8::HandleScope scope(env->GetIsolate());
7686 v8::Debug::SetLiveEditEnabled(env->GetIsolate(), false);
7687 CompileRun("%LiveEditCompareStrings('', '')");
7688}
7689
7690
7691TEST(PrecompiledFunction)static void TestPrecompiledFunction(); CcTest register_test_PrecompiledFunction
(TestPrecompiledFunction, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "PrecompiledFunction"
, __null, true, true); static void TestPrecompiledFunction() {
7692 // Regression test for crbug.com/346207. If we have preparse data, parsing the
7693 // function in the presence of the debugger (and breakpoints) should still
7694 // succeed. The bug was that preparsing was done lazily and parsing was done
7695 // eagerly, so, the symbol streams didn't match.
7696 DebugLocalContext env;
7697 v8::HandleScope scope(env->GetIsolate());
7698 env.ExposeDebug();
7699 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(env->GetIsolate(), DebugBreakInlineListener);
7700
7701 v8::Local<v8::Function> break_here =
7702 CompileFunction(&env, "function break_here(){}", "break_here");
7703 SetBreakPoint(break_here, 0);
7704
7705 const char* source =
7706 "var a = b = c = 1; \n"
7707 "function this_is_lazy() { \n"
7708 // This symbol won't appear in the preparse data.
7709 " var a; \n"
7710 "} \n"
7711 "function bar() { \n"
7712 " return \"bar\"; \n"
7713 "}; \n"
7714 "a = b = c = 2; \n"
7715 "bar(); \n";
7716 v8::Local<v8::Value> result = ParserCacheCompileRun(source);
7717 CHECK(result->IsString())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(result->IsString())), 0)))
{ V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7717, "Check failed: %s."
, "result->IsString()"); } } while (0);
7718 v8::String::Utf8Value utf8(result);
7719 CHECK_EQ(0, strcmp("bar", *utf8))do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (0), (strcmp
("bar", *utf8)), "0" " " "==" " " "strcmp(\"bar\", *utf8)")) {
V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7719, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
7720
7721 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(env->GetIsolate(), nullptr);
7722 CheckDebuggerUnloaded(env->GetIsolate());
7723}
7724
7725
7726static void DebugBreakStackTraceListener(
7727 const v8::Debug::EventDetails& event_details) {
7728 v8::StackTrace::CurrentStackTrace(CcTest::isolate(), 10);
7729}
7730
7731
7732static void AddDebugBreak(const v8::FunctionCallbackInfo<v8::Value>& args) {
7733 v8::Debug::DebugBreak(args.GetIsolate());
7734}
7735
7736
7737TEST(DebugBreakStackTrace)static void TestDebugBreakStackTrace(); CcTest register_test_DebugBreakStackTrace
(TestDebugBreakStackTrace, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "DebugBreakStackTrace"
, __null, true, true); static void TestDebugBreakStackTrace() {
7738 DebugLocalContext env;
7739 v8::HandleScope scope(env->GetIsolate());
7740 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(env->GetIsolate(),
7741 DebugBreakStackTraceListener);
7742 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = env.context();
7743 v8::Local<v8::FunctionTemplate> add_debug_break_template =
7744 v8::FunctionTemplate::New(env->GetIsolate(), AddDebugBreak);
7745 v8::Local<v8::Function> add_debug_break =
7746 add_debug_break_template->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked();
7747 CHECK(env->Global()do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str("add_debug_break"), add_debug_break) .FromJust())), 0
))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7749, "Check failed: %s."
, "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(\"add_debug_break\"), add_debug_break) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
7748 ->Set(context, v8_str("add_debug_break"), add_debug_break)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str("add_debug_break"), add_debug_break) .FromJust())), 0
))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7749, "Check failed: %s."
, "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(\"add_debug_break\"), add_debug_break) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
7749 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str("add_debug_break"), add_debug_break) .FromJust())), 0
))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7749, "Check failed: %s."
, "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(\"add_debug_break\"), add_debug_break) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
7750
7751 CompileRun("(function loop() {"
7752 " for (var j = 0; j < 1000; j++) {"
7753 " for (var i = 0; i < 1000; i++) {"
7754 " if (i == 999) add_debug_break();"
7755 " }"
7756 " }"
7757 "})()");
7758}
7759
7760
7761v8::base::Semaphore terminate_requested_semaphore(0);
7762v8::base::Semaphore terminate_fired_semaphore(0);
7763bool terminate_already_fired = false;
7764
7765
7766static void DebugBreakTriggerTerminate(
7767 const v8::Debug::EventDetails& event_details) {
7768 if (event_details.GetEvent() != v8::Break || terminate_already_fired) return;
7769 terminate_requested_semaphore.Signal();
7770 // Wait for at most 2 seconds for the terminate request.
7771 CHECK(terminate_fired_semaphore.WaitFor(v8::base::TimeDelta::FromSeconds(2)))do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(terminate_fired_semaphore.WaitFor
(v8::base::TimeDelta::FromSeconds(2)))), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 7771, "Check failed: %s.", "terminate_fired_semaphore.WaitFor(v8::base::TimeDelta::FromSeconds(2))"
); } } while (0);
7772 terminate_already_fired = true;
7773}
7774
7775
7776class TerminationThread : public v8::base::Thread {
7777 public:
7778 explicit TerminationThread(v8::Isolate* isolate)
7779 : Thread(Options("terminator")), isolate_(isolate) {}
7780
7781 virtual void Run() {
7782 terminate_requested_semaphore.Wait();
7783 isolate_->TerminateExecution();
7784 terminate_fired_semaphore.Signal();
7785 }
7786
7787 private:
7788 v8::Isolate* isolate_;
7789};
7790
7791
7792TEST(DebugBreakOffThreadTerminate)static void TestDebugBreakOffThreadTerminate(); CcTest register_test_DebugBreakOffThreadTerminate
(TestDebugBreakOffThreadTerminate, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, "DebugBreakOffThreadTerminate", __null, true, true); static
void TestDebugBreakOffThreadTerminate() {
7793 DebugLocalContext env;
7794 v8::Isolate* isolate = env->GetIsolate();
7795 v8::HandleScope scope(isolate);
7796 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(isolate, DebugBreakTriggerTerminate);
7797 TerminationThread terminator(isolate);
7798 terminator.Start();
7799 v8::TryCatch try_catch(env->GetIsolate());
7800 v8::Debug::DebugBreak(isolate);
7801 CompileRun("while (true);");
7802 CHECK(try_catch.HasTerminated())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(try_catch.HasTerminated())), 0
))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7802, "Check failed: %s."
, "try_catch.HasTerminated()"); } } while (0);
7803}
7804
7805
7806static void DebugEventExpectNoException(
7807 const v8::Debug::EventDetails& event_details) {
7808 v8::DebugEvent event = event_details.GetEvent();
7809 CHECK_NE(v8::Exception, event)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckNEImpl( (v8::Exception
), (event), "v8::Exception" " " "!=" " " "event")) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7809, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
7810}
7811
7812
7813static void TryCatchWrappedThrowCallback(
7814 const v8::FunctionCallbackInfo<v8::Value>& args) {
7815 v8::TryCatch try_catch(args.GetIsolate());
7816 CompileRun("throw 'rejection';");
7817 CHECK(try_catch.HasCaught())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(try_catch.HasCaught())), 0)))
{ V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7817, "Check failed: %s."
, "try_catch.HasCaught()"); } } while (0);
7818}
7819
7820
7821TEST(DebugPromiseInterceptedByTryCatch)static void TestDebugPromiseInterceptedByTryCatch(); CcTest register_test_DebugPromiseInterceptedByTryCatch
(TestDebugPromiseInterceptedByTryCatch, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, "DebugPromiseInterceptedByTryCatch", __null, true, true); static
void TestDebugPromiseInterceptedByTryCatch() {
7822 DebugLocalContext env;
7823 v8::Isolate* isolate = env->GetIsolate();
7824 v8::HandleScope scope(isolate);
7825 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(isolate, &DebugEventExpectNoException);
7826 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = env.context();
7827 ChangeBreakOnException(false, true);
7828
7829 v8::Local<v8::FunctionTemplate> fun =
7830 v8::FunctionTemplate::New(isolate, TryCatchWrappedThrowCallback);
7831 CHECK(env->Global()do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str("fun"), fun->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked(
)) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 7834, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(\"fun\"), fun->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
7832 ->Set(context, v8_str("fun"),do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str("fun"), fun->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked(
)) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 7834, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(\"fun\"), fun->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
7833 fun->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str("fun"), fun->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked(
)) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 7834, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(\"fun\"), fun->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
7834 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str("fun"), fun->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked(
)) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 7834, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(\"fun\"), fun->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
7835
7836 CompileRun("var p = new Promise(function(res, rej) { fun(); res(); });");
7837 CompileRun(
7838 "var r;"
7839 "p.chain(function() { r = 'resolved'; },"
7840 " function() { r = 'rejected'; });");
7841 CHECK(CompileRun("r")->Equals(context, v8_str("resolved")).FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("r")->Equals(context
, v8_str("resolved")).FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 7841, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"r\")->Equals(context, v8_str(\"resolved\")).FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
7842}
7843
7844
7845static int exception_event_counter = 0;
7846
7847
7848static void DebugEventCountException(
7849 const v8::Debug::EventDetails& event_details) {
7850 v8::DebugEvent event = event_details.GetEvent();
7851 if (event == v8::Exception) exception_event_counter++;
7852}
7853
7854
7855static void ThrowCallback(const v8::FunctionCallbackInfo<v8::Value>& args) {
7856 CompileRun("throw 'rejection';");
7857}
7858
7859
7860TEST(DebugPromiseRejectedByCallback)static void TestDebugPromiseRejectedByCallback(); CcTest register_test_DebugPromiseRejectedByCallback
(TestDebugPromiseRejectedByCallback, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, "DebugPromiseRejectedByCallback", __null, true, true); static
void TestDebugPromiseRejectedByCallback() {
7861 DebugLocalContext env;
7862 v8::Isolate* isolate = env->GetIsolate();
7863 v8::HandleScope scope(isolate);
7864 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(isolate, &DebugEventCountException);
7865 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = env.context();
7866 ChangeBreakOnException(false, true);
7867 exception_event_counter = 0;
7868
7869 v8::Local<v8::FunctionTemplate> fun =
7870 v8::FunctionTemplate::New(isolate, ThrowCallback);
7871 CHECK(env->Global()do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str("fun"), fun->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked(
)) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 7874, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(\"fun\"), fun->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
7872 ->Set(context, v8_str("fun"),do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str("fun"), fun->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked(
)) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 7874, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(\"fun\"), fun->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
7873 fun->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str("fun"), fun->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked(
)) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 7874, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(\"fun\"), fun->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
7874 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str("fun"), fun->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked(
)) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 7874, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(\"fun\"), fun->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
7875
7876 CompileRun("var p = new Promise(function(res, rej) { fun(); res(); });");
7877 CompileRun(
7878 "var r;"
7879 "p.chain(function() { r = 'resolved'; },"
7880 " function(e) { r = 'rejected' + e; });");
7881 CHECK(do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("r")->Equals(context
, v8_str("rejectedrejection")).FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal(
"../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7882, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"r\")->Equals(context, v8_str(\"rejectedrejection\")).FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
7882 CompileRun("r")->Equals(context, v8_str("rejectedrejection")).FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("r")->Equals(context
, v8_str("rejectedrejection")).FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal(
"../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7882, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"r\")->Equals(context, v8_str(\"rejectedrejection\")).FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
7883 CHECK_EQ(1, exception_event_counter)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (exception_event_counter
), "1" " " "==" " " "exception_event_counter")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 7883, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
7884}
7885
7886
7887TEST(DebugBreakOnExceptionInObserveCallback)static void TestDebugBreakOnExceptionInObserveCallback(); CcTest
register_test_DebugBreakOnExceptionInObserveCallback(TestDebugBreakOnExceptionInObserveCallback
, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "DebugBreakOnExceptionInObserveCallback"
, __null, true, true); static void TestDebugBreakOnExceptionInObserveCallback
() {
7888 i::FLAG_harmony_object_observe = true;
7889 DebugLocalContext env;
7890 v8::Isolate* isolate = env->GetIsolate();
7891 v8::HandleScope scope(isolate);
7892 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(isolate, &DebugEventCountException);
7893 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = env.context();
7894 // Break on uncaught exception
7895 ChangeBreakOnException(false, true);
7896 exception_event_counter = 0;
7897
7898 v8::Local<v8::FunctionTemplate> fun =
7899 v8::FunctionTemplate::New(isolate, ThrowCallback);
7900 CHECK(env->Global()do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str("fun"), fun->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked(
)) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 7903, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(\"fun\"), fun->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
7901 ->Set(context, v8_str("fun"),do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str("fun"), fun->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked(
)) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 7903, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(\"fun\"), fun->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
7902 fun->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str("fun"), fun->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked(
)) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 7903, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(\"fun\"), fun->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0)
7903 .FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(env->Global() ->Set(context
, v8_str("fun"), fun->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked(
)) .FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 7903, "Check failed: %s.", "env->Global() ->Set(context, v8_str(\"fun\"), fun->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked()) .FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
7904
7905 CompileRun(
7906 "var obj = {};"
7907 "var callbackRan = false;"
7908 "Object.observe(obj, function() {"
7909 " callbackRan = true;"
7910 " throw Error('foo');"
7911 "});"
7912 "obj.prop = 1");
7913 CHECK(CompileRun("callbackRan")->BooleanValue(context).FromJust())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(CompileRun("callbackRan")->
BooleanValue(context).FromJust())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 7913, "Check failed: %s.", "CompileRun(\"callbackRan\")->BooleanValue(context).FromJust()"
); } } while (0);
7914 CHECK_EQ(1, exception_event_counter)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (1), (exception_event_counter
), "1" " " "==" " " "exception_event_counter")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 7914, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
7915}
7916
7917
7918static void DebugHarmonyScopingListener(
7919 const v8::Debug::EventDetails& event_details) {
7920 v8::DebugEvent event = event_details.GetEvent();
7921 if (event != v8::Break) return;
7922
7923 int break_id = CcTest::i_isolate()->debug()->break_id();
7924
7925 char script[128];
7926 i::Vector<char> script_vector(script, sizeof(script));
7927 SNPrintF(script_vector, "%%GetFrameCount(%d)", break_id);
7928 ExpectInt32(script, 1);
7929
7930 SNPrintF(script_vector, "var frame = new FrameMirror(%d, 0);", break_id);
7931 CompileRun(script);
7932 ExpectInt32("frame.evaluate('x').value_", 1);
7933 ExpectInt32("frame.evaluate('y').value_", 2);
7934
7935 CompileRun("var allScopes = frame.allScopes()");
7936 ExpectInt32("allScopes.length", 2);
7937
7938 ExpectBoolean("allScopes[0].scopeType() === ScopeType.Script", true);
7939
7940 ExpectInt32("allScopes[0].scopeObject().value_.x", 1);
7941
7942 ExpectInt32("allScopes[0].scopeObject().value_.y", 2);
7943
7944 CompileRun("allScopes[0].setVariableValue('x', 5);");
7945 CompileRun("allScopes[0].setVariableValue('y', 6);");
7946 ExpectInt32("frame.evaluate('x + y').value_", 11);
7947}
7948
7949
7950TEST(DebugBreakInLexicalScopes)static void TestDebugBreakInLexicalScopes(); CcTest register_test_DebugBreakInLexicalScopes
(TestDebugBreakInLexicalScopes, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, "DebugBreakInLexicalScopes", __null, true, true); static void
TestDebugBreakInLexicalScopes() {
7951 i::FLAG_allow_natives_syntax = true;
7952
7953 DebugLocalContext env;
7954 v8::Isolate* isolate = env->GetIsolate();
7955 v8::HandleScope scope(isolate);
7956 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(isolate, DebugHarmonyScopingListener);
7957
7958 CompileRun(
7959 "'use strict'; \n"
7960 "let x = 1; \n");
7961 ExpectInt32(
7962 "'use strict'; \n"
7963 "let y = 2; \n"
7964 "debugger; \n"
7965 "x * y",
7966 30);
7967 ExpectInt32(
7968 "x = 1; y = 2; \n"
7969 "debugger;"
7970 "x * y",
7971 30);
7972}
7973
7974static int after_compile_handler_depth = 0;
7975static void HandleInterrupt(v8::Isolate* isolate, void* data) {
7976 CHECK_EQ(0, after_compile_handler_depth)do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (0), (after_compile_handler_depth
), "0" " " "==" " " "after_compile_handler_depth")) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7976, "Check failed: %s.", _msg
->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
7977}
7978
7979static void NoInterruptsOnDebugEvent(
7980 const v8::Debug::EventDetails& event_details) {
7981 if (event_details.GetEvent() != v8::AfterCompile) return;
7982 ++after_compile_handler_depth;
7983 // Do not allow nested AfterCompile events.
7984 CHECK(after_compile_handler_depth <= 1)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(after_compile_handler_depth <=
1)), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 7984, "Check failed: %s."
, "after_compile_handler_depth <= 1"); } } while (0);
7985 v8::Isolate* isolate = event_details.GetEventContext()->GetIsolate();
7986 isolate->RequestInterrupt(&HandleInterrupt, nullptr);
7987 CompileRun("function foo() {}; foo();");
7988 --after_compile_handler_depth;
7989}
7990
7991
7992TEST(NoInterruptsInDebugListener)static void TestNoInterruptsInDebugListener(); CcTest register_test_NoInterruptsInDebugListener
(TestNoInterruptsInDebugListener, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, "NoInterruptsInDebugListener", __null, true, true); static void
TestNoInterruptsInDebugListener() {
7993 DebugLocalContext env;
7994 v8::Debug::SetDebugEventListener(env->GetIsolate(), NoInterruptsOnDebugEvent);
7995 CompileRun("void(0);");
7996}
7997
7998class TestBreakLocation : public i::BreakLocation {
7999 public:
8000 using i::BreakLocation::GetIterator;
8001 using i::BreakLocation::Iterator;
8002};
8003
8004TEST(BreakLocationIterator)static void TestBreakLocationIterator(); CcTest register_test_BreakLocationIterator
(TestBreakLocationIterator, "../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", "BreakLocationIterator"
, __null, true, true); static void TestBreakLocationIterator(
) {
8005 DebugLocalContext env;
8006 v8::Isolate* isolate = env->GetIsolate();
8007 i::Isolate* i_isolate = reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(isolate);
8008 v8::HandleScope scope(isolate);
8009
8010 v8::Local<v8::Value> result = CompileRun(
8011 "function f() {\n"
8012 " debugger; \n"
8013 " f(); \n"
8014 " debugger; \n"
8015 "} \n"
8016 "f");
8017 Handle<i::Object> function_obj = v8::Utils::OpenHandle(*result);
8018 Handle<i::JSFunction> function = Handle<i::JSFunction>::cast(function_obj);
8019 Handle<i::SharedFunctionInfo> shared(function->shared());
8020
8021 EnableDebugger(isolate);
8022 CHECK(i_isolate->debug()->EnsureDebugInfo(shared, function))do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(i_isolate->debug()->EnsureDebugInfo
(shared, function))), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 8022, "Check failed: %s.", "i_isolate->debug()->EnsureDebugInfo(shared, function)"
); } } while (0);
8023
8024 Handle<i::DebugInfo> debug_info(shared->GetDebugInfo());
8025 int code_size = debug_info->abstract_code()->Size();
8026
8027 bool found_return = false;
8028 bool found_call = false;
8029 bool found_debugger = false;
8030
8031 // Test public interface.
8032 for (int i = 0; i < code_size; i++) {
8033 i::BreakLocation location = i::BreakLocation::FromCodeOffset(debug_info, i);
8034 if (location.IsCall()) found_call = true;
8035 if (location.IsReturn()) found_return = true;
8036 if (location.IsDebuggerStatement()) found_debugger = true;
8037 }
8038 CHECK(found_call)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(found_call)), 0))) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 8038, "Check failed: %s.", "found_call"
); } } while (0);
8039 CHECK(found_return)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(found_return)), 0))) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 8039, "Check failed: %s.", "found_return"
); } } while (0);
8040 CHECK(found_debugger)do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(found_debugger)), 0))) { V8_Fatal
("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 8040, "Check failed: %s.", "found_debugger"
); } } while (0);
8041
8042 // Test underlying implementation.
8043 TestBreakLocation::Iterator* iterator =
8044 TestBreakLocation::GetIterator(debug_info, i::ALL_BREAK_LOCATIONS);
8045 CHECK(iterator->GetBreakLocation().IsDebuggerStatement())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(iterator->GetBreakLocation
().IsDebuggerStatement())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 8045, "Check failed: %s.", "iterator->GetBreakLocation().IsDebuggerStatement()"
); } } while (0);
8046 CHECK_EQ(7, iterator->GetBreakLocation().position())do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (7), (iterator
->GetBreakLocation().position()), "7" " " "==" " " "iterator->GetBreakLocation().position()"
)) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 8046, "Check failed: %s."
, _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; } } while (0);
8047 iterator->Next();
8048 CHECK(iterator->GetBreakLocation().IsDebugBreakSlot())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(iterator->GetBreakLocation
().IsDebugBreakSlot())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 8048, "Check failed: %s.", "iterator->GetBreakLocation().IsDebugBreakSlot()"
); } } while (0);
8049 CHECK_EQ(22, iterator->GetBreakLocation().position())do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (22), (
iterator->GetBreakLocation().position()), "22" " " "==" " "
"iterator->GetBreakLocation().position()")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 8049, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
8050 iterator->Next();
8051 CHECK(iterator->GetBreakLocation().IsCall())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(iterator->GetBreakLocation
().IsCall())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 8051, "Check failed: %s.", "iterator->GetBreakLocation().IsCall()"
); } } while (0);
8052 CHECK_EQ(22, iterator->GetBreakLocation().position())do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (22), (
iterator->GetBreakLocation().position()), "22" " " "==" " "
"iterator->GetBreakLocation().position()")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 8052, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
8053 iterator->Next();
8054 CHECK(iterator->GetBreakLocation().IsDebuggerStatement())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(iterator->GetBreakLocation
().IsDebuggerStatement())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 8054, "Check failed: %s.", "iterator->GetBreakLocation().IsDebuggerStatement()"
); } } while (0);
8055 CHECK_EQ(37, iterator->GetBreakLocation().position())do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (37), (
iterator->GetBreakLocation().position()), "37" " " "==" " "
"iterator->GetBreakLocation().position()")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 8055, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
8056 iterator->Next();
8057 CHECK(iterator->GetBreakLocation().IsReturn())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(iterator->GetBreakLocation
().IsReturn())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 8057, "Check failed: %s.", "iterator->GetBreakLocation().IsReturn()"
); } } while (0);
8058 CHECK_EQ(50, iterator->GetBreakLocation().position())do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (50), (
iterator->GetBreakLocation().position()), "50" " " "==" " "
"iterator->GetBreakLocation().position()")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 8058, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
8059 iterator->Next();
8060 CHECK(iterator->Done())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(iterator->Done())), 0))) {
V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 8060, "Check failed: %s."
, "iterator->Done()"); } } while (0);
8061 delete iterator;
8062
8063 iterator = TestBreakLocation::GetIterator(debug_info, i::CALLS_AND_RETURNS);
8064 CHECK(iterator->GetBreakLocation().IsCall())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(iterator->GetBreakLocation
().IsCall())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 8064, "Check failed: %s.", "iterator->GetBreakLocation().IsCall()"
); } } while (0);
8065 CHECK_EQ(22, iterator->GetBreakLocation().position())do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (22), (
iterator->GetBreakLocation().position()), "22" " " "==" " "
"iterator->GetBreakLocation().position()")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 8065, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
8066 iterator->Next();
8067 CHECK(iterator->GetBreakLocation().IsReturn())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(iterator->GetBreakLocation
().IsReturn())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 8067, "Check failed: %s.", "iterator->GetBreakLocation().IsReturn()"
); } } while (0);
8068 CHECK_EQ(50, iterator->GetBreakLocation().position())do { if (std::string* _msg = ::v8::base::CheckEQImpl( (50), (
iterator->GetBreakLocation().position()), "50" " " "==" " "
"iterator->GetBreakLocation().position()")) { V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc"
, 8068, "Check failed: %s.", _msg->c_str()); delete _msg; }
} while (0);
8069 iterator->Next();
8070 CHECK(iterator->Done())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(iterator->Done())), 0))) {
V8_Fatal("../test/cctest/test-debug.cc", 8070, "Check failed: %s."
, "iterator->Done()"); } } while (0);
8071 delete iterator;
8072
8073 DisableDebugger(isolate);
8074}
